# cond-mat.mes-hall [[Back]](#toc)

### [333] [An Unusual Dresselhaus Spin-Orbit Contribution of Even Order in Momentum](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05787)
*Hao Yang,Wei Wang,Gerson J. Ferreira,Ning Hao,Ping Zhang,Jiyong Fu*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 文章揭示了半导体异质结构中一种新的、以前未被发现的二次狄塞尔 SO 项，它起源于带间效应，并与时间反转和空间对称性兼容。该项导致了独特的量子现象，例如混合旋转纹理、各向异性能带色散、避免的能带交叉、纵向 Zitterbewegung 以及不同能带之间相反的自旋演化。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 文章旨在揭示半导体异质结构中可能存在的、由带间效应引起的、以前未被充分认识的二次狄塞尔 SO 项，并探讨其与线性 SO 项的显著区别以及由此产生的量子现象。

Method: 文章结合了模型计算、对称性分析和不变量方法来揭示二次狄塞尔 SO 项的存在及其性质。

Result: 文章发现，在半导体异质结构中，由于带间效应，存在一个二次狄塞尔 SO 项。该项导致了混合旋转纹理、各向异性能带色散、避免的能带交叉、纵向 Zitterbewegung 以及不同能带之间相反的自旋演化等量子现象。

Conclusion: 文章总结认为，带间效应提供了一种利用偶数阶 SO 项的新途径，并为利用这些不寻常的 SO 项开辟了新的自旋电子学功能的可能性。

Abstract: The spin-orbit (SO) coupling is conventionally known to manifest as \emph{odd} functions of momentum. Here, through both model calculations and symmetry analysis along with the method of invariants, we reveal that, in ordinary semiconductor heterostructures, a \emph{quadratic} Dresselhaus SO term -- inheriting from its bulk crystal form -- emerges via the interband effect, while complying with time-reversal and spatial symmetries. Furthermore, we observe that this unusual SO term gives rise to a range of striking quantum phenomena, including hybridized swirling texture, anisotropic energy dispersion, avoided band crossing, longitudinal \emph{Zitterbewegung}, and opposite spin evolution between different bands in quantum dynamics. These stand in stark contrast to those associated with the usual \emph{linear} SO terms. Our findings uncover a previously overlooked route for exploiting interband effects and open new avenues for spintronic functionalities that leverage unusual SO terms of \emph{even} orders in momentum.

</details>


### [334] [Crossover from quantum correlation to hot-carrier transport in scattering-tolerant 2D transistors](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05846)
*Debottam Daw,Houcine Bouzid,Sung-Gyu Lee,Wujoon Cha,Ki Kang Kim,Min-kyu Joo,Yan Wang,Manish Chhowalla,Young Hee Lee*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 该研究展示了一种新型的晶体管，它能够在低温下的量子相关态和高温下的热载流子传输之间切换，并在低温下实现了准周期性电流波动，在室温下达到了~4,800 cm^2/Vs的电子迁移率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在同一器件中同时实现量子关联和热载流子输运这两种截然不同的电子传导机制是极具挑战性的。本研究旨在开发一种能够实现这种转换的新型器件。

Method: 研究人员利用铁电衬底上的单层过渡金属硫族化物晶体管，通过强介电筛选和平面栅极控制，实现了在低温下的量子关联态和高温下的热载流子输运之间的转换。

Result: 在低温下，器件表现出可重复的准周期性电流波动，表明存在由电子-电子相互作用驱动的新兴势能。随着温度升高，该势能被热溶解，载流子传输由横向栅极驱动，表现出热载流子行为，实现了~4,800 cm^2/Vs的室温电子迁移率和~0.5 mA/μm的最大开启电流。

Conclusion: 本研究成功开发了一种能够统一探测介观秩序并突破现有2D晶体管性能极限的新型器件，为探索量子关联和热载流子输运提供了新的平台。

Abstract: Quantum correlation and hot-carrier transport represent two fundamentally distinct regimes of electronic conduction, rarely accessible within the same device. Here, we report a state-of-the-art monolayer transition metal dichalcogenides transistor architecture on a ferroelectric substrate that enables this crossover by leveraging the strong dielectric screening and in-plane gate control. At cryogenic temperatures, the devices exhibit reproducible quasi-periodic current fluctuations, consistent with an emergent potential landscape driven by electron-electron interactions at low carrier densities. As the temperature increases, this correlated potential profile thermally dissolves and transport is dominated by the lateral gate-field that drives the carriers with high kinetic energy. These hot-carriers can efficiently surmount the scattering events, exhibiting a record-high room-temperature electron mobility of ~4,800 cm^2/Vs and a maximum on-current ~0.5 mA/μm, surpassing traditional FETs in key performance metrics. These findings establish a unified approach for probing intermediate mesoscopic orders, while advancing the transistor performance limits in scalable 2D transistors.

</details>


### [335] [Antiferromagnetic skyrmion as a magnonic lens](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05905)
*Hongbin Wu,Zi-Wu Wang,Jin Lan*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: The paper shows that an antiferromagnetic skyrmion can act as a spin wave lens, deflecting spin waves due to the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Spin waves are promising for energy-saving information technologies, and lenses are fundamental for wave manipulation. This paper explores using an antiferromagnetic skyrmion as a spin wave lens.

Method: The study proposes theoretically and verifies through micromagnetic simulations that an antiferromagnetic skyrmion can function as a spin wave lens.

Result: The micromagnetic simulations confirmed that an antiferromagnetic skyrmion acts as a lens for spin waves when the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya strength surpasses a specific threshold, causing spin wave deflection.

Conclusion: An antiferromagnetic skyrmion, under certain conditions (Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya strength exceeding a threshold), naturally functions as a spin wave lens, with the spin wave deflection mechanism being driven by the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction.

Abstract: A lens, a device transforming propagation directions in an organized fashion, is one of the fundamental tools for wave manipulation. Spin wave, the collective excitation of ordered magnetizations, stands out as a promising candidate for future energy-saving information technologies. Here we propose theoretically and verify by micromagnetic simulations, that an antiferromagnetic skyrmion naturally serves as a lens for spin wave, when the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya strength exceeds a threshold. The underlying mechanism is the spin wave deflection caused by Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction, a mechanism that is ordinarily overshadowed by the magnetic topology.

</details>


### [336] [Exploiting Negative Capacitance for Unconventional Coulomb Engineering](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05943)
*Aravindh Shankar,Pramey Upadhyaya,Supriyo Datta*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 负介电常数效应可能为电子系统提供新的库仑工程途径，甚至可能实现超导基态。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统上，介电常数仅限于正值，限制了通过库仑工程调谐二维电子系统的可能性。本研究旨在探讨负介电常数效应在库仑工程中的应用前景。

Method: 利用具有线性和抛物线色散关系的二维电子系统模型，并耦合具有负电容的环境，估算工程库仑相互作用的强度和符号，并概述可能稳定电子相的参数范围。

Result: 研究表明，负介电常数可以将电子间的自然排斥相互作用转变为吸引相互作用，并估算了这种相互作用的强度和符号。

Conclusion: 负介电常数效应可以为库仑工程开辟新的途径，并有可能稳定超导基态等相关电子相。

Abstract: It is known that the many-body ground state of a two-dimensional electron system can be tuned through Coulomb engineering by controlling the permittivity of the surrounding media. However, permittivities are traditionally restricted to positive values. In this paper we argue that the negative capacitance effect demonstrated in appropriately engineered structures can open new vistas in Coulomb engineering. Negative permittivities transform the natural repulsive interaction of electrons into an attractive one raising the intriguing possibility of a superconducting ground state. Using models of two-dimensional electron systems with linear and parabolic dispersion relations coupled to environments with negative capacitance, we estimate the strength and sign of the engineered Coulomb interaction and outline parameter regimes that could stabilize correlated electronic phases.

</details>


### [337] [Properties of multiterminal superconducting nanostructure with double quantum dot](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05988)
*G. Górski,K. Kucab,T. Domański*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: The paper investigates charge transport and thermoelectric properties of a double quantum dot system coupled to normal/ferromagnetic electrodes and a superconductor. It highlights the significant role of interdot coupling in controlling these properties, with distinct behaviors observed in weak and strong coupling regimes.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Investigate the charge transport and thermoelectric properties of a specific quantum dot system to understand the influence of interdot coupling.

Method: Studied the system by analyzing the effects of weak and strong interdot coupling on local and nonlocal transport properties, considering interferometric lineshapes and molecular Andreev bound states.

Result: Weak interdot coupling leads to Fano-type lineshapes in spectra, conductances, and Seebeck coefficients. Strong interdot coupling results in transport coefficients being dominated by superconducting proximity-induced Andreev bound states in both quantum dots.

Conclusion: Interdot coupling is a crucial factor in controlling the transport characteristics of the studied system, with different coupling strengths leading to distinct physical phenomena.

Abstract: We study the charge transport and thermoelectric properties of the junction, comprising double quantum dot embedded in T-shaped geometry on the interface between two normal/ferromagnetic electrodes and superconducting lead. We show that the interdot coupling plays major role in controlling the local and nonlocal transport properties of this setup. For the weak interdot coupling limit, we obtain the interferometric (Fano-type) lineshapes imprinted in the quasiparticle spectra, conductances and Seebeck coefficients. In contrast, for the strong interdot coupling, we predict that the local and nonlocal transport coefficients are primarily dependent on the molecular Andreev bound states induced by superconducting proximity effect, simultaneously in both quantum dots.

</details>


### [338] [Active Noise Reduction in Si/SiGe Gated Quantum Dots](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06373)
*Rajat Bharadwaj,Parvathy Gireesan,Harikrishnan Sundaresan,Chithra H Sharma,Lucky Donald L Kynshi,Prasad Muragesh,D. Bougeard,Madhu Thalakulam*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种适用于亚开尔文温度下量子器件的主动噪声消除方案，通过注入反向噪声信号来补偿周期性环境干扰，有效解决了传统滤波方法在低频噪声抑制方面的局限性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统无源滤波方案难以抑制量子器件中的低频噪声，而扩展这些滤波器以应对低频干扰则会导致系统响应变慢和约翰逊噪声增加，阻碍了精确测量。

Method: 提出并实验演示了一种通用的主动噪声消除方案，通过在设备中动态注入相位连贯的反噪声信号来补偿周期性环境干扰。该方案采用自动反馈协议，具有跳频降低和自适应相位/幅度调整功能，无需人工干预即可实现实时补偿。

Result: 在受强50 Hz电力线干扰的门控 Si/SiGe 量子点上实现了该方案，并通过库仑阻塞振荡和库仑菱形图验证了其有效性。结果表明，该技术能够显著抑制目标干扰和整体噪声水平，从而稳定输运特性并提高器件保真度。

Conclusion: 该主动噪声消除方案能够有效抑制量子器件中的确定性噪声，而不会引入额外的时间常数，具有广泛的应用前景，可应用于各种因确定性噪声而受阻的固态量子器件。

Abstract: Solid-state quantum technologies such as quantum dot qubits and quantum electrical metrology circuits rely on quantum phenomena at ultra-low energies, making them highly sensitive to various forms of environmental noise. Conventional passive filtering schemes can reduce high-frequency noise but are often ineffective against low-frequency interference, like powerline or instrument-induced. Extending such filters to lower frequencies causes practical issues such as longer stabilization times, slower system response, and increased Johnson noise, which impede low-frequency transport measurements. To address these limitations, we propose and experimentally demonstrate a generalized active noise cancellation scheme for quantum devices operating at sub-Kelvin temperatures. Our approach compensates periodic environmental interference by dynamically injecting a phase-coherent anti-noise signal directly into the device. We employ an automated feedback protocol featuring beat-frequency reduction and adaptive phase-amplitude tuning, enabling real-time compensation without any manual intervention. Unlike post-processing or passive filtering, this method suppresses noise at the device level without introducing additional time constants. We implement the scheme on a gate-defined Si/SiGe quantum dot subject to strong 50 Hz powerline interference and validate its effectiveness through acquiring Coulomb Blockade Oscillations and Coulomb diamond plots. The technique achieves substantial suppression of both the targeted interference and the overall noise floor, thereby stabilizing transport characteristics and enhancing device fidelity. While demonstrated on a quantum dot, the proposed framework is broadly applicable to a wide class of solid-state quantum devices where deterministic noise presents a critical bottleneck.

</details>


### [339] [Spin-valley 0.7 anomaly in bilayer graphene/WSe$_2$ quantum point contacts](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06384)
*Jonas D. Gerber,Efe Ersoy,Michele Masseroni,Markus Niese,Artem O. Denisov,Christoph Adam,Lara Ostertag,Jessica Richter,Takashi Taniguchi,Kenji Watanabe,Yigal Meir,Thomas Ihn,Klaus Ensslin*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 双层石墨烯/WSe2量子点接触中观察到0.7电导异常，与GaAs体系在温度和偏压响应上相似，但在磁场响应上存在差异，表明谷自由度在其中起关键作用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究双层石墨烯/WSe2量子点接触中的电导异常现象，并探讨其与GaAs体系的异同，以理解谷自由度在其中的作用。

Method: 通过实验测量双层石墨烯/WSe2量子点接触的电导，并分析其在温度、偏压和磁场下的响应。

Result: 在0.7 x (2e^2/h)处观察到清晰的电导异常；该异常在温度和偏压响应上与GaAs体系相似，但在平行磁场响应上存在显著差异；发现近邻诱导的自旋-轨道耦合导致了双层石墨烯的四重简并基态分裂成自旋-谷锁定的克拉莫斯二重态。

Conclusion: 双层石墨烯/WSe2量子点接触中的0.7电导异常现象，其温度和偏压响应与GaAs体系相似，但磁场响应的差异揭示了谷自由度的核心作用，为研究传统半导体无法达到的谷交换关联物理开辟了新途径。

Abstract: We report a well-resolved 0.7 conductance anomaly at $G = 0.7\times(2e^2/h)$ in bilayer graphene/WSe$_2$ quantum point contacts. Proximity-enhanced spin-orbit coupling splits the four-fold ground state of bilayer graphene into well-separated spin-valley locked Kramers doublets. The anomaly emerges between these opposite spin-valley states. Despite fundamentally different band structure and wavefunction characteristics, the temperature and bias phenomenology closely mirror GaAs systems. In contrast, the parallel magnetic field response differs significantly, confirming the central role of valley degrees of freedom. This opens new pathways to study valley-exchange correlation physics in regimes inaccessible to conventional semiconductors.

</details>


### [340] [Facile Salt-Assisted Hydrothermal Synthesis of Nanodiamonds from CHO Precursors: Atomic-Scale Mechanistic Insights](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06467)
*Soumya Pratap Tripathy,Sayan Saha,Saurabh Kumar Gupta,Pallavee Das,Binay Priyadarsan Nayak,Anup Routray,Priya Choudhary,Srihari V,Bitop Maitra,Ashna Reyaz,Anushka Samant,Debopriya Sinha,Kritideepan Parida,Kuna Das,Abhijeet Sahoo,Kunal Pal,Sirsendu Sekhar Ray*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: Hydrothermal synthesis can produce nanodiamonds using various carbon-based precursors in alkaline solutions. The study identified key factors influencing nanodiamond properties and provided insights into the formation mechanism, positioning it as a sustainable method for various applications.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The sustainability and detailed mechanisms of hydrothermal synthesis for nanodiamond production were not fully understood.

Method: Designed ten hydrothermal synthesis protocols using different CHO-based molecular precursors (organic acids, polyols, sugars, polysaccharides) in chlorinated, alkaline aqueous solutions at 190°C. Analyzed nanodiamonds using HRTEM and XPS.

Result: Confirmed the presence of diamond-specific lattice planes and sp3-hybridized carbon structures. Identified precursor type, molecular size, and ionic composition as key factors influencing defect patterns and polymorph distribution. Observed atomic-scale imaging showed graphite to diamond transitions, lattice compression, and twinning patterns.

Conclusion: Hydrothermal synthesis is a sustainable, chemistry-driven, and tunable approach for creating nanodiamonds suitable for applications in quantum technologies, biomedicine, catalysis, and advanced materials.

Abstract: Hydrothermal synthesis offers an economical and scalable way to produce nanodiamonds under relatively mild, low-pressure and low-temperature conditions. However,its sustainability and the detailed mechanisms behind diamond formation in such environments are still not fully understood. In this work, we designed ten hydrothermal synthesis protocols using different CHO-based molecular precursors containing COOH and OH groups, such as organic acids, polyols, sugars, and polysaccharides.The reactions were carried out at 190 degrees Centigrade in chlorinated, strongly alkaline aqueous solutions with alkali and alkaline-earth metal ions. Using high-resolution transmission electron microscopy and X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy, we confirmed the presence of diamond-specific lattice planes and sp3-hybridized carbon structures. Our results show that the type of precursor, its molecular size, and the ionic composition of the solution play key roles in determining the defect patterns and polymorph distribution in the resulting nanodiamonds. Atomic-scale imaging showed both coherent and incoherent transitions from graphite to diamond, along with gradual lattice compression and complex twinning patterns. These observations provide direct insight into how interfacial crystallography and defect dynamics drive diamond formation in aqueous systems. Overall, the study positions hydrothermal synthesis as a sustainable, chemistry-driven, and tunable approach for creating nanodiamonds tailored for applications in quantum technologies, biomedicine, catalysis, and advanced materials.

</details>


### [341] [Interface Roughness Scattering Processes in Quantum wells in a Tilted Quantizing Magnetic Field](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06771)
*M. P. Telenkov,Yu. A. Mityagin*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 在量化磁場中，考慮了量子阱界面粗糙度的散射過程。推導了傾斜於量子阱層的磁場的散射率表達式。通過分析該表達式，確定了散射率隨磁場強度和方向、量子阱電位分佈以及界面粗糙度參數變化的趨勢。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在量化磁場中，探討量子阱界面粗糙度的散射過程。

Method: 推導了傾斜於量子阱層的磁場的散射率表達式，並分析了其趨勢。

Result: 建立了散射率與磁場強度和方向、量子阱電位分佈、界面粗糙度參數之間的關係。

Conclusion: 分析了磁場強度和方向、量子阱電位分佈、界面粗糙度參數對量子阱界面粗糙度散射率的影響趨勢。

Abstract: Scattering processes by the interface roughness in a quantum well in a quantizing magnetic field are considered. An expression for the scattering rate is derived for a magnetic field tilted relative to the quantum well layers. By analyzing this expression, trends in the behavior of the scattering rate are established with variation in the magnetic field strength and orientation, the potential profile of the quantum well, and the interface roughness parameters.

</details>


### [342] [Universal two-stage dynamics and phase control in skyrmion formation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06777)
*Shiwei Zhu,Xinyuan Guan,Zhen Sun,Qiuyao Zhang,Changsheng Song*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 该研究发现了一个通用的双阶段动力学过程，用于解释磁斯格明子的形成，并引入了一个手性关联 `χ` 将其与平衡相联系起来。第一阶段是受交换-DMI比例 `J'` 控制的条纹粗化，第二阶段是受 `J'` 和各向异性-DMI比例 `K'` 的协同作用驱动的条纹收缩。磁场-DMI比例 `B'` 会影响这两个阶段。通过结合符号回归和神经网络，研究人员建立了一个斯格明子形成判据：`0.58 K'J' + μB'J' > 1`。该模型区分了各参数的作用：`J'` 决定条纹宽度，`K'` 主要控制斯格明子尺寸，`B'` 则显著影响拓扑荷。该方法为预测和控制手性磁体的磁相提供了一个通用框架。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究的动机在于揭示磁斯格明子形成过程中的普遍双阶段动力学，并将其与平衡相联系起来，从而为理解和控制手性磁体的磁相提供一个通用框架。

Method: 通过符号回归与神经网络相结合的方法，对交换-DMI比例 (J')、各向异性-DMI比例 (K') 和磁场-DMI比例 (B') 等参数进行建模，以分析它们在磁斯格明子形成过程中的作用，并推导出形成判据。

Result: 研究发现，磁斯格明子形成包括两个阶段：第一阶段是受 J' 控制的条纹粗化，第二阶段是受 J' 和 K' 协同作用的条纹收缩。B' 同时影响两个阶段。最终推导出的形成判据为：0.58 K'J' + μB'J' > 1。J' 决定条纹宽度，K' 控制斯格明子尺寸，B' 影响拓扑荷。

Conclusion: 本研究提出的双阶段动力学模型和形成的判据，为理解和控制手性磁体中的磁斯格明子形成提供了新的视角和通用框架，区分了不同参数在其中的作用。

Abstract: We uncover a universal two-stage dynamics during skyrmion formation and establish its connection to equilibrium phases through the introduction of a chiral correlation $χ$. Stage I involves stripe coarsening governed by the exchange-to-DMI ratio $J'$, while stage II entails stripe contraction driven by the synergy between $J'$ and the anisotropy-to-DMI ratio $K'$. The magnetic field-to-DMI ratio $B'$ influences both stages. By combining symbolic regression with neural networks, we model the competition and cooperation among these parameters and derive a skyrmion formation criterion, $0.58 K'J' + μB'J' > 1$. Our model disentangles their distinct roles: $J'$ sets the stripe width, $K'$ primarily controls the skyrmion size, and $B'$ strongly affects the topological charge. This approach provides a general framework for predicting and controlling magnetic phases in chiral magnets.

</details>


### [343] [Heat Coulomb blockade in a double-island metal-semiconductor device](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06783)
*A. V. Parafilo*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 文章研究了量子霍尔效应下由两个金属岛组成的介观器件的热输运性质，并提出了热库仑阻塞现象的理论。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究量子霍尔效应下介观器件的热输运性质，特别是热库仑阻塞现象以及维德曼-弗兰兹定律的适用性。

Method: 通过理论分析了2M个陆地信道和N个岛间信道在热库仑阻塞中的作用，并研究了不同温度下岛屿放置在电极之间的情况。

Result: 发现与单岛情况不同，多岛器件的热输运会额外受到M^2/(2N+M)^2因子导致的抑制。此外，还确定了维德曼-弗兰兹定律被违反的条件。

Conclusion: 量子霍尔效应下的多岛介观器件中存在一种额外的热输运抑制机制，并且在特定条件下维德曼-弗兰兹定律可能被违反。

Abstract: We study the thermal transport properties of a mesoscopic device comprising two metallic islands embedded in a two-dimensional electron gas in the integer quantum Hall regime. It is shown that the $2M$ ballistic edge channels connecting the islands to the external reservoirs and the $N$ inter-island channels play a central role in the phenomenon of heat Coulomb blockade. Unlike the single-island case, where the heat flux is reduced by exactly one quantum of thermal conductance, we predict an additional suppression proportional to the factor $M^2/(2N+M)^2$. We further examine a configuration in which the islands are placed between electrodes at different temperatures and identify the conditions under which the Wiedemann-Franz law is violated.

</details>


### [344] [Ultra-long-range spin coupling in graphene revealed by atomically resolved spin excitations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06887)
*Beatriz Viña-Bausá,Antonio. T. Costa,Joao Henriques,Eva Cortés-del Río,Roberto Carrasco,Pierre Mallet,Jean-Yves Veuillen,Joaquín Fernández-Rossier,Iván Brihuega*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 在石墨烯上通过化学吸附氢原子实现远距离自旋相互作用，用于量子计算和模拟。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究磁相互作用在量子磁性、自旋量子计算和量子模拟中的作用，并优化相互作用的范围和强度。

Method: 使用扫描隧道显微镜和非弹性电子隧道谱，并辅以大规模平均场Hubbard计算，研究石墨烯上氢原子诱导的自旋-1/2对和三聚体中的交换相互作用。

Result: 实现了3 meV的交换耦合，作用距离超过10 nm，并且耦合性质（铁磁性或反铁磁性）可由自旋相对亚晶格排列控制。通过原子操纵实现了对自旋三聚体的控制，并观察到当成对交换耦合相当时出现的集体自旋激发。

Conclusion: 化学吸附的氢原子在石墨烯上实现了前所未有的远距离自旋相互作用，为量子计算和模拟提供了新的可能性，并且可以通过原子操纵精确控制自旋激发。

Abstract: Magnetic interactions between localized spins-1/2 play a central role in quantum magnetism, spin-based quantum computing, and quantum simulation. The range and strength of these interactions are key figures of merit. Here, we probe exchange interactions in pairs and trimers of spins-1/2 introduced by chemisorption of individual hydrogen atoms on graphene. Using scanning tunneling microscopy and inelastic electron tunneling spectroscopy, supported by large-scale mean-field Hubbard calculations, we demonstrate 3 meV exchange couplings at separations beyond 10 nm, surpassing all prior systems. The couplings can be ferro- or antiferromagnetic depending on the relative sublattice arrangement. Real-space mapping of spin excitation amplitudes enables characterization with atomic-resolution. Through atomic manipulation we extend this control to spin trimers, revealing collective spin excitations when pairwise exchange couplings are comparable.

</details>


### [345] [Plasmon resonance in a sub-THz graphene-based detector: theory and experiment](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06891)
*I. M. Moiseenko,E. Titova,M. Kashchenko,D. Svintsov*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本研究结合实验与理论，研究了兆赫兹辐射下双层石墨烯（BLG）晶体管的光伏电压生成。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究双层石墨烯（BLG）晶体管在兆赫兹辐射下的光伏电压生成机制，特别是通过调谐p-n结和等离子的激发来理解其光电特性。

Method: 通过实验测量和理论计算，研究了p-n结加热引起的温差电效应以及二维等离子的激发对光伏电压的影响。

Result: 观察到光伏电压主要由p-n结加热引起的温差电效应驱动，并发现了在0.13 THz频率下激发的二维等离子的特征振荡，该等离子共振由带隙打开导致的载流子浓度降低所激活，并引起了电磁场的局域增强和载流子温度升高。

Conclusion: 双层石墨烯（BLG）晶体管在兆赫兹辐射下，通过调谐p-n结和利用低频等离子共振，可以实现有效的光伏电压生成，其光电响应与载流子浓度和电磁场局域增强密切相关。

Abstract: We present a combined experimental and theoretical study of photovoltage generation in a bilayer graphene (BLG) transistor structure exposed to subterahertz radiation. The device features a global bottom and split top gate, enabling independent control of the band gap and Fermi level, thereby enabling the formation of a tunable p-n junction in graphene. Measurements show that the photovoltage arises primarily through a thermoelectric mechanism driven by heating of the p-n junction in the middle of the channel. We also provide a theoretical justification for the excitation of two-dimensional plasmons at a record-low frequency of 0.13 THz, which manifests itself as characteristic oscillations in the measured photovoltage. These plasmonic resonances, activated by a decrease in charge carrier concentration due to opening of the band gap, lead to a local enhancement of the electromagnetic field and an increase in the carrier temperature in the junction region. The record-low frequency of plasmon resonance is enabled by the low carrier density achievable in the bilayer graphene upon electrical induction of the band gap.

</details>


### [346] [Controlling the Size of Nanoparticles Using a Magnetic Field: A Sphere Packing Approach](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06911)
*Yazeed Tawalbeh,Marwa Ghazi,Mauro Fernandes Pereira*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 通过外加磁场调控纳米颗粒尺寸。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 提出一个结合了第一性原理热力学和球体堆积方法的分析框架，用于预测和控制纳米颗粒尺寸。

Method: 该模型以顺磁性银纳米颗粒为校准对象，建立了半径和磁场之间的一对一函数关系，重现了最可能尺寸的转变。

Result: 该模型在经典毛细管和球形退磁的限制下，展示了磁场降低成核势垒并使分布趋向于更小尺寸颗粒。

Conclusion: 该方法可以推广到顺磁性和顺磁性体系，并讨论了铁磁性有序纳米颗粒的局限性。

Abstract: We present an analytical framework that predicts and controls nanoparticle size through external magnetic fields, uniting first-principles thermodynamics with a sphere packing approach. Calibrated to diamagnetic silver nanoparticles (20 nm at zero field and 5 nm at 250 mT), the model yields a closed-form relation between radius and field that reproduces the observed shift in most-probable size. Within the limits of classical capillarity and spherical demagnetization, the field lowers the nucleation barrier and drives the distribution toward smaller particles. Our results are robust for radii above 3 nm (5740 atoms). Below this scale non-extensive effects likely dominate, as discussed in detail in Supplementary Information. The approach generalizes to both diamagnetic and paramagnetic systems and the limitations expected for very small or ferromagnetically ordered nanoparticles are discussed.

</details>


### [347] [Non-local synchronization of continuous time crystals in a semiconductor](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06964)
*Alex Greilich,Nataliia E. Kopteva,Vladimir L. Korenev,Philipp A. Haude,Linus Kunze,Ben W. Grobecker,Sergiu Anghel,Markus Betz,Manfred Bayer*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 在半导体中，空间分离的自振荡电子-核自旋系统可以通过光泵浦实现同步，证明了长程相干耦合的存在，并为相干自旋网络的构建提供了基础。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 长久以来，弱耦合系统中个体元素的同步化并产生统一的集体行为一直吸引着科学家们，例如耦合摆钟的周期性振荡到生物体节律性行为。

Method: 通过光学泵浦空间上相距最远可达40微米的自振荡电子-核自旋系统，观察并分析它们的频率锁定现象，并研究同步行为与距离的关系。

Result: 当两个振荡器之间的距离在40微米以内时，它们各自不同的频率会锁定在共同值，证明了长程相干耦合。当距离超过该值时，同步行为会中断。相互作用距离与电子自旋扩散长度一致，表明自旋输运是耦合的介导机制，并在介观尺度上建立了相位相干性。

Conclusion: 大面积光泵浦可以驱动同一光照区域内的所有振荡器进入单一同步状态，即使它们存在不均匀性。这种同步现象解释了最终自振荡异常的稳定性，实现了分布式自旋系统中集体运动的可能性，并为自旋电子学中的相干自旋网络铺平了道路。

Abstract: Synchronization resulting in unified collective behavior of the individual elements of a system that are weakly coupled to each other has long fascinated scientists. Examples range from the periodic oscillation of coupled pendulum clocks to the rhythmic behavior in biological systems. Here we demonstrate this effect in a solid-state platform: spatially remote, auto-oscillating electron-nuclear spin systems in a semiconductor. When two such oscillators separated by up to 40 $μ$m are optically pumped, their individually different frequencies lock to a common value, revealing long-range coherent coupling. For larger separations, the synchronization breaks. The interaction distance matches the electron spin diffusion length, identifying spin transport as the coupling-mediating mechanism and establishing phase coherence over mesoscopic distances. As a consequence, a wide-area optical pump drives all oscillators within the illuminated spot into a single synchronized state, despite their inhomogeneity. This synchronization accounts for the exceptional stability of the resulting auto-oscillations, enabling collective motion in distributed spin systems and paving the way toward coherent spin networks in spintronics.

</details>


### [348] [Synchronizing microwave cQED limit-cycle oscillators](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07140)
*Cecilie Hermansen,Jens Paaske*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 超导微波谐振器耦合的双量子点（DQD）驱动耗散电子-光子混合系统在临界电子-光子耦合值下会发生霍普夫分岔，产生持续的极限环振荡。当频率失谐足够小时，两个这样的谐振器可以通过同一电压偏置的DQD实现同步。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究有源组件在量子领域中的重要性，重点是自持振荡器在复杂动力系统稳定和同步中的作用。

Method: 通过微扰理论推导非线性光子Keldysh作用量，并从产生的鞍点和Fokker-Planck方程分析极限环动力学。在无限偏置电压的马尔可夫极限下，将结果与DQD谐振器系统的Lindblad主方程的解进行比较。

Result: 在临界电子-光子耦合值下，实现了持续的极限环振荡。当频率失谐足够小时，两个谐振器通过DQD实现了同步，并且极限环动力学结果与Lindblad主方程的解相符。

Conclusion: 该研究探索了驱动耗散电子-光子混合系统的性质，并证明了其在稳定和同步复杂动力学系统中的潜力。

Abstract: Self-sustained oscillators play a central role in the stabilization and synchronization of complex dynamical systems. A number of different physical systems are currently being investigated to clarify the importance of such active components in the quantum realm. Here we explore the properties of a driven dissipative electron-photon hybrid system based on superconducting microwave resonators coupled resonantly to a voltage-biased double quantum dot (DQD). First, we establish a Hopf bifurcation at a critical value of the electron-photon coupling, beyond which an effective negative friction sustains steady limit-cycle oscillations of individual resonators. Second, we show that two such limit-cycle resonators coupled via the same voltage-biased DQD synchronize for small enough frequency detuning. A nonlinear photon Keldysh action is derived by perturbation theory in the effective circuit fine-structure constant, and the limit-cycle dynamics is analyzed in terms of resulting saddle-point, and Fokker-Planck equations. In the Markovian limit of infinite bias voltage, these results are shown to agree well with the solution of a corresponding Lindblad master equation for the DQD resonator system.

</details>


### [349] [Complementary and Asymmetric Tapered Bent Mid-Infrared Waveguide Arrays for Subwavelength-Pitch Integration and Crosstalk Minimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07141)
*Humaira Zafar,Mauro Fernandes Pereira*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本研究提出了一种新型的互补和非对称锥形欧拉形弯曲波导阵列设计，用于中红外（MIR）光子集成电路，实现了亚波长间距集成并显著降低了串扰。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了实现亚波长间距集成并减少中红外波导阵列的串扰，以提高光学相控阵（OPA）的效率和优化光传播。

Method: 设计了一种采用互补和非对称锥形欧拉形弯曲的新型波导阵列，并进行了3D有限时域差分法仿真，分析了其在硅基绝缘体平台上的性能。

Result: 在3.1至3.6微米波长范围内，串扰降低到30分贝以下，并且对制造误差具有良好的容忍度，实现了低串扰和低插入损耗。

Conclusion: 该设计提供了一种稳健且与CMOS兼容的中红外集成光子电路解决方案。

Abstract: This paper delivers the first report of a mid-infrared (MIR) waveguide array design that employs complementary and asym- metric tapered Euler-shaped bends. These provide greater fabrication flexibility to achieve subwavelength-pitch integration while reducing crosstalk to below 30 dB across the 3.1 to 3.6 micron wavelength range. Unlike previous designs, which main- tained constant waveguide widths, the Euler waveguide bends are characterized by asymmetric and complementary tapered waveguide widths. This approach significantly reduces crosstalk to below 30 dB for both the first and second neighboring waveguides across a 500 nm wavelength range, enhancing the efficiency of optical phased arrays (OPA) with a large field of view, optimizing light propagation and minimizing crosstalk. The waveguide array is fabricated on a silicon-on-insulator platform, with a 2-micron buried oxide layer and a 500 nm-thick silicon layer. The design is highly tolerant to fabrication variations, maintaining consistent performance even with width variations. The spectral responses, simulated using the 3D finite-difference time-domain method, demonstrate negligible coupling and low insertion loss across the wavelength range. This work offers a robust and CMOS-compatible solution for MIR integrated photonic circuits.

</details>


### [350] [Direct imaging of magnetotransport at graphene-metal interfaces with a single-spin quantum sensor](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07181)
*C. Ding,M. L. Palm,K. Kohli,T. Taniguchi,K. Watanabe,C. L. Degen*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本研究使用扫描单自旋量子磁力计在石墨烯-金属混合器件中实现了纳米尺度的磁输运成像，直接观测到洛伦兹偏转效应，并揭示了器件的复杂输运机制和界面接触电阻的空间变化。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 大多数磁输运研究仅限于宏观电阻测量，缺乏对空间输运模式的微观细节的直接认识。因此，开发能够提供纳米尺度输运信息的成像技术至关重要。

Method: 使用扫描单自旋量子磁力计对石墨烯-金属混合器件在室温和约0.5T的磁场下进行纳米尺度磁输运成像，结合局部电流分布和全局电阻测量。

Result: 直接观测到石墨烯-金属界面附近的洛伦兹偏转效应；揭示器件的输运性质受本征磁阻、载流子流体力学、界面电阻和纳米器件几何结构的复杂相互作用控制；能够定量绘制接触电阻的空间变化。

Conclusion: 本研究展示了纳米尺度电流成像技术在研究难以通过电阻测量探测的复杂电子输运现象方面的潜力。

Abstract: Magnetotransport underlines many important phenomena in condensed matter physics, such as the Hall effect and magnetoresistance (MR) effect. Thus far, most magnetotransport studies are based on bulk resistance measurements without direct access to microscopic details of the spatial transport pattern. Here, we report nanoscale imaging of magnetotransport using a scanning single-spin quantum magnetometer, which is demonstrated in a graphene-metal hybrid device at room temperature. By visualizing the current flow at elevated magnetic fields (~0.5 T), we directly observe the Lorentz deflection of current near the graphene-metal interface, which is a hallmark of magnetotransport. Combining the local current distribution with global resistance measurements, we reveal that transport properties of the hybrid are governed by a complex interplay of intrinsic MR around the Dirac cone, carrier hydrodynamics, interface resistance, and the nanoscale device geometry. Furthermore, accessing the local transport pattern across the interface enables quantitative mapping of spatial variations in contact resistance, which is commonly present in electronic devices made from two-dimensional materials yet non-trivial to characterize. Our work demonstrates the potential of nanoscale current imaging techniques for studying complex electronic transport phenomena that are difficult to probe by resistance-based measurements.

</details>


### [351] [Controlling Quantum Transport in a Superconducting Device via Dissipative Baths](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07196)
*S. V. Aksenov,M. S. Shustin,I. S. Burmistrov*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本文研究了与正常费米库耦合的耗散超导系统的谱和输运性质，并推导了Meir-Wingreen公式和Onsager矩阵的推广形式。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究了量子场论方法中二次Liouvillian在Keldysh等时线相干态基下的演化，重点关注耗散超导系统与正常费米库的耦合效应。

Method: 推导了Meir-Wingreen公式和Onsager矩阵的推广形式，利用Kirchhoff规则得到耗散引起的损耗电流表达式，并构建了修正的量子动力学方程。

Result: 在宽带接触且局部耦合的情况下，每个接触会使非平衡稳态的简并度减少一半。通过对扩展Kitaev模型在对称点和单接触情况下的数值验证，证实了这些结果。在线性响应和低温条件下，证明了（非）简并的非平衡稳态对应（非）量化的电导峰。

Conclusion: 在Kitaev模型的Majorana模式的共振输运问题中，发现耗散效应导致了零偏压峰的抑制及其不对称性。

Abstract: Within the quantum field-theoretical approach describing the evolution of a quadratic Liouvillian in the basis of Keldysh contour coherent states, we investigate the spectral and transport properties of a dissipative superconducting system coupled to normal Fermi reservoirs. We derive a generalization of the Meir-Wingreen formula and Onsager matrix for a superconducting system subject to an arbitrary number of fermionic baths. Following Kirchhoff's rule, we obtain an expression describing the dissipation induced loss current and formulate modified quantum kinetic equations. For wide-band contacts locally coupled to individual sites, we find that each contact reduces the degeneracy multiplicity of the non-equilibrium steady state by one. These results are numerically verified through several cases of the extended Kitaev model at symmetric points with a single contact. Furthermore, in the linear response regime at low temperatures, we demonstrate that (non-)degenerate non-equilibrium steady states correspond to (non-)quantized conductance peaks. Revisiting a paradigmatic problem of resonant transport in the Majorana mode of the Kitaev model we demonstrate that the dissipation accounts for the zero-bias peak suppression and its asymmetry.

</details>


### [352] [Optically-Induced Faraday-Goldstone Waves](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07320)
*Daniel Kaplan,Pavel A. Volkov,Andrea Cavalleri,Premala Chandra*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 光学脉冲能在有序量子固体中产生类似于法拉第波的现象，这种现象比泵浦时间尺度持续的时间长得多。这是一种由对称性破缺态内的超快光-物质相互作用驱动的现象，其中希格斯（幅度）和戈德斯通（相位）模式之间的动力学非线性耦合驱动着一个新兴的、在空间和时间上振荡的相位纹理：法拉第-戈德斯通波。计算出的这种时空序的特征与在 K$_{0.3}$MnO$_{3}$ 上的测量结果吻合良好，并且还预测了与这两种模式之间相干能量交换相关的希格斯-戈德斯通节拍。这种光生晶体状态对热噪声具有鲁棒性，即使原始的戈德斯通模式不具备这种鲁棒性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究的动机是在有序量子固体中观察和解释类似于法拉第波的现象，这些现象是由超快激光脉冲引起的，并且比泵浦持续时间长得多。

Method: 研究采用理论方法，研究了对称性破缺态内的超快光-物质相互作用。具体来说，通过分析动力学非线性耦合驱动的希格斯（幅度）和戈德斯通（相位）模式，以及由此产生的时空有序的相位纹理（法拉第-戈德斯通波），并将其与 K$_{0.3}$MnO$_{3}$ 的实验测量结果进行比较。

Result: 理论计算表明，光学脉冲可以在有序量子固体中产生持续时间比泵浦时间尺度长得多的法拉第波类似现象（法拉第-戈德斯通波）。计算出的特征与 K$_{0.3}$MnO$_{3}$ 的实验测量结果吻合良好，并预测了希格斯-戈德斯通节拍现象。此外，研究表明这种光生晶体状态对热噪声具有鲁棒性。

Conclusion: 本研究揭示了光学脉冲能在有序量子固体中驱动形成一种新的时空有序状态（法拉第-戈德斯通波），这种状态具有持久性且对热噪声鲁棒。这为了解和设计量子材料中的周期性结构提供了新途径。

Abstract: Faraday waves, typically observed in driven fluids, result from the confluence of nonlinearity and parametric amplification. Here we show that optical pulses can generate analogous phenomena that persist much longer than the pump time-scales in ordered quantum solids. We present a theory of ultrafast light-matter interactions within a symmetry-broken state; dynamical nonlinear coupling between the Higgs (amplitude) and the Goldstone (phase) modes drives an emergent phason texture that oscillates in space and in time: Faraday-Goldstone waves. Calculated signatures of this spatiotemporal order compare well with measurements on K$_{0.3}$MnO$_{3}$; Higgs-Goldstone beating, associated with coherent energy exchange between these two modes, is also predicted. We show this light-generated crystalline state is robust to thermal noise, even when the original Goldstone mode is not. Our results offer a new pathway for the design of periodic structures in quantum materials with ultrafast light pulses.

</details>


### [353] [Weak localization and universal conductance fluctuations in large area twisted bilayer graphene](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07334)
*Spenser Talkington,Debarghya Mallick,An-Hsi Chen,Benjamin F. Mead,Seong-Jun Yang,Cheol-Joo Kim,Shaffique Adam,Liang Wu,Matthew Brahlek,Eugene J. Mele*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本研究首次在扭曲双层石墨烯中观察到弱局域化现象，并分析了其相位相干长度和谷间散射长度，确定了导致退相干的机制为电子-电子散射，以及由点缺陷引起的谷间散射。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究高度p型掺杂的大面积扭曲双层石墨烯在不同扭转角度下的磁输运性质，特别是发现在扭曲双层石墨烯中存在弱局域化现象，并探究了导致退相干的机制和谷间散射的原因。

Method: 测量了不同扭转角度（1°至20°）的扭曲双层石墨烯样品的磁输运性质，提取了相位相干长度和谷间散射长度，并分析了普适电导涨落。

Result: 所有样品均表现出弱局域化现象，并成功提取了相位相干长度和谷间散射长度。研究表明，电子-电子散射是导致退相干的主要原因，而点缺陷则引起谷间散射。在靠近范霍夫奇点的9°样品中观察到普适电导涨落的迹象。

Conclusion: 扭曲双层石墨烯中的弱局域化现象为研究电子散射机制提供了新的途径。通过对相位相干长度和谷间散射长度的分析，揭示了电子-电子散射和点缺陷在退相干和谷间散射中的作用。未来在提高样品质量和应用于大面积莫尔材料方面，将为观察量子干涉效应开辟新的可能性。

Abstract: We study diffusive magnetotransport in highly p-doped large area twisted bilayer graphene samples as a function of twist angle, crossing from 1° (below), to 20° (above) the van Hove singularity with 7° and 9° samples near the van Hove singularity. We report weak localization in twisted bilayer graphene for the first time. All samples exhibit weak localization, from which we extract the phase coherence length and intervalley scattering lengths, and from that determine that dephasing is caused by electron-electron scattering and intervalley scattering is caused by point defects. We observe signatures of universal conductance fluctuations in the 9° sample, which has high mobility and is near the van Hove singularity. Further improvements in sample quality and applications to large area moire materials will open new avenues to observe quantum interference effects.

</details>


### [354] [The ideal limit of rhombohedral graphene: Interaction-induced layer-skyrmion lattices and their collective excitations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07402)
*Tixuan Tan,Patrick J. Ledwith,Trithep Devakul*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 在理想的菱形石墨烯多层结构中，短程排斥力可以稳定产生有效磁场和陈氏能带的层赝自旋斯格明子晶格，揭示了相互作用驱动的菱形石墨烯拓扑的实空间起源。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本文旨在探究理想菱形石墨烯多层结构中的相互作用如何驱动拓扑现象，特别是斯格明子晶格的形成及其产生的效应。

Method: 通过解析方法研究短程排斥力如何稳定层赝自旋斯格明子晶格，并分析该晶格产生的有效磁场和陈氏能带。

Result: 发现了短程排斥力可以稳定形成层赝自旋斯格明子晶格，该晶格能产生有效磁场并形成陈氏能带，揭示了相互作用驱动的拓扑在菱形石墨烯中的实空间起源。

Conclusion: 相互作用诱导的斯格明子晶格在物理上类似于磁斯格明子晶体，并能产生一系列集体激发，这些激发可以通过斯格明子晶格动力学框架来描述。

Abstract: We introduce an ideal limit of rhombohedral graphene multilayers. In this limit, we show analytically how short-range repulsion stabilizes a layer-pseudospin skyrmion lattice, which generates an effective magnetic field and gives rise to a Chern band. This establishes the real-space origin of interaction-driven topology in moiré rhombohedral graphene. The resulting interaction-induced skyrmion lattice is physically analogous to magnetic skyrmion crystals and hosts a hierarchy of collective excitations naturally described within the framework of skyrmion-lattice dynamics.

</details>

### [355] [Simulating Clifford Circuits with Gaussian Elimination](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06127)
*Yuchen Pang,Edgar Solomonik*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: Clifford circuits, a powerful subclass of quantum circuits, can be efficiently simulated using Gaussian elimination on a modified adjacency matrix. This method, based on ZX-calculus and tensor networks, provides a concise formula for amplitudes and leads to improved algorithms for strong and weak simulation, especially when leveraging fast matrix multiplication.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Clifford circuits exhibit significant quantum effects like entanglement and are more powerful than classical circuits, yet they can be simulated efficiently. This work aims to develop efficient algorithms for simulating Clifford circuits by leveraging their structure.

Method: The paper presents an algorithm that simulates Clifford circuits by applying Gaussian elimination to a modified adjacency matrix derived from the circuit's structure. This approach utilizes a ZX-calculus tensor network representation, reducing Clifford circuits to quantum graph states. A concise formula for graph state amplitudes is derived using LDL decomposition over GF(2), enabling efficient algorithms for strong and weak simulation through tree-decomposition-based fast LDL algorithms and Strassen-like matrix multiplication.

Result: The proposed algorithm achieves state-of-the-art complexity for weak graph state simulation and improves the state-of-the-art for strong graph state simulation by incorporating fast matrix multiplication. It is also efficient for computing multiple amplitudes or samples of a Clifford circuit. Additionally, the amplitude formula offers a new way to characterize locally Clifford equivalent graph states and facilitates an efficient protocol for learning graph states with low-rank adjacency matrices.

Conclusion: The paper successfully develops an efficient simulation algorithm for Clifford circuits, offering theoretical and practical advancements in both weak and strong simulation, particularly for graph states with low-rank adjacency matrices. The findings contribute to a better understanding and manipulation of these important quantum circuits.

Abstract: Quantum circuits are considered more powerful than classical circuits and require exponential resources to simulate classically. Clifford circuits are a special class of quantum circuits that can be simulated in polynomial time but still show important quantum effects such as entanglement. In this work, we present an algorithm that simulates Clifford circuits by performing Gaussian elimination on a modified adjacency matrix derived from the circuit structure. Our work builds on an ZX-calculus tensor network representation of Clifford circuits that reduces to quantum graph states. We give a concise formula of amplitudes of graph states based on the LDL decomposition of matrices over GF(2), and use it to get efficient algorithms for strong and weak simulation of Clifford circuits using tree-decomposition-based fast LDL algorithm. The complexity of our algorithm matches the state of art for weak graph state simulation and improves the state of art for strong graph state simulation by taking advantage of Strassen-like fast matrix multiplication. Our algorithm is also efficient when computing many amplitudes or samples of a Clifford circuit. Further, our amplitudes formula provides a new characterization of locally Clifford equivalent graph states as well as an efficient protocol to learn graph states with low-rank adjacency matrices.

</details>


### [356] [Semi-device-independent randomness certification on discretized continuous-variable platforms](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05672)
*Moisés Alves,Vitor L. Sena,Santiago Zamora,Tailan S. Sarubi,A. de Oliveira Junior,Alexandre B. Tacla,Rafael Chaves*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本研究提出了一种适用于连续可变光学系统的半独立式量子随机数生成认证方案，即使存在实际损耗和参考系不对齐也能实现高维性验证，从而保证了量子随机数的生成。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的连续可变光学系统在认证真正量子随机数方面存在挑战，需要一种新的方法来克服这些困难。

Method: 提出了一种半独立式方案，通过限制状态制备在二维Fock子空间来操作化实现维度假设。使用标准的测角和位移测量，并考虑了实际损耗和参考系不对齐的影响。

Result: 实现了维度见证违规，证明了即使在存在损耗和参考系不对齐的情况下，也能保证正的最小熵，从而认证了量子随机数。

Conclusion: 该方案展示了在连续可变光学平台上，利用简单的光学设置和最小的实验复杂度，可以实现实用且可扩展的量子随机数生成。

Abstract: Randomness is fundamental for secure communication and information processing. While continuous-variable optical systems offer an attractive platform for this task, certifying genuine quantum randomness in such setups remains challenging. We present a semi-device-independent scheme for randomness certification tailored to continuous-variable implementations, where the dimension assumption is operationally implemented by restricting state preparations to the two-level Fock subspace. Using standard homodyne and displacement-based measurements, we show that simple optical setups can achieve dimension-witness violations that certify positive min-entropy, even in the presence of realistic losses and misaligned reference frames. These results demonstrate that practical and scalable quantum randomness generation is achievable with minimal experimental complexity on continuous-variable platforms.

</details>


### [357] [Adiabatic state preparation from general initial states](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05689)
*Bryce Fuller,Mario Motta,Stuart M. Harwood,Chetan Murthy,Tanvi P. Gujarati,Antonio Mezzacapo,Dimitar Trenev*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种启发式方法，通过构造一个初始波函数和目标哈密顿量之间的绝热路径来改进量子计算中哈密顿量基态的近似制备。该方法通过近似初始波函数的父哈密顿量来实现，并且可以在运行绝热状态制备算法之前检查近似的质量。研究人员将此技术应用于模拟水分子和亚甲基的基态，并使用不同的初始波函数作为绝热路径的起点。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 量子计算算法在制备近似哈密顿量基态方面有多种，本研究旨在探讨如何利用绝热状态制备（ASP）来进一步改进这些近似。具体来说，研究关注于如何从一个通用的初始波函数出发，构建一条绝热路径，以期获得更精确的基态近似。

Method: 提出了一种启发式方法，用于构建从通用初始波函数到目标哈密顿量基态的绝热路径。该方法的核心是近似初始波函数的父哈密顿量，从而能够构造一条连接初始波函数和目标哈密顿量之间演化的路径。在执行ASP算法之前，可以评估此父哈密顿量近似的质量。

Result: 将提出的方法应用于模拟水分子和亚甲基的基态，并使用了多种初始波函数作为ASP的起点，以验证该方法的有效性。

Conclusion: 所提出的启发式方法能够为给定的初始波函数和目标哈密顿量构造一条绝热路径，从而改进基态近似的质量。通过对水分子和亚甲基的模拟结果表明，该方法在实际应用中具有潜力。

Abstract: A variety of quantum computing algorithms exist for the preparation of approximate Hamiltonian ground states. A natural and important question is how these ground-state approximations can be further improved using adiabatic state preparation. Here, we present a heuristic method to carry out adiabatic state preparation starting from a generic initial wavefunction. Given a quantum circuit that prepares the initial wavefunction, and a target Hamiltonian for which one wishes to prepare the ground state, we present an algorithm to construct an adiabatic path between these two states. This method works by approximating a parent Hamiltonian for the initial wavefunction, and the quality of this approximation can be can be checked prior to running the ASP algorithm. We apply this technique to simulate the ground state of water and the lowest-lying multireference singlet state of methylene, using various initial wavefunctions as the starting point of the adiabatic path.

</details>


### [358] [Color code thresholds under circuit-level noise beyond the Pauli framework](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05719)
*Francesco Pio Barone,Daniel Jaschke,Ilaria Siloi,Simone Montangero*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该研究评估了量子纠错码在有噪声量子电路中纠错的能力，并提出了一种超越传统泡利噪声模型的通用噪声模型。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的泡利噪声模型虽然便于模拟，但未能完全捕捉真实量子系统中的物理错误机制。因此，需要探索更通用的噪声模型来评估量子纠错码的性能。

Method: 研究人员提出了一种新的噪声建模方法，将非泡利错误通道（如X旋转和幅度阻尼）引入到量子比特层面，并使用张量网络（Tree Tensor Network ansatz）进行模拟。

Result: 模拟结果表明，该方法可以准确估计量子纠错码在非泡利噪声下的阈值，甚至可以达到距离d=7（73个量子比特）的规模。研究还发现，相干过旋转错误比泡利扭转近似的预测产生更高的错误率，并且这种偏差随着代码距离的增加而增大。

Conclusion: 该研究成功地扩展了量子纠错码的噪声建模能力，证明了在更真实的噪声模型下评估量子纠错码性能的可行性，并揭示了非泡利噪声对纠错性能的影响。

Abstract: A quantum error correction code is assessed over its ability to correct errors in noisy quantum circuits. This task requires extensive simulations of faulty quantum circuits, which are often made tractable by considering stochastic Pauli noise models, as they are compatible with efficient classical simulation techniques. However, such noise models do not fully capture the variety of physical error mechanisms encountered in realistic quantum platforms. In this work, we extend circuit-level noise modeling beyond the Pauli framework by estimating the threshold of the color code under more general noise models. Specifically, we consider two representative non-Pauli error channels: a systematic $X$-rotation model that introduces coherent over-rotations, and an amplitude damping channel that captures relaxation processes. These models are incorporated at the circuit level into color code circuits using a Tree Tensor Network ansatz. Our simulations demonstrate that tensor network simulations enable accurate threshold estimation under non-Pauli noise for color codes up to distance $d=7$ (73 qubits). Comparing our results with the Pauli twirling approximations of the noise models, we find that coherent over-rotations yield systematically higher error rates, deviating from the Pauli twirling approximation as the code distance increases.

</details>


### [359] [Quantum Nanophotonic Interface for Tin-Vacancy Centers in Thin-Film Diamond](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05740)
*Hope Lee,Hannah C. Kleidermacher,Abigail J. M. Stein,Hyunseok Oh,Lillian B. Hughes Wyatt,Casey K. Kim,Luca Basso,Andrew M. Mounce,Yongqiang Wang,Shei S. Su,Michael Titze,Ania C. Bleszynski Jayich,Jelena Vučković*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 金-空位（SnV-）中心在金刚石中是优异的固态量子比特，具有光学可寻址跃迁和高温下长电子自旋相干时间。然而，实现具有高保真度电子自旋态光学读出的可扩展量子节点，需要从系统中进行高效的光子发射和收集。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本手稿报告了一个基于金刚石薄膜中一维光子晶体腔的 SnV- 质子的量子光子接口。

Method: 我们开发了一个描述系统自发发射动力学的模型，可以严格确定 SnV- 零声子线 C 和 D 跃迁的 Purcell 因子和 C/D 分支比，通过腔增强。

Result: 我们观察到整个样品的品质因数高达约 6000，并测量到寿命减少高达 12 倍。通过独立考虑 C 和 D 跃迁的寿命减少，我们将 C/D 分支比确定为 ηBR=0.7815，这与之前的理论和实验结果一致。最后，通过我们的分析，我们提取了单个 SnV- 跃迁的 Purcell 因子，最高可达 Fc=26.21(0.01)。

Conclusion: 本研究报告了一个用于 SnV- 质子的量子光子接口，并确定了其光学特性，为构建可扩展的量子节点奠定了基础。

Abstract: The negatively charged tin-vacancy center in diamond (SnV-) is an excellent solid state qubit with optically-addressable transitions and a long electron spin coherence time at elevated temperatures. However, implementing scalable quantum nodes with high-fidelity optical readout of the electron spin state requires efficient photon emission and collection from the system. In this manuscript, we report a quantum photonic interface for SnV- centers based on one-dimensional photonic crystal cavities fabricated in diamond thin films. Furthermore, we develop a model describing the spontaneous emission dynamics of our system, allowing for rigorous determination of Purcell factors and the C/D branching ratio from cavity enhancement of the C and D transitions of the SnV- zero phonon line. We observe quality factors up to ~6000 across this sample, and measure up to a 12-fold lifetime reduction. By considering the lifetime reduction of both the C and D transitions independently, we determine the C/D branching ratio to be ηBR=0.7815, in line with previous theoretical and experimental findings. Finally from our analysis, we extract a Purcell factor of up to Fc=26.21(0.01) for a single SnV- transition.

</details>


### [360] [Contrasting GHZ and W-state Entanglement Dynamics due to Correlated Markov Noise](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05827)
*Stephen Brockerhoff,Brittany Corn-Agostini*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 通过利用噪声源之间的可调统计相关性，我们提出了一种半经典模型，可以显著减缓或甚至完全阻止三比特纠缠态（GHZ 和 W 态）在马尔可夫噪声环境中的衰减，为保护量子相干性提供了新的途径。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在有噪声的环境中保持多方纠缠对于推进量子信息处理至关重要。

Method: 我们开发了一个半经典的理论模型，研究了三个纠缠量子比特在受到具有可调统计相关性的局部马尔可夫噪声环境影响时的行为。我们使用三方负熵作为纠缠度量，并推导了 GHZ 和 W 态的解析结果。

Result: 我们发现噪声源之间的相关性会显著影响多方纠缠的动力学，在某些情况下会减缓其衰减，甚至在理想条件下可以实现完全保持。分析确定了尽管存在环境相互作用，但仍可以维持多方纠缠的机制。

Conclusion: 噪声相关性可以作为保护多量子比特系统中量子相干性的资源，为在有噪声环境中保护多方纠缠提供了新的见解。

Abstract: The ability to preserve multipartite entanglement in noisy environments is central to advancing quantum information processing. In this work, we develop a semiclassical theoretical model of three entangled qubits exposed to local Markov noise environments with tunable statistical correlations between noise sources. We show that such correlations can significantly influence the dynamics of multipartite entanglement, in some cases slowing its decay and, under ideal conditions, even enabling full preservation. Using tripartite negativity as an entanglement measure, we derive analytical results for the GHZ and W states, demonstrating their contrasting responses to correlated and anticorrelated noise. Our analysis identifies regimes in which multipartite entanglement can be sustained despite environmental interactions, offering new insight into how noise correlations may serve as a resource for protecting quantum coherence in multi-qubit systems.

</details>


### [361] [Self-induced manipulation of biphoton entanglement in topologically distinct modes](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05835)
*Wei-Wei Zhang,Chao Chen,Jizhou Wu*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: Biphoton states are useful for quantum information processing. This paper presents a method to control the topological properties of biphoton entanglement using nonlinear waveguides and lattice structures. The method allows for the generation of topological biphoton states and can be implemented experimentally.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Generating and manipulating biphoton entanglement in topologically distinct modes is crucial for quantum information processing applications.

Method: The proposed method combines nonlinearity in waveguide coupling materials and waveguide lattice structures to regulate topological properties. It utilizes self-induced manipulation on pump-dependent nonlinear couplings on defects, incorporating nonlinear gain/loss and third-order Kerr nonlinearity. Pump power is the controllable parameter for manipulating topology and generating biphoton entanglement.

Result: The paper demonstrates the generation of topological biphoton states with injected pump activation on topologically trivial modes through nonlinear couplings on defects. It also presents an experimental proposal and discusses generalization to other SSH models and platforms.

Conclusion: The presented method enables the generation of topological biphoton states by controlling topological properties via nonlinear waveguide couplings. This method enhances the reusability and versatility of SSH lattice chips, paving the way for fault-tolerant quantum information processing and the industrialization of quantum technology.

Abstract: Biphoton states have shown promising applications in quantum information processing, including quantum communications, quantum metrology, and quantum imaging. The generation and manipulation of biphoton entanglement in topologically distinct modes paves the way in this direction. Here we present a comprehensive method for regulating the topological properties of the system by combining the nonlinearity in waveguides, i.e., nonlinearity in the waveguide coupling materials, and the waveguide lattice structure. Our method enables the generation of topological biphoton states with injected pump activation on the topologically trivial modes. This is realized through self-induced manipulation on pump-dependent nonlinear couplings on the defects, which is unable to be realized while there are no such nonlinear couplings. Specifically, by including the nonlinear gain/loss mechanism in the coupling between the nearest-neighbor waveguides and the third-order Kerr nonlinearity effect along the waveguides, the injected pump power will be the controllable parameter for the manipulation of the topology in the defect states and the generation of biphoton entanglement states. We also present an experimental proposal to realize our scheme and its generalization in the contemporaneous "active" topological photonics time-bin platforms. Our method can be used in other Su-Schrieffer-Heeger (SSH) models with various defect configurations. Our method enables the reusability and versatility of SSH lattice chips and their application for fault-tolerant quantum information processing, promoting the industrialization process of quantum technology.

</details>


### [362] [Ultranarrow Bright Single-Photon Emitters in Diamond with Strong Broadband Phonon Decoupling](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06184)
*Swetapadma Sahoo,Péter Udvarhelyi,Jaden Li,Darwon Kim,Viatcheslav Agafonov,Valery A. Davydov,Benjamin Lawrie,Prineha Narang,Simeon I. Bogdanov*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 通过研究一种新型单色心，我们克服了量子信息处理中声子耦合的限制，实现了创纪录的窄线宽和高亮度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 单色心与声子的相互作用限制了其相干性和可控性，阻碍了其在量子信息处理、通信和传感中的应用。

Method: 我们发现了一种新型单色心，其与声子环境的相互作用大大减弱。我们通过实验测量和模拟来表征这种单色心。

Result: 该单色心在室温下表现出创纪录的窄至0.3纳米的线宽，并具有稳定的高亮度发射，饱和时超过10 Mcps。此外，声子副带几乎完全被抑制，只有一个位于金刚石声子带之外的局部振动模式。

Conclusion: 这种新型单色心具有独特的声子解耦机制，有望在量子网络、纳米传感等领域实现更高性能的应用，并为研究振动态相关的物理资源提供了新的方向。

Abstract: Single-photon emitters are fundamental building blocks for quantum information processing, communication and sensing. However, unwanted interactions with bulk phonons in their host environment strongly limit their coherence and controllability. We report single color centers in nanodiamonds that are strongly and comprehensively decoupled from the bulk phononic environment. The color centers feature record-narrow linewidths down to 0.3 nm at room temperature and stable, bright emission, exceeding 10 Mcps in saturation. Notably, the bulk phonon sideband is almost entirely suppressed, revealing the presence of a single localized vibrational mode outside the diamond phonon band. Our observations and simulations point towards a unique mechanism for phonon decoupling in common wide-gap materials, based on a strongly radiative orbital transition coupled to a localized vibrational mode. The new color center enables qualitatively higher performance for applications in quantum networks and nanoscale sensing, and the exploration of new physical resources associated with vibrational states.

</details>


### [363] [Optimizing the charging of quantum batteries via shortcuts to adiabaticity](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05848)
*Sh. Ebrahimi,S. Salimi,F. T. Tabesh,A. S. Khorashad*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本工作利用绝热路线捷径技术（STA）为开放量子电池充电，结果显示，与使用不随时间变化的驱动场充电相比，可提取功（ergotropy）可显著提高数倍。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 尽管在开放量子系统中实现绝热路线捷径（STA）仍具挑战性，但其在量子技术中的广泛应用和能够快速将系统导向目标态的能力，激发了在量子能量存储领域探索其潜力的兴趣。

Method: 利用绝热路线捷径（STA）技术为开放量子电池充电。

Result: 与使用不随时间变化的驱动场充电相比，可提取功（ergotropy）可显著提高数倍。

Conclusion: 研究结果有望加速开放量子系统动力学，并在高容量、高稳定性量子电池的开发中展现出应用前景。

Abstract: Although implementing shortcuts to adiabaticity (STA) in open quantum systems remains challenging due to the complex control schemes required for such systems, their powerful ability to rapidly steer the system toward target states and their widespread applicability in quantum technologies have motivated us to explore their potential in quantum energy storage. In this work, we employ STA techniques to charge an open quantum battery and demonstrate that the extractable work (Ergotropy) from such a battery can be significantly enhanced by several times compared to the case where the battery is charged using a time independent driving field. Our results pave the way for accelerating the dynamics of open quantum systems and suggest promising applications in the development of high-performance, stable quantum batteries.

</details>


### [364] [Tractable Infinite-Horizon Stochastic Model Predictive Control for Quantum Filtering via Eigenstate Reduction](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05916)
*Yunyan Lee,Ian R. Petersen,Daoyi Dong*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 提出了一种用于有限维量子系统的随机模型预测控制（SMPC）框架，通过利用量子轨迹的几乎确定特征，将无限期随机目标简化为可计算的保真度项，从而减少了计算量，并在多级和Ising系统上进行了验证。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为提高量子控制系统的鲁棒性，需要一种有效的SMPC方法。

Method: 利用量子轨迹的几乎确定特征，将无限期随机目标简化为可计算的保真度项，实现确定性滤波器传播和终端保真度评估，无需蒙特卡洛采样。

Result: 证明了SMPC框架的等效性和均值平方稳定性，并在多级和Ising系统上进行了验证，与基于采样的方法相比，具有良好的可扩展性。

Conclusion: 所提出的SMPC框架能够有效减少计算负担，同时保留了量子系统的随机动力学，并在实际量子系统中表现出良好的性能和可扩展性。

Abstract: Model predictive control has shown potential to enhance the robustness of quantum control systems. propose a tractable Stochastic Model Predictive Control (SMPC) framework for finite-dimensional quantum systems under continuous-time measurement and quantum filtering. Using the almost-sure eigenstate reduction of quantum trajectories, we prove that the infinite-horizon stochastic objective collapses to a fidelity term that is computable in closed form from the one-step averaged state. Consequently, the online SMPC step requires only deterministic propagation of the filter and a terminal fidelity evaluation. An advantage of this method is that it eliminates per-horizon Monte Carlo scenario sampling and significantly reduces computational load while retaining the essential stochastic dynamics. We establish equivalence and mean-square stability guarantees, and validate the approach on multi-level and Ising-type systems, demonstrating favorable scalability compared to sampling-based SMPC.

</details>


### [365] [Efficient integrated quantum memory for light](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05928)
*Ruo-Ran Meng,Pei-Xi Liu,Xiao Liu,Tian-Xiang Zhu,Peng-Jun Liang,Chao Zhang,Zhong-Yang Tang,Hong-Zhe Zhang,Jin-Ming Cui,Ming Jin,Zong-Quan Zhou,Chuan-Feng Li,Guang-Can Guo*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本研究展示了基于稀土离子掺杂晶体和阻抗匹配微腔的高效集成量子存储器，在两种新架构下实现了80.3%（相干光）和69.8%（单光子）的创纪录存储效率，并能存储20个时间模式，平均效率为51.3%。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 可扩展的量子网络和光子处理器需要高效率的集成光子存储器，但现有集成系统的存储效率低于27.8%。

Method: 在两种新架构下，使用掺杂稀土离子的晶体（Eu3+:Y2SiO5）与阻抗匹配的微腔耦合，实现了集成量子存储器。架构一：200微米薄膜与光纤微腔耦合。架构二：飞秒激光制造的波导腔。

Result: 实现了80.3(7)%（弱相干脉冲）和69.8(1.6)%（电信波长单光子）的创纪录存储效率，并存储了20个时间模式（平均效率51.3(2)%）。薄膜架构还实现了通过可变应力进行光谱可调的存储。

Conclusion: 该设备结合了高效率、多模容量和可调谐性，为可扩展量子中继器和芯片级光子处理器奠定了基础。

Abstract: Scalable implementation of quantum networks and photonic processors require integrated photonic memories with high efficiency, yet current integrated systems have been limited to storage efficiencies below 27.8%. Here, we demonstrate highly efficient integrated quantum memories based on rare-earth-iondoped crystals coupled with impedance-matched microcavities, realized in two novel architectures: 200-micrometer-thin membranes of Eu3+:Y2SiO5 integrated with fiber-based microcavities, and waveguide-based cavities fabricated using femtosecond lasers. Our approach achieves reliable integrated quantum storage with record efficiencies of 80.3(7)% for weak coherent pulses and 69.8(1.6)% for telecom-heralded single photons, alongside the storage of 20 temporal modes with an average efficiency of 51.3(2)%. Moreover, the thin-membrane Eu3+:Y2SiO5 architecture enables spectrally tunable efficient quantum storage via variable strain, providing a flexible interface for quantum networks. By combining high efficiency, large multimode capacity, and tunability, our devices establish a versatile hardware foundation for scalable quantum repeaters and chip-scale photonic processors.

</details>


### [366] [Wave-Particle-Mixedness Relationships Based on lp-norm Coherence](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05937)
*Wei-Ning Li,Ming Fang,Yuan-Hong Tao,Liu Sun,Shao-Ming Fei*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: lp-范数相干性可以衡量量子态的波动性和粒子性，并揭示了它们与混合度之间的权衡关系。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探究量子态的波动性、粒子性和混合度之间的关系。

Method: 基于lp-范数相干性，定义了粒子性的度量，并推导了波动性、粒子性和混合度之间的权衡关系。

Result: 对于1<=p<2，建立了关于lp-范数相干性上下界的两种波动性-粒子性-混合度权衡关系。

Conclusion: 这些权衡关系加深了对量子态波动性、粒子性和混合度之间内在联系的理解，并涵盖了现有的一些结果。

Abstract: We investigate the relationships among the wave property, particle property and mixedness of quantum states based on the lp-norm coherence. By conforming that the lp-norm coherence is an appropriate measure of wave property and introducing a measure of particle property based on the differences between the maximal l2-norm coherence and the general l2-norm coherence, we present tradeoff relationships among the wave, particle and mixedness of quantum states. For 1<= p <2, we establish two kinds of tradeoffs of the wave, particle and mixedness with respect to the upper and lower bounds of the lp-norm coherence given by the l2-norm coherence. These trade relations give rise to compressive understanding of the intrinsic connections among the wave, particle and mixedness of quantum states, and cover some existing results as particular ones.

</details>


### [367] [Recovery of optical losses with the Petz recovery map](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05941)
*Jinyan Chen,Minjeong Song,Valerio Scarani*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 论文研究了光学量子信息处理中由散射引起的信息丢失问题，并提出了Petz恢复图作为一种近似纠错方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决光学量子信息处理中由散射引起的信息丢失问题，特别是状态依赖的损失对量子态的退化。

Method: 研究和构建了单模损耗的Petz恢复图，并讨论了其物理直觉和实现方式。

Result: Petz恢复图的恢复性能优于用信念状态替换噪声状态的协议；当参考态与真实态相差较远时，不应使用Petz恢复图。

Conclusion: Petz恢复图在所考虑的恢复协议中接近最优，为解决光学量子信息处理中的信息丢失问题提供了一种有效方法。

Abstract: Optical systems are a main platform for quantum information processing, while a hidden challenge in these systems is information loss due to scattering into unmonitored modes, typically modeled as state-independent beam-splitter interactions. While such losses simply erase information encoded across modes, they directly degrade information encoded in the quantum state of a mode. Perfect correction of these Gaussian lossy channels with Gaussian operations alone is known to be impossible. In this work, we investigate the Petz recovery map as an approximate recovery. We construct the Petz recovery of single mode losses and its implementations. In particular, we show that the recovery performance of Petz recovery map is better than the recovery protocol that replaces the noisy state with the belief state. Also, when the reference state is far from the true state, it is better not to use the Petz recovery map but to leave the noisy state instead. We discuss the physical intuition of Petz recovery map and finally shows that it is near-optimal among the considered recovery protocols.

</details>


### [368] [Quantum-imaginarity-based quantum speed limit](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05957)
*Dong-Ping Xuan,Zhong-Xi Shen,Wen Zhou,Shao-Ming Fei,Zhi-Xi Wang*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本研究利用相对熵、迹距离和几何虚度等度量，探讨了量子虚度与量子速度极限之间的关系，并应用于退相干动力学、耗散动力学以及随机近似变换，为量子计算、量子控制和量子传感的设计提供了理论指导。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 量子速度极限限制了量子系统的演化时间，而本研究旨在探索量子虚度与量子速度极限之间的关系，以了解量子系统演化的基本约束。

Method: 研究利用相对熵、迹距离和几何虚度等度量来量化量子虚度，并将其与量子速度极限联系起来。此外，研究还分析了退相干动力学、耗散动力学以及随机近似变换等具体应用。

Result: 研究得出了量子速度极限的度量，这些度量为物理系统演化以获得或失去特定量子虚度的最短时间提供了下限。

Conclusion: 本研究提出的量子速度极限度量，为量子计算、量子控制和量子传感等领域的设计提供了潜在的应用价值，有助于设计更高效的量子系统。

Abstract: The quantum speed limit sets a fundamental restriction on the evolution time of quantum systems. We explore the relationship between quantum imaginarity and the quantum speed limit by utilizing measures such as relative entropy, trace distance, and geometric imaginarity. These speed limits define the fundamental constraints on the minimum time necessary for quantum systems to evolve under various dynamical processes. As applications the dephasing dynamics and dissipative dynamics are analyzed in detail. The quantum speed limit in stochastic-approximate transformations is also investigated. Our quantum speed limits provide lower bounds on how fast a physical system evolves to attain or lose certain imaginarity, with potential applications in efficient quantum computation designs, quantum control and quantum sensing.

</details>


### [369] [Photodiode quantum efficiency for 2-μm light in the signal band of gravitational wave detectors](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05961)
*Julian Gurs,Nils Sueltmann,Christian Darsow-Fromm,Sebastian Steinlechner,Roman Schnabel*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 在2微米激光波长下，需要新型光电二极管以满足引力波探测器的需求，因为现有技术在室温下存在暗噪声和效率问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 未来的引力波探测器可能会使用2微米激光，需要量子效率接近100%的光电二极管，同时考虑暗噪声的影响。

Method: 通过在不同温度下测试商用扩展InGaAs光电二极管的性能来表征其变化。

Result: 随着温度降低，暗噪声减小，但检测效率也单调下降。

Conclusion: 需要专门为引力波探测器设计2微米激光用的新型光电二极管。

Abstract: Quantum technologies with quantum correlated light require photodiodes with near-perfect `true' quantum efficiency, the definition of which adequately accounts for the photodiode dark noise. Future squeezed-light-enhanced gravitational wave detectors could in principle achieve higher sensitivities with a longer laser wavelength around 2 μm. Photodiodes made of extended InGaAs are available for this range, but the true quantum efficiency at room temperature and the low frequency band of gravitational waves is strongly reduced by dark noise. Here we characterize the change in performance of a commercial extended-InGaAs photodiode versus temperature. While the dark noise decreases as expected with decreasing temperature, the detection efficiency unfortunately also decreases monotonically. Our results indicate the need for a dedicated new design of photodiodes for gravitational wave detectors using 2-μm laser light.

</details>


### [370] [Tagged vector space, Part II: function space index and the implied functional integration measure](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05974)
*Filippus S. Roux*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该研究将量子态的定义从标记向量空间推广到包含时空和自旋自由度，并推导了相关的数学公理和生成泛函，最终证明了高斯泛函概率测度的唯一性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 将量子态的定义推广到更广泛的自由度，并研究其数学性质。

Method: 通过在标记向量空间中引入函数空间作为索引空间，推导了包含时空和自旋自由度的量子态定义。利用新引入的公理，推导了函数积分测度的生成泛函，并用其计算了高斯泛函的积分，最后验证了测度的唯一性。

Result: 得到了包含时空和自旋自由度的量子态表示方法，并推导了相应的数学公理和生成泛函。计算结果表明，对于高斯泛函概率分布，其函数积分测度满足Carleman条件，因此是唯一的。

Conclusion: 该研究成功地将量子态的定义从标记向量空间推广到包含时空和自旋自由度的情形，并为理解和计算这类量子系统提供了新的数学工具。证明了高斯泛函概率测度的唯一性，为该理论框架的严谨性提供了支持。

Abstract: The definition of quantum states in terms of tagged vector spaces is generalized to incorporate the spatiotemporal and spin degrees of freedom. Considering a tagged vector space where the index space is a function space, representing the additional degrees of freedom, we obtained axioms for the tags that include a completeness condition expressed in terms of a functional integral with an abstract functional integration measure. Using these axioms, we derive a generating functional for the moments of this functional integration measure. These moments are then used to evaluate the functional integrals of Gaussian functionals, leading to expressions in accordance with those obtained as generalizations of equivalent integrals over a finite number of integration variables. For a Gaussian functional used as a probability distributions, we show that its moments, obtained with this functional integration measure, satisfy Carleman's condition, indicating that the measure is unique.

</details>


### [371] [Beyond Penrose tensor diagrams with the ZX calculus: Applications to quantum computing, quantum machine learning, condensed matter physics, and quantum gravity](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06012)
*Quanlong Wang,Richard D. P. East,Razin A. Shaikh,Lia Yeh,Boldizsár Poór,Bob Coecke*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: Spin-ZX calculus 是一个形式化的图示语言，它是 Penrose 图和 binor calculus 的延伸，可应用于量子计算、量子机器学习、凝聚态物理和量子引力等领域。该演算将混合维 ZX calculus 与量子信息相结合，专门用于处理 SU(2) 系统的角动量量子理论，并能图示化地推导 Clebsch-Gordan 系数、自旋算符等基本概念。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 将 Penrose 图和 binor calculus 提升到一个形式化的图示语言层面，并展示其在多个科学领域的应用能力。

Method: 将 Spin-ZX calculus 嵌入到混合维 ZX calculus 中，使其成为一种量子信息风格的图示语言，用于角动量量子理论（SU(2) 表示论）。在此基础上，通过图示方法推导出 Clebsch-Gordan 系数、对称映射和自旋哈密顿量等基本自旋耦合对象。

Result: Spin-ZX calculus 被确立为一种强大的工具，用于以图形方式表示和计算 SU(2) 系统，揭示了基础关系的新见解，并为理论物理学中的新图示算法铺平了道路。

Conclusion: Spin-ZX calculus 为 SU(2) 系统的表示和计算提供了一个强大的图示化工具，并在理论物理学中开辟了新的研究途径。

Abstract: We introduce the Spin-ZX calculus as an elevation of Penrose's diagrams and associated binor calculus to the level of a formal diagrammatic language. The power of doing so is illustrated by the variety of scientific areas we apply it to: permutational quantum computing, quantum machine learning, condensed matter physics, and quantum gravity. Respectively, we analyse permutational computing transition amplitudes, evaluate barren plateaus for SU(2) symmetric ansätze, study properties of AKLT states, and derive the minimum quantised volume in loop quantum gravity.
  Our starting point is the mixed-dimensional ZX calculus, a purely diagrammatic language that has been proven to be complete for finite-dimensional Hilbert spaces. That is, any equation that can be derived in the Hilbert space formalism, can also be derived in the mixed-dimensional ZX calculus. We embed the Spin-ZX calculus inside the mixed-dimensional ZX calculus, rendering it a quantum information flavoured diagrammatic language for the quantum theory of angular momentum, i.e. SU(2) representation theory. We diagrammatically derive the fundamental spin coupling objects - such as Clebsch-Gordan coefficients, symmetrising mappings between qubits and spin spaces, and spin Hamiltonians - under this embedding.
  Our results establish the Spin-ZX calculus as a powerful tool for representing and computing with SU(2) systems graphically, offering new insights into foundational relationships and paving the way for new diagrammatic algorithms for theoretical physics.

</details>


### [372] [Quantum-Like Correlations from Local Hidden-Variable Theories Under Conservation Law](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06043)
*Alejandro J. Garza,Jonte R. Hance*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 利用局域隐变量模型解释测量误差，构建了违反贝尔不等式的超测量模型，并提出了与量子力学不同的可检验的预测。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有测量精度受限于保持全局对称性的需求，作者旨在突破这一限制。

Method: 构建了一个局域隐变量模型，将测量误差解释为改变隐变量的测度空间，从而违反贝尔不等式。

Result: 提出了一个超测量模型，它在不依赖超决定论或逆因果性的情况下，通过解释测量误差来违反贝尔不等式。

Conclusion: 该模型提供了一个与量子力学有细微差别但可进行实验验证的预测，为理解量子测量提供了新的视角。

Abstract: The precision with which we can measure operators that do not commute with conserved quantities is limited by the need to preserve the associated global symmetries. We show how to construct a local hidden-variable model that violates Bell inequalities by interpreting this measurement error as altering the measure space of the hidden variables. This provides a physically-motivated example of a supermeasured model, where the statistical independence assumption used to form Bell inequalities is violated without there being a causal dependence of the measurement settings on the hidden variables (superdeterminism) or a causal dependence of the hidden variables on the measurement settings (retrocausality). The model also gives subtly different predictions to quantum mechanics, that could be tested experimentally.

</details>


### [373] [Converting coherence into work with a fully quantum engine](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06096)
*MinSik Kwon,Tobias Denzler,Rouven Maier,Vadim Vorobyov,Durga Bhaktavatsala Rao Dasari,Eric Lutz,Jörg Wrachtrup*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: A quantum engine powered by quantum coherence in a single solid-state spin demonstrably outperforms classical engines, converting coherence into work with significantly enhanced efficiency.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The paper aims to experimentally realize a fully quantum engine that leverages quantum coherence to produce mechanical work, moving beyond traditional heat engines.

Method: The researchers used a single solid-state spin in diamond, fueled by a coherent bath, to cyclically store energy in a spin quantum battery. They established criteria for coherence-to-work conversion and emphasized the role of a coherent motor-battery interaction.

Result: The quantum engine produced almost 200% more work over a few cycles compared to a classical engine, demonstrating quantum-enhanced performance. They also derived concrete criteria for successful coherence-to-work conversion.

Conclusion: The study successfully demonstrated a nanomachine where all components are quantum coherent, harnessing nonclassical features throughout its operational cycle and showcasing the potential of quantum coherence for work extraction.

Abstract: Heat engines convert thermal energy into mechanical work. We here report the experimental realization of a fully quantum engine that converts quantum coherence into work. A single solid-state spin in diamond is fueled by a coherent bath and cyclically stores energy in a spin quantum battery. We establish quantum-enhanced performance by showing that almost 200$\%$ more work is produced after a few cycle compared to the corresponding classical engine. We obtain concrete criteria for successful coherence-to-work conversion, and highlight the importance of a coherent motor-battery interaction. This device harnesses nonclassical features during all stages of its cycle, and demonstrates the functionality of a nanomachine whose parts are all quantum coherent.

</details>


### [374] [Quantum Optimal Control of a Lambda System in the Density Matrix Formulation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06097)
*Julia Cen,Domenico D'Alessandro*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该研究探讨了在Lambda型量子系统中，在给定时间范围内，在两个等谱密度矩阵之间实现最优量子态传输的问题。研究通过结合庞特里亚金最大值原理、对称性约化和参数空间边界技术来解决此问题，并证明了最优控制和轨迹的性质。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在量子信息处理的物理实现中，Lambda型量子系统被广泛使用，但其高能级易受退相干影响。因此，研究最优量子态传输对于提高量子信息处理的鲁棒性至关重要。

Method: 研究采用了几何控制方法，结合了庞特里亚金最大值原理、对称性约化技术来减少参数数量，并利用辅助技术来界定参数空间，以寻找最优解。最后，通过数值模拟处理了一个具体的案例。

Result: 研究推导出了最优控制和轨迹应满足的微分方程组，并通过数值模拟求解了一个涉及类似Hadamard变换的案例，证明了该方法的可行性。

Conclusion: 研究提出的几何控制方法及其相关技术可以推广到其他量子控制问题，有望在量子系统中更有效地应用几何控制。

Abstract: In various physical implementations of quantum information processing, qubits are realized in a Lambda type system configuration as two stable lower energy levels coupled indirectly via an unstable higher energy level, that is, in comparison, a lot more susceptible to decoherence. We consider the quantum control problem of optimal state transfer between two isospectral density matrices, over an arbitrary finite time horizon, for the quantum Lambda system. The cost considered is a compromise between the energy of the control field and the average occupancy in the highest energy level. We apply a geometric approach that combines the use of the Pontryagin Maximum Principle, a symmetry reduction technique to reduce the number of parameters in the resulting optimization problem, and several auxiliary techniques to bound the parameter space in the search for the optimal solution. We prove several properties of the optimal control and trajectories for this problem, including their normality and smoothness. We obtain a system of differential equations that must be satisfied by the optimal pair of control and trajectory we treat in detail, with numerical simulations, and solve a case study involving a Hadamard-like transformation.
