### [525] [HYDRA: Breaking the Global Ordering Barrier in Multi-BFT Consensus](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05843)
*Hanzheng Lyu,Shaokang Xie,Jianyu Niu,Mohammad Sadoghi,Yinqian Zhang,Cong Wang,Ivan Beschastnikh,Chen Feng*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: HYDRA是一个创新的多拜占庭容错（Multi-BFT）共识框架，它通过消除全局排序层，实现了交易的按对象分片并行执行，从而提高了可扩展性、减少了故障传播，并简化了部署。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的Multi-BFT共识协议虽然通过并行运行多个BFT实例来克服领导者瓶颈，但它们依赖于昂贵的全局排序层来序列化跨实例的区块，这限制了可扩展性、加剧了故障传播并增加了部署的复杂性。因此，需要一种不依赖全局排序的Multi-BFT设计。

Method: HYDRA提出了一种面向对象的执行模型，将交易根据其访问的对象进行分区，从而允许多个实例并发且确定性地执行交易。为了保证一致性，HYDRA结合了轻量级的锁协调机制和死锁解析机制。

Result: 在LAN和WAN环境中，使用多达128个副本进行的实验表明，HYDRA在存在拖尾节点的情况下，其性能优于几种最先进的Multi-BFT协议，展示了高吞吐量和强一致性。

Conclusion: 通过消除全局排序，HYDRA成功地实现了可扩展且正确的Multi-BFT共识，为未来的可扩展Multi-BFT共识设计开辟了新的方向。

Abstract: Multi-Byzantine Fault Tolerant (Multi-BFT) consensus, which runs multiple BFT instances in parallel, has recently emerged as a promising approach to overcome the leader bottleneck in classical BFT protocols. However, existing designs rely on a global ordering layer to serialize blocks across instances, an intuitive yet costly mechanism that constrains scalability, amplifies failure propagation, and complicates deployment. In this paper, we challenge this conventional wisdom. We present HYDRA, the first Multi-BFT consensus framework that eliminates global ordering altogether. HYDRA introduces an object-centric execution model that partitions transactions by their accessed objects, enabling concurrent yet deterministic execution across instances. To ensure consistency, HYDRA combines lightweight lock-based coordination with a deadlock resolution mechanism, achieving both scalability and correctness. We implement HYDRA and evaluate it on up to 128 replicas in both LAN and WAN environments. Experimental results show HYDRA outperforms several state-of-the-art Multi-BFT protocols in the presence of a straggler. These results demonstrate strong consistency and high performance by removing global ordering, opening a new direction toward scalable Multi-BFT consensus design.

</details>


### [526] [CoEdge-RAG: Optimizing Hierarchical Scheduling for Retrieval-Augmented LLMs in Collaborative Edge Computing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05915)
*Guihang Hong,Tao Ouyang,Kongyange Zhao,Zhi Zhou,Xu Chen*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: CoEdge-RAG是一个分层调度框架，用于在协作边缘计算中进行检索增强的LLM，通过在线查询识别、动态跨节点调度和自适应节点内资源分配来优化性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有边缘计算范式主要关注单节点优化，忽略了通过跨节点协作来利用分布式数据和异构资源的潜力，而LLM在资源受限的边缘设备上进行本地推理需要实时响应和数据隐私保护。

Method: 1. 使用近端策略优化（PPO）设计在线查询识别机制，自动推断查询语义并在线建立跨域知识关联。 2. 设计动态跨节点调度策略，通过结合历史性能分析和实时资源阈值来平衡异构边缘节点的负载。 3. 基于在线凸优化开发节点内调度器，以优化延迟-质量权衡。

Result: 在各种问答基准测试的综合评估中，CoEdge-RAG在所有任务上的性能比基线方法提高了4.23%至91.39%。

Conclusion: CoEdge-RAG显著提高了协作式检索增强LLM的性能，解决了现有边缘计算范式中数据隐私和资源异构性带来的挑战。

Abstract: Motivated by the imperative for real-time responsiveness and data privacy preservation, large language models (LLMs) are increasingly deployed on resource-constrained edge devices to enable localized inference. To improve output quality, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) is an efficient technique that seamlessly integrates local data into LLMs. However, existing edge computing paradigms primarily focus on single-node optimization, neglecting opportunities to holistically exploit distributed data and heterogeneous resources through cross-node collaboration. To bridge this gap, we propose CoEdge-RAG, a hierarchical scheduling framework for retrieval-augmented LLMs in collaborative edge computing. In general, privacy constraints preclude accurate a priori acquisition of heterogeneous data distributions across edge nodes, directly impeding RAG performance optimization. Thus, we first design an online query identification mechanism using proximal policy optimization (PPO), which autonomously infers query semantics and establishes cross-domain knowledge associations in an online manner. Second, we devise a dynamic inter-node scheduling strategy that balances workloads across heterogeneous edge nodes by synergizing historical performance analytics with real-time resource thresholds. Third, we develop an intra-node scheduler based on online convex optimization, adaptively allocating query processing ratios and memory resources to optimize the latency-quality trade-off under fluctuating assigned loads. Comprehensive evaluations across diverse QA benchmarks demonstrate that our proposed method significantly boosts the performance of collaborative retrieval-augmented LLMs, achieving performance gains of 4.23\% to 91.39\% over baseline methods across all tasks.

</details>


### [527] [MT4G: A Tool for Reliable Auto-Discovery of NVIDIA and AMD GPU Compute and Memory Topologies](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05958)
*Stepan Vanecek,Manuel Walter Mussbacher,Dominik Groessler,Urvij Saroliya,Martin Schulz*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: MT4G是一个开源、与供应商无关的工具，用于发现GPU拓扑和配置，填补了GPU信息缺乏的空白。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: CPU有hwloc等工具，但GPU信息难以获取、不完整且依赖于供应商，因此需要一个通用的GPU拓扑发现工具。

Method: MT4G结合了现有API和50多个微基准测试，并使用如Kolmogorov-Smirnov检验等统计方法来自动识别无法通过编程获取的拓扑属性。

Result: MT4G在十个不同的GPU上展示了其通用性，并通过整合到GPU性能建模、GPUscout瓶颈分析和动态资源划分三个工作流中，证明了其影响力。

Conclusion: MT4G为NVIDIA和AMD GPU提供了跨平台的性能理解和系统特性分析能力，是现代HPC和AI系统的自动化、可移植解决方案。

Abstract: Understanding GPU topology is essential for performance-related tasks in HPC or AI. Yet, unlike for CPUs with tools like hwloc, GPU information is hard to come by, incomplete, and vendor-specific.
  In this work, we address this gap and present MT4G, an open-source and vendor-agnostic tool that automatically discovers GPU compute and memory topologies and configurations, including cache sizes, bandwidths, and physical layouts. MT4G combines existing APIs with a suite of over 50 microbenchmarks, applying statistical methods, such as the Kolmogorov-Smirnov test, to automatically and reliably identify otherwise programmatically unavailable topological attributes.
  We showcase MT4G's universality on ten different GPUs and demonstrate its impact through integration into three workflows: GPU performance modeling, GPUscout bottleneck analysis, and dynamic resource partitioning. These scenarios highlight MT4G's role in understanding system performance and characteristics across NVIDIA and AMD GPUs, providing an automated, portable solution for modern HPC and AI systems.

</details>


### [528] [DWM-RO: Decentralized World Models with Reasoning Offloading for SWIPT-enabled Satellite-Terrestrial HetNets](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05972)
*Guangyuan Liu,Yinqiu Liu,Ruichen Zhang,Dusit Niyato,Jiawen Kang,Sumei Sun,Abbas Jamalipour,Ping Zhang*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: 本论文提出了一种名为DWM-RO的去中心化世界模型框架，通过引入经验回放和不确定性感知机制，解决了无线通信中SWIPT系统的优化问题，显著提高了学习效率和系统性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在日益增长的无线连接需求和对能源效率的要求下，卫星-地面融合架构和SWIPT技术成为趋势。然而，时间变化的信道和多层干扰给传统的模型无关MARL算法带来了样本效率低和协调性差的挑战。

Method: DWM-RO框架包括：1. 每个智能体使用世界模型学习环境动态的预测表示，实现基于想象的策略训练以减少环境交互。2. 通过不确定性感知门控机制，根据局部干扰和模型重建误差触发边缘协调。3. 边缘的轻量级潜在去相关机制优化智能体的策略表示，引导其采取正交动作以减少资源冲突。

Result: 与现有技术相比，DWM-RO的收敛速度快5倍，频谱效率提高了34.7%，约束违反率降低了40%。在10用户密集网络场景下，DWM-RO的违反率低于20%，而基线方法超过70%。

Conclusion: DWM-RO框架通过结合世界模型和选择性边缘协调，有效地解决了SWIPT系统中的优化问题，在样本效率、系统性能和鲁棒性方面均表现出显著优势。

Abstract: Wireless networks are undergoing a paradigm shift toward massive connectivity with energy-efficient operation, driving the integration of satellite-terrestrial architectures with simultaneous wireless information and power transfer (SWIPT). Optimizing transmit beamforming and power splitting in such systems faces formidable challenges, e.g., time-varying channels and multi-tier interference, which create a complex decision landscape where conventional model-free multi-agent reinforcement learning (MARL) suffers from sample inefficiency due to rarely-encountered state transitions and poor coordination as decentralized agents act independently. This paper proposes the Decentralized World Model with Reasoning Offloading (DWM-RO) framework to address these fundamental limitations. Specifically, each agent employs a world model to learn compact predictive representations of environment dynamics, enabling imagination-based policy training that dramatically reduces required environment interactions. An uncertainty-aware offloading gate monitors local interference levels and model reconstruction errors to trigger selective edge coordination. When activated, a lightweight latent decorrelation mechanism at the edge refines agents' strategic representations, guiding them toward orthogonal actions that minimize resource conflicts. Extensive simulations demonstrate that DWM-RO converges 5 times faster than state-of-the-art baselines while achieving 34.7% higher spectral efficiency and reducing constraint violations by 40%. In dense network scenarios with 10 users, DWM-RO maintains violation rates below 20% while baselines exceed 70%, validating superior robustness.

</details>


### [529] [Inductive Loop Analysis for Practical HPC Application Optimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06052)
*Philipp Schaad,Tal Ben-Nun,Patrick Iff,Torsten Hoefler*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: SILO通过将数据访问和依赖建模为循环步长的函数，实现了科学计算中多层循环嵌套的自动并行化和数据移动优化，最高可提速12倍。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 科学计算中多层循环嵌套和多维数组是常见模式，但现有编译器在分析步进访问和循环依赖等模式方面存在困难。

Method: 提出了一种名为SILO（符号归纳循环优化）的新技术，将数据访问和依赖抽象为循环步长的函数，从而实现自动并行化、软件预取和指针增量等优化。

Result: 在以大气模型和数值求解器为重点的科学应用基础核上进行了SILO演示，结果显示与现有技术相比，最高可实现12倍的加速。

Conclusion: SILO通过对数据访问和依赖进行符号归纳建模，能够有效优化循环嵌套，实现自动化并行和数据移动优化，在科学计算领域具有显著的性能提升潜力。

Abstract: Scientific computing applications heavily rely on multi-level loop nests operating on multidimensional arrays. This presents multiple optimization opportunities from exploiting parallelism to reducing data movement through prefetching and improved register usage. HPC frameworks often delegate fine-grained data movement optimization to compilers, but their low-level representations hamper analysis of common patterns, such as strided data accesses and loop-carried dependencies. In this paper, we introduce symbolic, inductive loop optimization (SILO), a novel technique that models data accesses and dependencies as functions of loop nest strides. This abstraction enables the automatic parallelization of sequentially-dependent loops, as well as data movement optimizations including software prefetching and pointer incrementation to reduce register spills. We demonstrate SILO on fundamental kernels from scientific applications with a focus on atmospheric models and numerical solvers, achieving up to 12$\times$ speedup over the state of the art.

</details>


### [530] [Elastic Data Transfer Optimization with Hybrid Reinforcement Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06159)
*Rasman Mubtasim Swargo,Md Arifuzzaman*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: 现代科学数据传输面临挑战，传统工具调优困难且仅优化并发。本文提出了一种名为\name的自适应数据传输方法，该方法结合了启发式并行、无限流水线和基于深度强化学习的并发优化器，并使用轻量级网络模拟器加速了训练过程。实验结果表明，\name在各种数据集上均优于现有方法，吞吐量最高可提高9.5倍。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现代科学数据量巨大，需要在地理上分散的计算集群之间进行传输，而传统工具在调优和参数优化方面存在不足。

Method: \name方法结合了启发式并行、无限流水线和基于深度强化学习的并发优化器，并引入了一个轻量级网络模拟器以加速强化学习代理的训练。

Result: \name方法在各种数据集上持续优于现有方法，吞吐量最高可提高9.5倍。

Conclusion: \name是一种有效的自适应数据传输方法，能够显著提高数据传输的吞吐量和效率。

Abstract: Modern scientific data acquisition generates petabytes of data that must be transferred to geographically distant computing clusters. Conventional tools either rely on preconfigured sessions, which are difficult to tune for users without domain expertise, or they adaptively optimize only concurrency while ignoring other important parameters. We present \name, an adaptive data transfer method that jointly considers multiple parameters. Our solution incorporates heuristic-based parallelism, infinite pipelining, and a deep reinforcement learning based concurrency optimizer. To make agent training practical, we introduce a lightweight network simulator that reduces training time to less than four minutes and provides a $2750\times$ speedup compared to online training. Experimental evaluation shows that \name consistently outperforms existing methods across diverse datasets, achieving up to 9.5x higher throughput compared to state-of-the-art solutions.

</details>


### [531] [LiteCast: A Lightweight Forecaster for Carbon Optimizations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06187)
*Mathew Joseph,Tanush Savadi,Abel Souza*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: LiteCast是一种轻量级时间序列预测方法，能快速模拟区域能源结构以预测碳强度，在50个区域的评估中表现优于现有方法，实现了近乎最优的近97%的最高可实现平均节约。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有碳强度预测方法依赖于计算密集型模型和大量历史数据，这限制了可扩展性，并且精度提升不一定带来节约的同等比例增长。因此，需要更高效的预测策略。

Method: 提出一种名为LiteCast的轻量级时间序列预测方法，该方法仅需几天的历史能源和天气数据，即可快速建模区域能源结构，预测碳强度，并能快速适应电网变化。

Result: 在50个全球区域的实际工作负载下，LiteCast的节约效果比现有最先进的预测方法高出20%，达到了最高可实现平均节约的97%，同时保持了轻量、高效和适应新数据的能力。

Conclusion: 为了实现碳减排，碳预测解决方案可以通过保持预测排名与真实情况的一致性来获得大部分节约，而无需进行高精度和复杂的预测。LiteCast通过其轻量级、高效和适应性强的特点，证明了这一点。

Abstract: Over recent decades, electricity demand has experienced sustained growth through widespread electrification of transportation and the accelerated expansion of Artificial Intelligence (AI). Grids have managed the resulting surges by scaling generation capacity, incorporating additional resources such as solar and wind, and implementing demand-response mechanisms. Altogether, these policies influence a region's carbon intensity by affecting its energy mix. To mitigate the environmental impacts of consumption, carbon-aware optimizations often rely on long-horizon, high-accuracy forecasts of the grid's carbon intensity that typically use compute intensive models with extensive historical energy mix data. In addition to limiting scalability, accuracy improvements do not necessarily translate into proportional increases in savings. Highlighting the need for more efficient forecasting strategies, we argue that carbon forecasting solutions can achieve the majority of savings without requiring highly precise and complex predictions. Instead, it is the preservation of the ranking of forecasts relative to the ground-truth that drives realized savings. In this paper, we present LiteCast, a lightweight time series forecasting method capable of quickly modeling a region's energy mix to estimate its carbon intensity. LiteCast requires only a few days of historical energy and weather data, delivering fast forecasts that can quickly adapt to sudden changes in the electrical grid. Our evaluation in 50 worldwide regions under various real-world workloads shows that LiteCast outperforms state-of-the-art forecasters, delivering 20% higher savings with near-optimal performance, achieving 97% of the maximum attainable average savings, while remaining lightweight, efficient to run, and adaptive to new data.

</details>


### [532] [Optimizing Long-context LLM Serving via Fine-grained Sequence Parallelism](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06247)
*Cong Li,Yuzhe Yang,Xuegui Zheng,Qifan Yang,Yijin Guan,Size Zheng,Li-Wen Chang,Shufan Liu,Xin Liu,Guangyu Sun*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: CDSP 是一种新的细粒度并行策略，用于为 LLM 推理分配序列并行 (SP) 大小，以满足不同长度的请求。Tetris 是一个基于 CDSP 的 LLM 服务系统，可提高 TTFT 和 TBT 性能，并增加请求容量。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的动态 SP 分配缺乏灵活性，无法支持 LLM 推理中的特定阶段的并行要求，无法减轻过多的 SP 分配造成的全局延迟，也无法利用 SP 大小变化产生的资源碎片。

Method: 提出了一种名为 CDSP 的细粒度并行策略，该策略将 SP 大小分配给请求内的令牌段。基于 CDSP 构建了一个名为 Tetris 的 LLM 服务系统，该系统将 CDSP 集成到分解集群中，以满足并行异构性，根据实时负载条件动态调整 SP 大小，并探索分块方案以利用碎片化资源。

Result: 与最先进的系统相比，Tetris 在最大可持续负载下实现了高达 4.35 倍的 TTFT，将中值 TBT 降低了 40.1%，并将最大请求容量提高了 45%。

Conclusion: CDSP 和 Tetris 系统在解决 LLM 推理中的并行挑战方面取得了显著的性能提升。

Abstract: With the advancement of large language models (LLMs), their context windows have rapidly expanded. To meet diverse demands from varying-length requests in online services, existing state-of-the-art systems tune the sequence parallelism (SP) allocation. However, current dynamic SP allocation lacks flexibility to (1) support stage-specific parallelism requirements in LLM inference, (2) mitigate the global latency degradation from excessive SP allocation, and (3) exploit resource fragments arising from SP size variation.
  To tackle this problem, we propose Chunkwise Dynamic Sequence Parallelism (CDSP), a fine-grained parallelism strategy that assigns SP sizes across \textit{intra-request} token segments. Based on CDSP, we build Tetris, an LLM serving system that (1) efficiently integrates CDSP into disaggregated cluster to satisfy parallelism heterogeneity, (2) dynamically regulates SP size expansion based on real-time load conditions, and (3) adaptively explores chunking plans to utilize fragmented resources while meeting per-request demands. Compared with state-of-the-art systems, Tetris achieves up to 4.35$\times$ lower time-to-first-token (TTFT) under max sustainable loads, reduces median time-between-tokens (TBT) by up to 40.1\%, and increases the max request capacity by up to 45\%.

</details>


### [533] [PRAGMA: A Profiling-Reasoned Multi-Agent Framework for Automatic Kernel Optimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06345)
*Kelun Lei,Hailong Yang,Huaitao Zhang,Xin You,Kaige Zhang,Zhongzhi Luan,Yi Liu,Depei Qian*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: PRAGMA是一个结合执行反馈和硬件性能分析的AI内核生成框架，能够识别性能瓶颈并优化代码，在CPU和GPU上实现了显著的加速。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的AI内核生成系统缺乏对低层性能瓶颈进行推理的能力，主要依赖于正确性或执行时间的反馈。PRAGMA旨在通过整合执行反馈和细粒度的硬件性能分析来解决这一问题。

Method: PRAGMA是一个结合执行反馈和硬件性能分析的AI内核生成框架，它将这些信息整合到LLM的推理循环中，使其能够识别性能瓶颈，保留历史最佳版本，并迭代地优化代码质量。

Result: 在KernelBench上，PRAGMA在CPU和GPU平台上分别实现了2.81倍和2.30倍的平均加速，显著优于未启用性能分析的基线AIKG。

Conclusion: PRAGMA通过引入性能分析能力，显著提升了AI内核生成的效果，能够有效地识别和解决性能瓶颈，并在CPU和GPU平台上实现了可观的加速。

Abstract: Designing high-performance kernels requires expert-level tuning and a deep understanding of hardware characteristics. Recent advances in large language models (LLMs) have enabled automated kernel generation, yet most existing systems rely solely on correctness or execution time feedback, lacking the ability to reason about low-level performance bottlenecks. In this paper, we introduce PRAGMA, a profile-guided AI kernel generation framework that integrates execution feedback and fine-grained hardware profiling into the reasoning loop. PRAGMA enables LLMs to identify performance bottlenecks, preserve historical best versions, and iteratively refine code quality. We evaluate PRAGMA on KernelBench, covering GPU and CPU backends. Results show that PRAGMA consistently outperforms baseline AIKG without profiling enabled and achieves 2.81$\times$ and 2.30$\times$ averaged speedups against Torch on CPU and GPU platforms, respectively.

</details>


### [534] [Saarthi: An End-to-End Intelligent Platform for Optimising Distributed Serverless Workloads](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06599)
*Siddharth Agarwal,Maria A. Rodriguez,Rajkumar Buyya*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: Saarthi是一个创新的无服务器框架，通过感知输入来智能管理函数资源的动态需求，旨在提高吞吐量、降低成本并保持服务水平目标。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的无服务器平台在启动延迟、静态配置、资源分配和调度方面存在挑战，导致性能不一致和运营成本不可预测。Saarthi旨在解决这些问题。

Method: Saarthi是一个输入感知的无服务器框架，能够根据传入请求的负载特性预测资源需求，实现函数大小的正确调整和跨可用函数配置的智能请求编排。它还集成了主动容错冗余机制，并使用多目标整数线性规划（ILP）模型来优化函数数量，以最大化吞吐量并降低成本。

Result: 在OpenFaaS之上实现的Saarthi，相比基线OpenFaaS，吞吐量提高了1.45倍，成本降低了1.84倍，同时保持了高达98.3%的服务水平目标，开销最高可达0.2秒。

Conclusion: Saarthi通过智能的、输入感知的资源管理和优化，显著提高了无服务器平台的性能和成本效益，代表了通往自动驾驶无服务器平台的重要一步。

Abstract: FaaS offers significant advantages with its infrastructure abstraction, on-demand execution, and attractive no idle resource pricing for modern cloud applications. Despite these benefits, challenges such as startup latencies, static configurations, sub-optimal resource allocation and scheduling still exist due to coupled resource offering and workload-agnostic generic scheduling behaviour. These issues often lead to inconsistent function performance and unexpected operational costs for users and service providers. This paper introduces Saarthi, a novel, end-to-end serverless framework that intelligently manages the dynamic resource needs of function workloads, representing a significant step toward self-driving serverless platforms. Unlike platforms that rely on static resource configurations, Saarthi is input-aware, allowing it to intelligently anticipate resource requirements based on the characteristics of an incoming request payload. This input-driven approach reinforces function right-sizing and enables smart request orchestration across available function configurations. Saarthi further integrates a proactive fault-tolerant redundancy mechanism and employs a multi-objective Integer Linear Programming (ILP) model to maintain an optimal function quantity. This optimisation aims to maximise system throughput while simultaneously reducing overall operational costs. We validate the effectiveness of Saarthi by implementing it as a framework atop OpenFaaS. Our results demonstrate Saarthi's ability to achieve up to 1.45x better throughput, 1.84x reduced costs, while maintaining up to 98.3% service level targets with an overhead of up to 0.2 seconds as compared to the baseline OpenFaaS.

</details>


### [535] [DMA Collectives for Efficient ML Communication Offloads](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06605)
*Suchita Pati,Mahzabeen Islam,Shaizeen Aga,Mohamed Assem Ibrahim*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: DMA 显能在 ML 通信中展现出潜力，但仅在大规模传输中表现优于 RCCL，而在小规模传输中表现不佳。通过优化 DMA 调度和同步，可以缩小差距，使 DMA 显能在主流 ML 通信库中具有更广泛的应用前景。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 虽然 DMA 显能被认为是降低 ML 推理和训练成本的一种有前途的方法，但以往的研究仅在有限的场景下（仅限带宽限制的传输大小、仅性能）进行了研究。本文旨在全面分析 DMA 显能在 ML 通信中的性能、功耗/能量和同步成本。

Method: 对状态艺术的 AMD Instinct MI300X GPU 上的 ML 通信集合（all-gather、all-to-all）进行性能、功耗/能量和同步成本分析。我们提供了 DMA 传输的详细延迟分析，并确定 DMA 命令调度和同步成本可能会限制 DMA 集合的性能。为了解决这个问题，我们利用了迄今为止尚未开发的现有 DMA 体系结构创新，来构建优化的 DMA 集合。

Result: 与状态艺术的 RCCL 通信集合库相比，DMA 集合在性能（16% 更好）和功耗（32% 更好）方面，在大尺寸（10MB 到 GB）下表现相当或更好。然而，在延迟敏感的小尺寸下，DMA 集合的表现明显滞后，all-gather 和 all-to-all 分别慢 4.5 倍和 2.5 倍。优化的 DMA 集合在较小尺寸下（all-gather 慢 30%、all-to-all 快 20%）的性能差距明显缩小，并在较大尺寸下（7%）将性能和功耗节省进一步提高（3-10%）。

Conclusion: DMA 显能提供了显著的性能和功耗优势，尤其是在大规模 ML 通信中。通过解决 DMA 调度和同步带来的挑战，可以提高 DMA 显能在小规模通信中的性能。这项工作为 DMA 显能在主流通信库中的采用迈出了重要的一步。

Abstract: Offloading machine learning (ML) communication collectives to direct memory access (DMA) engines has emerged as an interesting and low-cost solution to efficiently overlap computation and communication in inference and training. Doing so delivers superior concurrent performance by freeing up all GPU cores for computation and also lowers interference in the memory sub-system (caches). While DMA collectives show strong promise, prior works have only studied them in limited context (bandwidth-bound transfer sizes only, performance-only).
  To address this, we provide a comprehensive performance, power/energy and synchronization costs analysis of offloading ML communication collectives (all-gather, all-to-all) to DMA engines on state-of-the-art AMD Instinct MI300X GPUs. Our analysis reveals that, compared to the state-of-the-art RCCL communication collectives library, DMA collectives are at-par or better for large sizes (10s of MB to GB) in terms of both performance (16% better) and power (32% better). However, they significantly lag for latency-bound small sizes; 4.5X and 2.5X slower for all-gather and all-to-all, respectively. We provide a detailed latency breakdown of a DMA transfer and identify that DMA command scheduling and synchronization costs can limit DMA collective performance. To tackle this, we harness existing DMA architecture innovations, hitherto untapped, to build optimized DMA collectives and demonstrate their efficacy on real hardware. Our optimized implementations considerably close the performance gap for DMA collectives at smaller sizes (30% slower and 20% faster all-gather and all-to-all, respectively) and further improves performance (by 7%) and power savings at larger sizes (3-10%). Overall, this work represents a significant step toward making DMA collectives suitable for adoption in mainstream collective libraries.

</details>


### [536] [Wireless Sensor Networks Nodes Clustering and Optimization Based on Fuzzy C-Means and Water Strider Algorithms](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06735)
*Raya Majid Alsharfa,Mahmood Mohassel Feghhi,Majid Hameed Majeed*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: WSNs通过结合水黾算法（WSA）和模糊C均值（FCM）的混合聚类协议，优化了能源效率和网络寿命，显著延迟了首次节点死亡（FND）和最后节点死亡（LND），并提高了残余能量。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决无线传感器网络（WSNs）在能量管理和网络寿命优化方面的挑战，这些挑战源于有限的电池资源和通信开销。

Method: 提出一种混合聚类协议，将水黾算法（WSA）用于聚类头位置的全局优化，并结合模糊C均值（FCM）进行节点成员分配，以实现模糊边界。

Result: 在200-800个节点的网络中进行了广泛的实验，结果显示：首次节点死亡（FND）延迟了16.1%（678±12 vs 584±18轮），最后节点死亡（LND）延长了11.9%（1,262±8 vs 1,128±11轮），残余能量保持率提高了37.4%（5.47±0.09 vs 3.98±0.11 J）。簇内距离减少了19.4%（p < 0.001）。

Conclusion: 提出的WSA-FCM混合聚类协议在提高WSNs的能源效率和网络寿命方面表现出色，并且在性能指标上优于现有的混合方法。

Abstract: Wireless sensor networks (WSNs) face critical challenges in energy management and network lifetime optimization due to limited battery resources and communication overhead. This study introduces a novel hybrid clustering protocol that integrates the Water Strider Algorithm (WSA) with Fuzzy C-Means (FCM) clustering to achieve superior energy efficiency and network longevity. The proposed WSA-FCM method employs WSA for global optimization of cluster- head positions and FCM for refined node membership assignment with fuzzy boundaries. Through extensive experimentation across networks of 200-800 nodes with 10 independent simulation runs, the method demonstrates significant improvements: First Node Death (FND) delayed by 16.1% ($678\pm12$ vs $584\pm18$ rounds), Last Node Death (LND) extended by 11.9% ($1,262\pm8$ vs $1,128\pm11$ rounds), and 37.4% higher residual energy retention ($5.47\pm0.09$ vs $3.98\pm0.11$ J) compared to state-of-the-art hybrid methods. Intra-cluster distances are reduced by 19.4% with statistical significance (p < 0.001). Theoretical analysis proves convergence guarantees and complexity bounds of $O(n\times c\times T)$, while empirical scalability analysis demonstrates near-linear scaling behaviour. The method outperforms recent hybrid approaches including MOALO-FCM, MSSO-MST, Fuzzy+HHO, and GWO-FCM across all performance metrics with rigorous statistical validation.

</details>


### [537] [A GPU-boosted high-performance multi-working condition joint analysis framework for predicting dynamics of textured axial piston pump](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06824)
*Xin Yao,Yang Liu,Jin Jiang,Yesen Chen,Zhilong Chen,Hongkang Dong,Xiaofeng Wei,Teng Zhang,Dongyun Wang*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: 为了加速轴向柱塞泵（APP）动力学模拟，提出了一种名为 GMAF 的 GPU 加速框架，采用预处理共轭梯度法（PCG）和近似对称 sucesivamente超松弛（ASSOR）预处理。该框架通过提高计算强度和大规模并行计算来充分利用 GPU 资源，显著加速了压力场的代数方程组的建立和求解，以及力和力矩的数值积分，从而能够高效地模拟光滑和带纹理表面的 APP 在多个工作周期内的动力学行为。与追求局部收敛的异步收敛策略相比，GMAF 采用了针对全局收敛的同步收敛策略。结果表明，轴向油力和圆周力矩直接响应输入压力，而其他分量呈正弦规律变化。带纹理表面能够提高压力容量和抗扭转能力，并在压力场中形成“台阶”。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的APP动力学模拟方法受限于CPU计算能力和传统求解器，在处理复杂纹理表面和多周期模拟时效率低下。因此，需要一种能够加速模拟过程并处理复杂情况的方法。

Method: 提出了一种名为 GMAF (GPU-boosted high-performance Multi-working condition joint Analysis Framework) 的 GPU 加速框架。该框架采用预处理共轭梯度法 (PCG) 和近似对称 sucesivamente超松弛预处理 (ASSOR)，并利用 GPU 进行大规模并行计算。在求解器方面，采用了同步收敛策略以实现全局收敛。

Result: GMAF 能够显著加速压力场的建立和求解，以及力和力矩的数值积分，从而高效地模拟光滑和带纹理表面的 APP 在多个工作周期内的动力学行为。模拟结果显示，轴向油力和圆周力矩直接响应输入压力，其他分量呈正弦规律变化。带纹理表面可以提高压力容量和抗扭转能力，并在压力场中观察到与纹理对应的“台阶”。

Conclusion: GMAF 框架能够有效地加速轴向柱塞泵的动力学模拟，并揭示了带纹理表面对提高压力容量和抗扭转能力的有益作用，为 APP 的设计和优化提供了有力的数值支持。

Abstract: Accurate simulation to dynamics of axial piston pump (APP) is essential for its design, manufacture and maintenance. However, limited by computation capacity of CPU device and traditional solvers, conventional iteration methods are inefficient in complicated case with textured surface requiring refined mesh, and could not handle simulation during multiple periods. To accelerate Picard iteration for predicting dynamics of APP, a GPU-boosted high-performance Multi-working condition joint Analysis Framework (GMAF) is designed, which adopts Preconditioned Conjugate Gradient method (PCG) using Approximate Symmetric Successive Over-Relaxation preconditioner (ASSOR). GMAF abundantly utilizes GPU device via elevating computational intensity and expanding scale of massive parallel computation. Therefore, it possesses novel performance in analyzing dynamics of both smooth and textured APPs during multiple periods, as the establishment and solution to joint algebraic system for pressure field are accelerated magnificently, as well as numerical integral for force and moment due to oil flow. Compared with asynchronized convergence strategy pursuing local convergence, synchronized convergence strategy targeting global convergence is adopted in PCG solver for the joint system. Revealed by corresponding results, oil force in axial direction and moment in circumferential directly respond to input pressure, while other components evolve in sinusoidal patterns. Specifically, force and moment due to normal pressure instantly reach their steady state initially, while ones due to viscous shear stress evolve during periods. After simulating dynamics of APP and pressure distribution via GMAF, the promotion of pressure capacity and torsion resistance due to textured surface is revealed numerically, as several 'steps' exist in the pressure field corresponding to textures.

</details>


### [538] [Resilient by Design - Active Inference for Distributed Continuum Intelligence](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07202)
*Praveen Kumar Donta,Alfreds Lapkovskis,Enzo Mingozzi,Schahram Dustdar*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: Failures are common in complex distributed systems. This paper presents PAIR-Agent, an AI-based system that uses causal graphs and active inference to detect and fix faults, ensuring system reliability.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Ensuring reliability and global consistency across complex and heterogeneous distributed computing continuum (DCC) systems, especially for AI-driven workloads, is a major challenge due to frequent failures.

Method: The paper introduces PAIR-Agent, which constructs a causal fault graph, identifies faults using Markov blankets and the free-energy principle to manage uncertainty, and heals issues through active inference and adaptive reconfiguration.

Result: PAIR-Agent maintains service continuity and stability under diverse failure conditions.

Conclusion: Theoretical validations confirm the reliability and effectiveness of the PAIR-Agent framework for achieving resilience in DCC systems.

Abstract: Failures are the norm in highly complex and heterogeneous devices spanning the distributed computing continuum (DCC), from resource-constrained IoT and edge nodes to high-performance computing systems. Ensuring reliability and global consistency across these layers remains a major challenge, especially for AI-driven workloads requiring real-time, adaptive coordination. This paper introduces a Probabilistic Active Inference Resilience Agent (PAIR-Agent) to achieve resilience in DCC systems. PAIR-Agent performs three core operations: (i) constructing a causal fault graph from device logs, (ii) identifying faults while managing certainties and uncertainties using Markov blankets and the free-energy principle, and (iii) autonomously healing issues through active inference. Through continuous monitoring and adaptive reconfiguration, the agent maintains service continuity and stability under diverse failure conditions. Theoretical validations confirm the reliability and effectiveness of the proposed framework.

</details>


### [539] [LLMServingSim2.0: A Unified Simulator for Heterogeneous Hardware and Serving Techniques in LLM Infrastructure](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07229)
*Jaehong Cho,Hyunmin Choi,Jongse Park*

Main category: cs.DC

TL;DR: LLMServingSim2.0是一个用于探索异构硬件的大规模LLM服务系统模拟器，它通过跟踪驱动的性能建模和算子级延迟剖析器解决了现有模拟器的局限性，从而易于集成新硬件并支持广泛的服务技术。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有LLM服务模拟器在集成硬件模型和支持广泛服务技术方面存在局限性，LLMServingSim2.0旨在解决这些问题。

Method: LLMServingSim2.0采用跟踪驱动的性能建模和算子级延迟剖析器，并提供灵活的接口来集成新硬件并支持各种服务技术，如请求路由、缓存管理和调度策略。

Result: 在TPU案例研究中，LLMServingSim2.0的剖析器所需的代码行数减少了18.5倍，并且在模拟LLM服务时误差率仅为1.9%，同时保持了实际的模拟时间。

Conclusion: LLMServingSim2.0是一个功能全面的平台，可以轻松扩展硬件并支持现代LLM服务的各种技术，使其成为硬件开发人员和LLM服务提供商的宝贵工具。

Abstract: This paper introduces LLMServingSim2.0, a system simulator designed for exploring heterogeneous hardware in large-scale LLM serving systems. LLMServingSim2.0 addresses two key limitations of its predecessor: (1) integrating hardware models into system-level simulators is non-trivial due to the lack of a clear abstraction, and (2) existing simulators support only a narrow subset of serving techniques, leaving no infrastructure that captures the breadth of approaches in modern LLM serving. To overcome these issues, LLMServingSim2.0 adopts trace-driven performance modeling, accompanied by an operator-level latency profiler, enabling the integration of new accelerators with a single command. It further embeds up-to-date serving techniques while exposing flexible interfaces for request routing, cache management, and scheduling policies. In a TPU case study, our profiler requires 18.5x fewer LoC and outperforms the predecessor's hardware-simulator integration, demonstrating LLMServingSim2.0's low-effort hardware extensibility. Our experiments further show that LLMServingSim2.0 reproduces GPU-based LLM serving with 1.9% error, while maintaining practical simulation time, making it a comprehensive platform for both hardware developers and LLM service providers.

</details>


<div id='cs.GT'></div>

# cs.GT [[Back]](#toc)

### [540] [The Complexity of Stackelberg Pricing Games](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05700)
*Christoph Grüne,Dorothee Henke,Eva Rotenberg,Lasse Wulf*

Main category: cs.GT

TL;DR: Stackelberg定价博弈（也称为双层定价问题或组合定价问题）是领导者和竞争者之间的博弈。领导者控制市场的一部分并设定价格，而竞争者的价格是固定的。跟随者通过解决组合优化问题来满足自身需求。本文证明了该问题是Σp2-complete的，即使对于包括TSP、顶点覆盖、团、子集和等NP完全问题在内的更广泛情况也是如此。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Pferschy、Nicosia、Pacifici 和 Schauer 提出的 Stackelberg 定价博弈问题是否是 Σp2-complete 的，这一问题的解答。同样的问题也被 Böhnlein、Schaudt 和 Schauer 提出。

Method: 对 Stackelberg 定价博弈问题进行 Σp2-completeness 证明，并将其推广到包括 TSP、顶点覆盖、团、子集和等 50 多个 NP 完全问题。

Result: Stackelberg 定价博弈问题被证明是 Σp2-complete 的，并且这一结果在更广泛的范围内成立，包括 50 多个 NP 完全问题。

Conclusion: 本文证明了 Stackelberg 定价博弈是 Σp2-complete 的，并且这一结果在更广泛的范围内成立，包括 50 多个 NP 完全问题。

Abstract: We consider Stackelberg pricing games, which are also known as bilevel pricing problems, or combinatorial price-setting problems. This family of problems consists of games between two players: the leader and the follower. There is a market that is partitioned into two parts: the part of the leader and the part of the leader's competitors. The leader controls one part of the market and can freely set the prices for products. By contrast, the prices of the competitors' products are fixed and known in advance. The follower, then, needs to solve a combinatorial optimization problem in order to satisfy their own demands, while comparing the leader's offers to the offers of the competitors. Therefore, the leader has to hit the intricate balance of making an attractive offer to the follower, while at the same time ensuring that their own profit is maximized.
  Pferschy, Nicosia, Pacifici, and Schauer considered the Stackelberg pricing game where the follower solves a knapsack problem. They raised the question whether this problem is complete for the second level of the polynomial hierarchy, i.e., $Σ^p_2$-complete. The same conjecture was also made by Böhnlein, Schaudt, and Schauer. In this paper, we positively settle this conjecture. Moreover, we show that this result holds actually in a much broader context: The Stackelberg pricing game is $Σ^p_2$-complete for over 50 NP-complete problems, including most classics such as TSP, vertex cover, clique, subset sum, etc. This result falls in line of recent meta-theorems about higher complexity in the polynomial hierarchy by Grüne and Wulf.

</details>


### [541] [Fair Allocation of Indivisible Goods with Variable Groups](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06218)
*Paul Gölz,Ayumi Igarashi,Pasin Manurangsi,Warut Suksompong*

Main category: cs.GT

TL;DR: 存在公平分配任意数量和大小的团体的独立物品的EF1结果，即使物品沿路径分布且组需要连续的物品。在概率模型中，当物品数量是组数的倍数且组大小相同时，若物品数量远大于对数n，则几乎可以肯定存在无嫉妒的结果。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究具有可变组的不可分割物品的公平分配问题，目标是将代理人划分为给定大小的组，并以公平的方式分配物品。

Method: 在具有任意单调效用的情况下，证明了存在一种满足“最多一件物品的无嫉妒”（EF1）的分配结果，并提供了一个有效的算法。此外，还证明了当物品沿路径分布且每个组需要获得一个连续的物品束时，EF1结果也存在。在概率模型中，分析了物品数量、代理人数量和组数量之间的关系，以确定无嫉妒结果存在的条件。

Result: 证明了对于任意数量和大小的组，都存在EF1结果，并提供了一个有效的算法。证明了当物品沿路径分布且组需要连续物品束时，EF1结果也存在。在概率模型中，证明了当物品数量是组数的倍数且组大小相同时，若物品数量为ω(log n)，则几乎可以肯定存在EF1结果，且该界限是紧确的。当物品数量不是组数的倍数时，若物品数量为o(sqrt(n))，则EF1结果存在的可能性较小。

Conclusion: 该研究扩展了个体设置中的公平分配结果，将其推广到可变组的设置，并考虑了物品的特定结构（路径）和概率模型，为公平分配理论提供了新的见解。

Abstract: We study the fair allocation of indivisible goods with variable groups. In this model, the goal is to partition the agents into groups of given sizes and allocate the goods to the groups in a fair manner. We show that for any number of groups and corresponding sizes, there always exists an envy-free up to one good (EF1) outcome, thereby generalizing an important result from the individual setting. Our result holds for arbitrary monotonic utilities and comes with an efficient algorithm. We also prove that an EF1 outcome is guaranteed to exist even when the goods lie on a path and each group must receive a connected bundle. In addition, we consider a probabilistic model where the utilities are additive and drawn randomly from a distribution. We show that if there are $n$ agents, the number of goods $m$ is divisible by the number of groups $k$, and all groups have the same size, then an envy-free outcome exists with high probability if $m = ω(\log n)$, and this bound is tight. On the other hand, if $m$ is not divisible by $k$, then an envy-free outcome is unlikely to exist as long as $m = o(\sqrt{n})$.

</details>


### [542] [LLM-Guided Reinforcement Learning with Representative Agents for Traffic Modeling](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06260)
*Hanlin Sun,Jiayang Li*

Main category: cs.GT

TL;DR: LLM行为代理可扩展性差、决策不透明、动力学不稳定。本文提出了一种代表性LLM代理模型，通过单一代理代表同质群体，提高可扩展性，稳定学习，并生成可解释的决策逻辑。该模型在经典和复杂的交通分配场景中均表现出快速收敛、稳定性和可解释性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统LLM代理在交通模型中存在可扩展性差、决策不透明、动力学不稳定等问题，限制了其实际应用。

Method: 提出一种代表性LLM代理模型，用单一LLM代理模拟一个同质旅行者群体，该代理维护并更新混合策略，并根据每日出行经验进行学习和调整。

Result: 该模型在经典交通分配问题中快速收敛至用户均衡。在包含收入异质性、多标准成本和多模式选择的复杂场景中，模型学习动态保持稳定且可解释，并能复现心理学和经济学中的行为模式，如诱饵效应和高收入人群对便利性的更高支付意愿。

Conclusion: 代表性LLM代理模型在可扩展性、稳定性和可解释性方面优于传统LLM代理，能够有效应用于复杂的交通分配场景，并生成符合行为经济学规律的预测。

Abstract: Large language models (LLMs) are increasingly used as behavioral proxies for self-interested travelers in agent-based traffic models. Although more flexible and generalizable than conventional models, the practical use of these approaches remains limited by scalability due to the cost of calling one LLM for every traveler. Moreover, it has been found that LLM agents often make opaque choices and produce unstable day-to-day dynamics. To address these challenges, we propose to model each homogeneous traveler group facing the same decision context with a single representative LLM agent who behaves like the population's average, maintaining and updating a mixed strategy over routes that coincides with the group's aggregate flow proportions. Each day, the LLM reviews the travel experience and flags routes with positive reinforcement that they hope to use more often, and an interpretable update rule then converts this judgment into strategy adjustments using a tunable (progressively decaying) step size. The representative-agent design improves scalability, while the separation of reasoning from updating clarifies the decision logic while stabilizing learning. In classic traffic assignment settings, we find that the proposed approach converges rapidly to the user equilibrium. In richer settings with income heterogeneity, multi-criteria costs, and multi-modal choices, the generated dynamics remain stable and interpretable, reproducing plausible behavioral patterns well-documented in psychology and economics, for example, the decoy effect in toll versus non-toll road selection, and higher willingness-to-pay for convenience among higher-income travelers when choosing between driving, transit, and park-and-ride options.

</details>


### [543] [Colonel Blotto with Battlefield Games](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06518)
*Salam Afiouni,Jakub Cerny,Chun Kai Ling,Christian Kroer*

Main category: cs.GT

TL;DR: 该论文研究了一类新的 Colonel Blotto 游戏，其中玩家在分配士兵后，可以在每个战场上进行独立的、由士兵分配决定的常规形式博弈，并探讨了线性聚合和最坏情况战场价值两种聚合目标。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 这篇论文的动机在于将经典的 Colonel Blotto 游戏推广到更一般的场景，其中每个战场上的博弈结果不仅取决于士兵的相对分配，还可能受到分配方式本身的影响，从而使问题更贴近现实世界的复杂性。

Method: 论文研究了离散和连续的士兵分配模型，并分析了两种聚合目标（线性聚合和最坏情况战场价值）下的纳什均衡的存在性和可计算性。在遇到非凸-凹问题时，论文提出了重构策略空间的方法来恢复凸-凹结构。

Result: 通过在合成和现实世界的安全应用实例上评估所提出的方法，研究表明这些方法在实践中具有良好的可扩展性。

Conclusion: 该研究成功地为一类新的 Colonel Blotto 游戏设计了算法，并在多种场景下分析了纳什均衡，证明了其在实践中的有效性和可扩展性。

Abstract: We study a class of two-player zero-sum Colonel Blotto games in which, after allocating soldiers across battlefields, players engage in (possibly distinct) normal-form games on each battlefield. Per-battlefield payoffs are parameterized by the soldier allocations. This generalizes the classical Blotto setting, where outcomes depend only on relative soldier allocations. We consider both discrete and continuous allocation models and examine two types of aggregate objectives: linear aggregation and worst-case battlefield value. For each setting, we analyze the existence and computability of Nash equilibrium. The general problem is not convex-concave, which limits the applicability of standard convex optimization techniques. However, we show that in several settings it is possible to reformulate the strategy space in a way where convex-concave structure is recovered. We evaluate the proposed methods on synthetic and real-world instances inspired by security applications, suggesting that our approaches scale well in practice.

</details>


### [544] [GenAI vs. Human Creators: Procurement Mechanism Design in Two-/Three-Layer Markets](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06559)
*Rui Ai,David Simchi-Levi,Haifeng Xu*

Main category: cs.GT

TL;DR: 生成式AI（GenAI）的快速发展给适应其独特特征的机制设计带来了新的理论和实践挑战。本文研究了具有数据可转移性的非线性采购机制设计，其中在线平台同时使用人类创作者和GenAI来满足跨领域的内容需求。我们提出了最大化平台收入或社会福利的最优机制，并确定了使高维设计问题可处理的GenAI的特定属性。分析还揭示了哪些领域面临更强的竞争压力，哪些领域倾向于出现生产过剩。此外，数据中介（如Scale AI和The New York Times等内容创作者组织）的日益增长的作用为传统的平台-创作者结构引入了第三层。我们发现，这种三层市场可能导致双输局面，降低平台收入和社会福利，因为大型预签合同扭曲了创作者的激励，并导致数据市场效率低下。这些发现表明需要对GenAI数据生态系统进行政府监管，并且我们的理论见解得到了数值模拟的支持。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 生成式AI（GenAI）的兴起带来了新的机制设计挑战，特别是当内容在不同领域具有可转移性时。本文旨在研究在这种背景下，在线平台如何设计最优的采购机制，以最大化平台收入或社会福利，并理解GenAI的数据可转移性对其设计的影响。

Method: 本文提出并分析了用于数据可转移性场景下的非线性采购机制。研究了GenAI的特定属性如何使高维设计问题变得易于处理，并分析了三层市场（平台-创作者-数据中介）对平台收入和社会福利的影响。通过数值模拟来验证理论见解。

Result: 我们提出了最优机制，可以最大化平台收入或社会福利。识别了GenAI的特定属性，这些属性使得高维设计问题可处理。揭示了哪些领域面临更强的竞争压力，以及哪些领域可能出现生产过剩。发现三层市场可能导致双输局面，降低平台收入和社会福利。

Conclusion: 数据可转移性是GenAI时代机制设计中的一个关键因素。数据中介的引入可能导致市场失灵，从而需要政府对GenAI数据生态系统进行监管。理论分析和数值模拟都支持这些结论。

Abstract: With the rapid advancement of generative AI (GenAI), mechanism design adapted to its unique characteristics poses new theoretical and practical challenges. Unlike traditional goods, content from one domain can enhance the training and performance of GenAI models in other domains. For example, OpenAI's video generation model Sora (Liu et al., 2024b) relies heavily on image data to improve video generation quality. In this work, we study nonlinear procurement mechanism design under data transferability, where online platforms employ both human creators and GenAI to satisfy cross-domain content demand. We propose optimal mechanisms that maximize either platform revenue or social welfare and identify the specific properties of GenAI that make such high-dimensional design problems tractable. Our analysis further reveals which domains face stronger competitive pressure and which tend to experience overproduction. Moreover, the growing role of data intermediaries, including labeling companies such as Scale AI and creator organizations such as The Wall Street Journal, introduces a third layer into the traditional platform-creator structure. We show that this three-layer market can result in a lose-lose outcome, reducing both platform revenue and social welfare, as large pre-signed contracts distort creators' incentives and lead to inefficiencies in the data market. These findings suggest a need for government regulation of the GenAI data ecosystem, and our theoretical insights are further supported by numerical simulations.

</details>


### [545] [Transforming Strategic Games into Biform Games: Applications in Allocation Mechanisms and Green Technology Investment](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06858)
*Xiang Shuwen,Luo Enquan,Yang Yanlong*

Main category: cs.GT

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种将合作与竞争并存的策略博弈转化为双层博弈模型的方法，并分析了边际主义和平均主义两种分配方法对博弈结果的影响，最后以食品生产商的合作定价为例进行了应用分析。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现实世界中的博弈常常同时包含竞争与合作，但传统博弈模型难以同时处理这两种情况。因此，需要一种能够保留合作博弈特点并兼顾玩家自身利益最大化目标的方法。

Method: 提出一种将策略博弈转化为双层博弈模型的方法，并基于此模型分析了边际主义和平均主义两种分配方法对博弈结果的影响。

Result: 研究应用所提出的双层博弈模型分析了食品生产商如何通过合作定价寻求利润最大化。

Conclusion: 所提出的双层博弈模型能够有效地处理合作与竞争并存的博弈，并且通过对不同分配机制的分析，为理解和解决实际博弈问题（如合作定价）提供了新的视角。

Abstract: As Aumann stated, cooperation and non-cooperation are different ways of viewing the same game, with the main difference being whether players can reach a binding cooperative agreement. In the real world, many games often coexist competition and cooperation. Based on the above reasons, we propose a method to transform strategic games into a biform game model, which retains the characteristics of cooperative games while considering the ultimate goal of players to maximize their own interests. Furthermore, based on this biform game model, we analyze the impact of two different distribution methods, namely marginalism and egalitarianism, on the game results. As an application, we analyze how food producers seek maximum profits through cooperative pricing.

</details>


### [546] [Sequential Causal Normal Form Games: Theory, Computation, and Strategic Signaling](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06934)
*Dennis Thumm*

Main category: cs.GT

TL;DR: 经典博弈论框架无法很好地捕捉AI代理的有限理性和因果推理能力，尽管引入了顺序因果多智能体系统（S-CMAS），但其在实践中并未带来福利改进，这表明需要新的理论框架。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探究能否将经典博弈论框架扩展到包含AI代理的有限理性和因果推理能力。

Method: 将因果范式博弈（CNFGs）扩展到序贯设置，提出顺序因果多智能体系统（S-CMAS），并整合了Pearl的因果层级概念来处理领导-跟随者交互。理论上，证明了其是PSPACE-完全的，发展了均衡精炼方法，并建立了与信号理论的联系。实践中，通过50多次蒙特卡洛模拟和手工构造的合成实例进行了广泛的实证研究。

Result: 实证结果显示，S-CNE在所有测试场景下，与经典的Stackelberg均衡相比，并未带来任何福利改进。通过反向归纳和理性最佳响应，因果层级区别所带来的策略优势被消除。虽然构建了一个理论示例（ε-理性满足跟随者）说明了潜在的收益，但实践证明，即使是宽松的理性假设，在直觉与最优博弈一致时也可能不足以提供优势。

Conclusion: 经典博弈论扩展在有理选择基础上，与因果推理优势不兼容。这表明需要超越标准Nash均衡的新的理论框架来处理agentic AI。

Abstract: Can classical game-theoretic frameworks be extended to capture the bounded rationality and causal reasoning of AI agents? We investigate this question by extending Causal Normal Form Games (CNFGs) to sequential settings, introducing Sequential Causal Multi-Agent Systems (S-CMAS) that incorporate Pearl's Causal Hierarchy across leader-follower interactions. While theoretically elegant -- we prove PSPACE-completeness, develop equilibrium refinements, and establish connections to signaling theory -- our comprehensive empirical investigation reveals a critical limitation: S-CNE provides zero welfare improvement over classical Stackelberg equilibrium across all tested scenarios. Through 50+ Monte Carlo simulations and hand-crafted synthetic examples, we demonstrate that backward induction with rational best-response eliminates any strategic advantage from causal layer distinctions. We construct a theoretical example illustrating conditions where benefits could emerge ($ε$-rational satisficing followers), though implementation confirms that even relaxed rationality assumptions prove insufficient when good instincts align with optimal play. This negative result provides valuable insight: classical game-theoretic extensions grounded in rational choice are fundamentally incompatible with causal reasoning advantages, motivating new theoretical frameworks beyond standard Nash equilibrium for agentic AI.

</details>


### [547] [Fair Societies: Algorithms for House Allocations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07022)
*Hadi Hosseini,Sanjukta Roy,Aditi Sethia*

Main category: cs.GT

TL;DR: 本文研究了在只有房产方有偏好的情况下，如何为代理进行资源分配以确保公平性。即使最小化嫉妒代理的数量是NP完全问题，本文提出了两种可行的算法方法：一种是在给定初始分配的情况下，通过重新分配有限数量的房产来减少嫉妒代理的数量；另一种是在代理具有单峰偏好的情况下，提出一个多项式时间算法来最小化嫉妒代理的数量，并进一步满足帕累托效率。此外，本文还探讨了算法对其他衡量嫉妒的标准（如总嫉妒、最大嫉妒）的适用性，并通过实证分析展示了公平性与福利之间的权衡。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在资源分配问题中，尤其是一方（如房产）具有不可分割的资源（如器官、课程座位、公共住房）需要分配给多方（代理）时，如何确保公平性是一个重要的问题。最小化嫉妒代理的数量是一个NP完全问题，因此需要寻找可行的算法方法。

Method: 本文提出了两种主要的方法：1. 在给定初始分配的情况下，通过重新分配有限数量的房产来减少嫉妒代理的数量。当代理只偏好有限数量的房产时，存在一个有效的算法。2. 考虑单峰偏好领域，提出一个多项式时间算法来最小化嫉妒代理的数量，并能满足帕累托效率。该算法也可适用于其他衡量嫉妒的标准（如总嫉妒、最大嫉妒）。

Result: 本文提出了有效的算法来处理资源分配中的公平性问题。一个算法能在代理偏好有限的情况下，通过有限的重新分配来减少嫉妒代理的数量。另一个算法在单峰偏好领域能够以多项式时间找到最小化嫉妒代理的分配，并满足帕累托效率。此外，还进行了实证分析来研究公平性与福利的权衡。

Conclusion: 本文为解决资源分配中的公平性问题提供了有效的算法解决方案。通过对有限偏好和单峰偏好两种情况的分析，本文不仅降低了计算复杂度，还提出了能满足帕累托效率的算法。实证分析也为理解公平性与福利之间的关系提供了见解。

Abstract: House Allocations concern with matchings involving one-sided preferences, where houses serve as a proxy encoding valuable indivisible resources (e.g. organs, course seats, subsidized public housing units) to be allocated among the agents. Every agent must receive exactly one resource. We study algorithmic approaches towards ensuring fairness in such settings. Minimizing the number of envious agents is known to be NP-complete (Kamiyama et al. 2021). We present two tractable approaches to deal with the computational hardness. When the agents are presented with an initial allocation of houses, we aim to refine this allocation by reallocating a bounded number of houses to reduce the number of envious agents. We show an efficient algorithm when the agents express preference for a bounded number of houses. Next, we consider single peaked preference domain and present a polynomial time algorithm for finding an allocation that minimize the number of envious agents. We further extend it to satisfy Pareto efficiency. Our former algorithm works for other measures of envy such as total envy, or maximum envy, with suitable modifications. Finally, we present an empirical analysis recording the fairness-welfare trade-off of our algorithms.

</details>


### [548] [The Landscape of Almost Equitable Allocations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07395)
*Hadi Hosseini,Vishwa Prakash HV,Aditi Sethia,Jatin Yadav*

Main category: cs.GT

TL;DR: 在一般估值下，研究了公平划分中的公平性放松条件——“公平性最多一个项目”(EQ1)。证明了在某些条件下EQ1分配的存在性，并提供了计算算法。对于两个代理，在所有代理都同意大捆绑值的符号的假设下，证明了EQ1分配的存在性并给出了计算算法。对于两个以上代理，在特定的估值类别（如双单调估值、子模/超模估值）下，证明了EQ1分配的存在性和多项式时间可计算性。此外，还解决了EQ1分配在非负（或非正）估值下的存在性问题，并证明了在一般估值下，当代理数大于2时，EQ1分配可能不存在，且判定其存在性的计算是困难的。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究了公平划分中公平性的放松条件EQ1，因为公平性分配可能不存在，尤其是在存在负估值的物品时。需要寻找一种更宽松的条件，即EQ1，并研究其存在性和计算方法。

Method: 对于两个代理，在所有代理都同意大捆绑值的符号的假设下，证明了EQ1分配的存在性并给出了计算算法。对于两个以上代理，在双单调估值、子模/超模估值（且大捆绑值为非负/非正）以及非负/非正估值下，证明了EQ1分配的存在性和多项式时间可计算性。最后，证明了一般情况下，当代理数大于2时，EQ1分配可能不存在，且判定其存在性的计算是困难的。

Result: 证明了在特定条件下EQ1分配的存在性，并给出了计算算法。例如，对于两个代理且同意大捆绑值符号的假设下，EQ1分配存在且可计算。对于多于两个代理的情况，在双单调估值、子模/超模估值以及非负/非正估值下，EQ1分配存在且可计算。然而，在一般情况下，对于多于两个代理，EQ1分配可能不存在，且判定其存在性的计算是困难的。

Conclusion: EQ1分配在特定条件下是存在的，并且对于某些情况存在有效的计算算法。然而，在更一般的情况下，EQ1分配可能不存在，并且判定其存在性的计算复杂度很高。这为公平划分领域的研究提供了新的见解和方向。

Abstract: Equitability is a fundamental notion in fair division which requires that all agents derive equal value from their allocated bundles. We study, for general (possibly non-monotone) valuations, a popular relaxation of equitability known as equitability up to one item (EQ1). An EQ1 allocation may fail to exist even with additive non-monotone valuations; for instance, when there are two agents, one valuing every item positively and the other negatively. This motivates a mild and natural assumption: all agents agree on the sign of their value for the grand bundle. Under this assumption, we prove the existence and provide an efficient algorithm for computing EQ1 allocations for two agents with general valuations. When there are more than two agents, we show the existence and polynomial-time computability of EQ1 allocations for valuation classes beyond additivity and monotonicity, in particular for (1) doubly monotone valuations and (2) submodular (resp. supermodular) valuations where the value for the grand bundle is nonnegative (resp. nonpositive) for all agents. Furthermore, we settle an open question of Bil`o et al. by showing that an EQ1 allocation always exists for nonnegative(resp. nonpositive) valuations, i.e., when every agent values each subset of items nonnegatively (resp. nonpositively). Finally, we complete the picture by showing that for general valuations with more than two agents, EQ1 allocations may not exist even when agents agree on the sign of the grand bundle, and that deciding the existence of an EQ1 allocation is computationally intractable.

</details>


<div id='cs.GR'></div>
