### [549] [Modeling and Topology Estimation of Low Rank Dynamical Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06674)
*Wenqi Cao,Aming Li*

Main category: cs.GR

TL;DR: 为低秩动态网络提出了一种可识别的因果模型，并通过因果维纳滤波建立了稀疏性和条件格兰杰因果性的联系，从而开发出一种网络边缘估计方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的动态网络拓扑学习方法不适用于具有低秩特性的过程。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种低秩动态网络模型，该模型确保了可识别性。

Method: 利用因果维纳滤波，建立了一个连接滤波器稀疏模式和条件格兰杰因果性的充要条件。基于这个理论结果，开发了一种估计所有网络边缘的一致性方法。

Result: 模拟结果表明了所提出框架的简洁性和拓扑估计方法的一致性。

Conclusion: 所提出的低秩动态网络模型能够解决传统方法在处理低秩特性时的局限性，并通过理论和模拟验证了其有效性。

Abstract: Conventional topology learning methods for dynamical networks become inapplicable to processes exhibiting low-rank characteristics. To address this, we propose the low rank dynamical network model which ensures identifiability. By employing causal Wiener filtering, we establish a necessary and sufficient condition that links the sparsity pattern of the filter to conditional Granger causality. Building on this theoretical result, we develop a consistent method for estimating all network edges. Simulation results demonstrate the parsimony of the proposed framework and consistency of the topology estimation approach.

</details>


<div id='cond-mat.mtrl-sci'></div>

# cond-mat.mtrl-sci [[Back]](#toc)

### [550] [Surface acoustic wave enabled all-optical determination of the interlayer elastic constants of van der Waals interface](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05703)
*N. Yu. Frolov,A. Yu. Klokov,A. I. Sharkov,M. V. Pugachev,A. Yu. Kuntsevich*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 表面声波在二维材料与衬底相互作用的研究。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 了解二维材料与衬底的界面性质对于器件应用至关重要。

Method: 使用聚焦飞秒激光脉冲在模型系统（h-BN薄片上方的熔融石英）表面产生超声波，并通过全光空间分辨泵浦-探测干涉技术测量表面垂直速度分布的空间依赖性。

Result: 在hBN薄片区域观察到表面声波频散现象，并获得了hBN与衬底之间的纵波和剪切弹性耦合常数 $c^*_{33}$ 和 $c^*_{44}$。

Conclusion: 表面声波频散可以提供二维材料与衬底之间相互作用的独特信息，并可用于量化其弹性耦合常数。

Abstract: Understanding the properties of two-dimensional materials interfaces with the substrate is necessary for device applications. Surface acoustic wave propagation through the layered material flake on a substrate could provide unique information on the transverse rigidity of the flake-to-substrate interaction. We generate ultrasonic waves by a focused femtosecond laser pulse at the surface of the model system -- fused silica with h-BN flake transferred above. Using an all-optical spatially resolved pump-probe interferometric technique, we measure the spatial dependencies of the surface vertical velocity profiles. Our measurements reveal the appearance of the surface acoustic wave dispersion in the hBN flake region compared to fused silica surface. Multilayer modeling allows us to gain access to longitudinal and shear elastic coupling constants $c^*_{33}$ and $c^*_{44}$ between hexagonal BN and substrate.

</details>


### [551] [Exchange field induced symmetry breaking in quantum hexaborides](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05738)
*D. Rivera,Fernando P. Sabino,H. Raebiger,A. Ruzsinszky,J. P. Perdew,G. M. Dalpian*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Symmetry breaking (SB) can describe quantum materials; this paper explores spin SB on EuB6 and SmB6 using DFT to compare magnetic configurations and their effects on onsite properties, showing that PM configuration leads to distinct magnetic environments and exchange fields, thus inducing SB in electronic and magnetic properties, offering an alternative explanation for experimental results.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Symmetry breaking (SB) is a powerful approach for describing quantum materials, capturing phenomena like strong correlation, mass renormalization, and phase transitions, even when coupled to mean-field-like theories. This paper aims to explore spin SB on EuB6 and SmB6 and its relation to the exchange field in determining onsite properties based on the type of symmetry breaking.

Method: The study utilizes spin-polarized Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations with the r2SCAN functional. Four magnetic configurations are systematically compared: a non-magnetic (NM) configuration, ferromagnetic (FM), antiferromagnetic (AFM), and a paramagnetic (PM) configuration modeled using the Special Quasirandom Structure (SQS) method to account for local symmetry-breaking effects.

Result: The results indicate that the paramagnetic (PM) configuration creates unique magnetic environments for the rare-earth atoms, leading to varying exchange fields. These variations, in turn, induce symmetry breaking in the electronic and magnetic characteristics of Europium (Eu) and Samarium (Sm).

Conclusion: The findings provide an alternative explanation for experimental observations in EuB6 and SmB6, where techniques like X-ray Absorption Spectroscopy (XAS) and X-ray Absorption Near Edge Structure (XANES) previously suggested multiple atomic environments, attributed to a mixed-valence configuration. This study demonstrates that spin symmetry breaking offers a viable alternative interpretation.

Abstract: Symmetry breaking (SB) has proven to be a powerful approach for describing quantum materials: strong correlation, mass renormalization, and complex phase transitions are among the phenomena that SB can capture, even when coupled to a mean-field-like theory. Traditionally, corrective schemes were required to account for these effects; however, SB has emerged as an alternative that can also successfully describe the intricate physics of quantum materials. Here, we explore spin SB on EuB6 and SmB6 and how its relation to the exchange field can determine onsite properties, depending on the type of symmetry breaking. Using spin-polarized Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations with the r2SCAN functional, we systematically compare four magnetic configurations, one totally symmetric - non-magnetic (NM) configuration - and three with different types of symmetry breaking: ferromagnetic (FM), antiferromagnetic (AFM) and a paramagnetic (PM) configuration - modeled through a Special Quasirandom Structure (SQS) method - to capture local symmetry-breaking effects. Our results show that the PM configuration produces distinct magnetic environments for the rare-earth atoms, leading to different exchange fields. These, in turn, induce symmetry breaking in the electronic and magnetic properties of Eu and Sm. Those results provide an alternative explanation for the experimental results on both materials, EuB6 and SmB6, where X-ray Absorption Spectroscopy (XAS) and X-ray Absorption Near Edge Structure (XANES) measurements suggest the presence of multiple atomic environments, previously attributed to a mixed-valence configuration.

</details>


### [552] [From Quantum Annealing to Alloy Discovery: Towards Accelerated Design of High-Entropy Alloys](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05750)
*Diego Ibarra-Hoyos,Peter Connors,Ho Jang,Nathan Grain,Israel Klich,Gia-Wei Chern,Peter K. Liaw,John R. Scully,Joseph Poon*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 量子退火结合机器学习（QaML）框架通过特征选择、QUBO形式的SVM训练和QUBO形式的神经网络剪枝来解决材料发现中的数据稀疏性和离散优化挑战。该框架通过递归分批处理克服了当前量子比特的限制，并在高熵合金（HEAs）上进行了验证，发现了一种具有优异机械性能和电化学性能的新型合金。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 材料发现中的数据稀疏性以及特征选择和模型调优的离散优化本质，常常导致经典方法陷入局部最优解。

Method: 提出了一种量子辅助机器学习（QaML）框架，利用量子退火解决特征选择、支持向量机训练（QUBO形式）和神经网络剪枝（QUBO形式）等组合优化问题。通过递归分批处理来处理大的特征空间，并应用此框架于高熵合金的性能预测。

Result: 所提出的量子辅助机器学习框架在高熵合金的断裂应变分类和屈服强度回归任务上表现出优于经典方法的泛化能力。并通过实验验证，发现了一种Al8Cr38Fe50Mn2Ti2（at.%）单相BCC合金，其屈服强度为568 MPa，压缩应变量大于40%，且在酸性介质中临界电流密度比304不锈钢低一个数量级。

Conclusion: 量子退火是一种实用的方法，能够克服经典优化的局限性，从而加速材料的发现。

Abstract: Data scarcity remains a central challenge in materials discovery, where finding meaningful descriptors and tuning models for generalization is critical but inherently a discrete optimization problem prone to multiple local minima confounding the true optimal state. Classical methods often get trapped in these minima, while quantum annealing can escape them via quantum fluctuations, including tunneling, that overcome narrow energy barriers. We present a quantum-assisted machine-learning (QaML) framework that employs quantum annealing to address these combinatorial optimization challenges through feature selection, support-vector training formulated in QUBO form for classification and regression, and a new QUBO-based neural-network pruning formulation. Recursive batching enables quantum annealing to handle large feature spaces beyond current qubit limits, while quantum-pruned networks exhibit superior generalization over classical methods, suggesting that quantum annealing preferentially samples flatter, more stable regions of the loss landscape. Applied to high-entropy alloys (HEAs), a data-limited but compositionally complex testbed, the framework integrates models for fracture-strain classification and yield-strength regression under physics-based constraints. The framework identified and experimentally validated Al8Cr38Fe50Mn2Ti2 (at.%), a single-phase BCC alloy exhibiting a 0.2 % yield strength of 568 MPa, greater than 40 % compressive strain without fracture, and a critical current density in reducing acid nearly an order of magnitude lower than 304 stainless steel. These results establish QA as a practical route to overcome classical optimization limits and accelerate materials discovery.

</details>


### [553] [Novel Pressure-Induced Transformations of PbTiO3](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05756)
*Husam Farraj,Stefano Racioppi,Gaston Garbarino,Muhtar Ahart,Anshuman Mondal,Samuel G. Parra,Jesse S. Smith,R. E. Cohen,Eva Zurek,Jordi Cabana,Russell J. Hemley*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 研究了铅钛矿（PbTiO3）在高压（高达100 GPa）和高温下的行为，发现在不同压力-温度（PT）条件下会产生不同的相变和分解行为，并揭示了其平衡相和亚稳相的稳定性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究铅钛矿（PbTiO3）在高压高温条件下的行为，以理解其相变、分解以及不同压力-温度（PT）合成路径对相稳定性的影响。

Method: 结合同步辐射X射线衍射和密度泛函理论（DFT）计算，研究了铅钛矿在室温和激光加热条件下的行为。

Result: 在高温高压下，PbTiO3分解为PbO和TiO2；在室温压缩下，PbTiO3在高压下保持四方相。激光加热产生不同的PbO相（α-PbO和未曾报道的δ-PbO），并在减压时转变为β-PbO。计算表明α-PbO在高压下会金属性化，而δ-PbO和β-PbO则保持半导体特性。

Conclusion: 在高压和高温下，PbTiO3表现出与室温压缩下不同的行为，其分解和相变行为对压力-温度条件敏感。实验和理论结果揭示了不同的PT合成路径可以稳定不同的平衡相和亚稳相，展现了PbTiO3行为的复杂性。

Abstract: We investigated the behavior of lead titanate (PbTiO3) up to 100 GPa, both at room temperature and upon laser heating, using synchrotron X ray diffraction combined with density functional theory (DFT) computations. At the high pressure temperature (PT) conditions produced in laser heated diamond anvil cells, PbTiO3 dissociates into PbO and TiO2, consistent with our DFT computations showing that decomposition becomes enthalpically favored above 65 GPa. In contrast, on room temperature compression, PbTiO3 persists in the tetragonal I4mcm phase up to at least 100 GPa. Laser heating produces distinct PbO phases: a compressed form of alpha PbO and a previously unreported delta PbO polymorph, both of which transform to beta PbO on decompression. The calculations predict that alpha PbO undergoes pressure-induced band gap closure, metallizing above 70 GPa, whereas the delta and beta phases remain semiconducting with a band gap above 1 eV even at megabar pressures. The experimental and confirming theoretical results reveal an unanticipated dimension of the behavior of PbTiO3, showing that distinct equilibrium and metastable phases can be stabilized along different PT synthesis paths.

</details>


### [554] [Impact of electron-phonon interaction on the electronic structure of interfaces between organic molecules and a MoS$_2$ monolayer](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05781)
*Ignacio Gonzalez Oliva,Sebastian Tillack,Fabio Caruso,Pasquale Pavone,Claudia Draxl*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 电子-声子相互作用影响杂化界面（MoS2和有机分子）的电子结构，导致带隙重整化和分子振动特征的出现。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究电子-声子相互作用在由MoS2和有机分子（芘和吡啶）形成的杂化界面的电子结构中的作用，以及其对带隙重整化和光谱函数的影响。

Method: 使用第一性原理计算，通过G0W0近似获得准粒子能量，然后评估电子-声子自能和动量分辨光谱函数，以评估带结构的温度重整化。

Result: 杂化体系的带隙重整化与原始MoS2相当（约80 meV）。光谱函数价带区域出现分子特征，归因于有机单层的面外振动模式。芘的卫星主要是分子性质的，而吡啶的卫星则具有杂化性质，源于分子振动与MoS2价带的耦合。

Conclusion: 电子-声子相互作用在MoS2/有机分子杂化界面中起着重要作用，影响带隙并产生具有分子或杂化性质的振动特征。

Abstract: By means of first-principles calculations, we investigate the role of electron-phonon interaction in the electronic structure of hybrid interfaces, formed by MoS$_2$ and monolayers of the organic molecules pyrene and pyridine, respectively. Quasiparticle energies are initially obtained within the $G_0W_0$ approximation and subsequently used to evaluate the electron-phonon self-energy and momentum-resolved spectral functions to assess the temperature renormalization of the band structure. We find that the band-gap renormalization by zero-point vibrations of both hybrid systems is comparable to that of pristine MoS$_2$, with a value of approximately 80 meV. Pronounced features of molecular origin emerge in the spectral function of the valence region, which we attribute to satellites arising from out-of-plane vibrational modes of the organic monolayers. For pyrene, this satellite exhibits a predominantly molecular character, while for pyridine, it has a hybrid nature, originating from the coupling of molecular vibrations to the MoS$_2$ valence band.

</details>


### [555] [Strain-Tunable Spin Filtering and Valley Splitting Coexisting with Anomalous Hall Effect in 2D Half-Metallic VSe2/VN Heterostructure: Toward a Unified Spintronic-Valleytronic Platform](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06069)
*Vivek Chowdhury,Ahmed Zubair*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: VSe2/VN 异质结在谷电子学和自旋电子学领域展现出巨大潜力，其稳定的结构、优异的电子特性（如半金属趋势、显著的谷劈裂和自旋不对称性）以及高自旋过滤效率（高达 82.5%），并支持异常霍尔效应和谷区分异的 Berry 曲率，有望实现室温附近的铁磁性，为集成谷电子和自旋电子器件提供了一个可调控的平台。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有二维材料在提供鲁棒的谷劈裂和强自旋选择性方面存在不足，限制了谷电子学和自旋电子学的发展。

Method: 采用第一性原理密度泛函理论、声子计算、ab initio 分子动力学稳定性测试、Bader 电荷分析和基于 Wannier 的 Berry 曲率计算。

Result: 1. 证明了 VSe2/VN 异质结的能量学和动力学稳定性，并观察到层间电荷转移。
2. PBE 计算显示了 108.9 meV 的间接带隙，HSE06 计算显示出半金属趋势。
3. 存在显著的传导带谷劈裂（自旋向上为 22.9 meV，自旋向下为 61.3 meV）。
4. 表现出强烈的自旋不对称性：自旋向下通道具有 0.64 eV 的宽半导体带隙，而自旋向上通道近乎无带隙。
5. 在零应变下，自旋过滤效率 P = 75.4%，在 +4% 双轴拉伸应变下可调至 82.5%。
6. 异质结支持非零、谷区分异的 Berry 曲率，并具有较大的异常霍尔电导率（峰值 sigmaxy = 568.33 S/cm）。
7. 零应变下铁磁居里温度 Tc 接近室温 (284.04 K)，+4% 应变下降低至 183.9 K。

Conclusion: VSe2/VN 异质结是一种实际可行且可应变调控的平台，适用于集成谷电子、自旋电子器件，并可用于探索异常霍尔效应和谷依赖的输运现象。

Abstract: Rapid progress in valleytronics and spintronics is limited by the scarcity of two-dimensional materials that simultaneously provide robust valley splitting and strong spin selectivity. Here we showed that a van der Waals heterostructure (VSe2/VN) built from hexagonal VSe2 and hexagonal VN addressed this gap. Using first-principles density functional theory, phonon, ab initio molecular dynamics stability tests, Bader charge analysis, and Wannier-based Berry-curvature calculations, we demonstrated an energetically and dynamically stable heterostructure that exhibited interlayer charge transfer and a work function intermediate between the constituent monolayers. The electronic structure showed small indirect PBE gap (108.9 meV), with HSE06 indicating a half-metallic tendency; a sizable conduction-band valley splitting (ΔCKK' = 22.9 meV for spin-up and ΔCKK' = 61.3 meV for spin-down); and pronounced spin asymmetry, where the spin-down channel showed a wide semiconducting gap (0.64 eV) while the spin-up channel was nearly gapless. These features yielded a high zero-strain spin-filter efficiency P = 75.4%, tunable to 82.5% under +4% biaxial tensile strain. The heterostructure also supported non-zero, valley-contrasting Berry curvature, and a large anomalous Hall conductivity (peak sigmaxy = 568.33 S/cm). Importantly, mean-field estimation placed the ferromagnetic Curie temperature near room temperature at zero strain (Tc = 284.04 K), while Tc decreased to 183.9 K at +4% strain, the magnetic order remained robust to cryogenic temperatures, providing a beneficial tuning knob to balance spin-filter performance with thermal stability in device-relevant regimes. These results identified VSe2/VN as a practical, strain-tunable platform for integrated valleytronic, spintronic devices, and for exploring anomalous Hall and valley-dependent transport phenomena.

</details>


### [556] [Targeted synthesis of polycrystalline vanadium dioxide thin films via post-deposition annealing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06092)
*Kirill Trunov,Yuri Lebedinskii,Ilya Zavidovskiy,Sergey Novikov,Alexander Morozov,Petr Shvets,Ksenia Maksimova,Andrei Zenkevich,Anton Khanas*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过在室温下使用金属V靶在氧气气氛中进行反应式脉冲激光沉积，然后进行真空退火，可以合成用于新形态硬件的VO2薄膜。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了提高人工神经网络的计算效率并降低能耗，需要开发模拟突触和神经元行为的电子元件，而阈值电阻开关（忆阻器）可用于实现电子人工神经元。钒氧化物（VO2）因其在约70°C时表现出的金属-绝缘体转变特性而被广泛用作阈值开关材料，但其合成条件（温度和气体气氛）限制了其与CMOS的集成。

Method: 提出了一种新的VO2合成方法：在室温下使用金属V靶在氧气气氛中进行反应式脉冲激光沉积，随后进行真空退火。通过精确控制室温沉积过程中的氧气压力，可以合成多晶薄膜形式的合适VO2相，从而放宽了对高温氧气氛加热等设备的要求。

Result: 该方法能够在接近生产后端CMOS制造的条件下成功合成目标VO2，表明其在大规模微电子集成和新形态硬件创建方面具有潜力。

Conclusion: 所提出的VO2合成方法克服了传统方法的局限性，为将VO2集成到CMOS工艺中以用于新形态硬件的创建铺平了道路。

Abstract: Implementation of neuromorphic hardware is a promising way to improve the computing efficiency and decrease the energy consumption of artificial neural networks. For this purpose, electronic elements emulating the behavior of synapses and neurons have to be developed. In order to realize electronic artificial neurons, threshold resistive switches or memristors can be efficiently used. One of the most widespread materials for threshold switches is vanadium dioxide due to its property to demonstrate the metal-insulator transition at a temperature about 70 °C. However, the processes of VO$_{2}$ synthesis are quite restrictive in temperature and gas atmosphere conditions, which hinders its integration into CMOS fabrication. In this work, we propose a new method of VO$_{2}$ synthesis: reactive pulsed laser deposition from metallic V target in oxygen atmosphere at room temperature, followed by vacuum annealing. Our method enables target synthesis of an appropriate VO$_{2}$ phase in a polycrystalline thin film form by finely tuning oxygen pressure during room temperature deposition, which allows to relax the equipment demands, such as high temperature heating in oxygen. Successful targeted VO$_{2}$ synthesis under fabrication conditions close to back-end-of-line CMOS production, achieved in this work, show the way toward its large-scale microelectronic integration for neuromorphic hardware creation.

</details>


### [557] [Phonon-Dominated Thermal Transport and Large Violation of the Wiedemann-Franz Law in Topological Semimetal CoSi](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06290)
*Luyao Zhong,Xin Jin,Mingquan He,Rui Wang,Xiaoyuan Zhou,Tianqi Deng,Xiaolong Yang*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: CoSi是一种拓扑半金属，其电子洛伦兹数比索末菲值高出约40%，这是由于强的双极扩散输运造成的，同时晶格热导率也异常大，在室温以下占主导地位。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation:  Wiedemann-Franz (WF) 定律在热电材料设计和晶格热导率测定中至关重要，但通常会因非弹性散射而违反。然而，在拓扑半金属 CoSi 中观察到了 WF 定律的显著偏离，表现为电子洛伦兹数 L_e 相对于索末菲值 L_0 的增加。

Method: 通过实验研究拓扑半金属 CoSi 的热输运性质，分析其电子和晶格热导率，并计算电子洛伦兹数 L_e，与索末菲值 L_0 进行比较。

Result: 在 CoSi 中，电子洛伦兹数 L_e 比 L_0 高出约 40%。这种异常现象归因于拓扑带引起的电子-空穴补偿而产生的强双极扩散输运，从而增强了热流。此外，晶格热导率 K_L 异常大，在室温以下成为主导成分。如果忽略 K_L，则总洛伦兹数会与 L_0 产生超过三倍的偏差。

Conclusion: CoSi 的研究揭示了拓扑半金属中非传统的输运物理现象，特别是其显著偏离 WF 定律的特性，并强调了在分析此类材料时考虑晶格热导率的重要性。

Abstract: The Wiedemann-Franz (WF) law, relating the electronic thermal conductivity ($κ_{\rm e}$) to the electrical conductivity, is vital in numerous applications such as in the design of thermoelectric materials and in the experimental determination of the lattice thermal conductivity ($κ_{\rm L}$). While the WF law is generally robust, violations are frequently observed, typically manifesting in a reduced Lorenz number ($L$) relative to the Sommerfeld value ($L_0$) due to inelastic scattering. Here, we report a pronounced departure from the WF law in the topological semimetal CoSi, where the electronic Lorenz number ($L_{\rm e}$) instead rises up to $\sim40\%$ above $L_0$. We demonstrate that this anomaly arises from strong bipolar diffusive transport, enabled by topological band-induced electron-hole compensation, which allows electrons and holes to flow cooperatively and additively enhance the heat current. Concurrently, we unveil that the lattice contribution to thermal conductivity is anomalously large and becomes the dominant component below room temperature. As a result, if $κ_{\rm L}$ is assumed negligible -- as conventional in metals, the resulting $L$ from the total thermal conductivity ($κ_{\rm tot}=κ_{\rm L}+κ_{\rm e}$) deviates from $L_0$ by more than a factor of three. Our work provides deeper insight into the unconventional thermal transport physics in topological semimetals.

</details>


### [558] [Magnetic and structural properties of epitaxial Er-substituted yttrium iron garnet films grown by pulsed laser deposition](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06324)
*Lukas Flajsman,Lars Peeters,Armi Kosunen,Lide Yao,Ionela Vrejoiu,Sebastiaan van Dijken*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Er:YIG薄膜在(111)GGG衬底上外延生长，在保持YIG低磁阻尼的同时引入了光功能性，为混合光磁器件和微波-光学量子变换提供了可行平台。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Er:YIG结合了YIG的低磁阻尼和Er3+的电信频段光学跃迁的潜力，适用于混合光磁器件和微波-光学量子变换。

Method: 使用脉冲激光沉积在(111)GGG衬底上外延生长了不同Er含量(x=0.008-0.20)的ErxY3-xFe5O12薄膜，并通过X射线衍射、倒易空间映射和扫描透射电子显微镜进行表征。

Result: 生长出的Er:YIG薄膜为单相、全相干生长，界面清晰。磁量测量显示饱和磁化强度随Er含量增加而降低，矫顽力矩和非均匀线宽随Er浓度增加而变宽。低Er含量(x=0.008)薄膜几乎保持了各向同性磁化，阻尼参数略高于未掺杂YIG。

Conclusion: 该研究确定了保持YIG低损耗磁性并引入光学功能的生长和掺杂条件，确立了Er:YIG作为混合量子磁学和微波-光学变换的可行平台。

Abstract: Er-substituted yttrium iron garnet (Er:YIG) holds the potential of combining the low magnetic damping of YIG with the telecom-band optical transitions of $\text{Er}^{3+}$ ions, making it a suitable material for hybrid optomagnonic devices and microwave-to-optical quantum transduction. We report the epitaxial growth of $\text{Er}_{x}\text{Y}_{3-x}\text{Fe}_{5}\text{O}_{12}$ films with $x=0.008-0.20$ on (111)-oriented gadolinium gallium garnet (GGG) substrates using pulsed laser deposition. X-ray diffraction, reciprocal space mapping, and scanning transmission electron microscopy confirm single-phase, fully coherent growth with atomically sharp interfaces across the entire substitution range. Magnetometry reveals a gradual decrease in saturation magnetization with increasing Er content, consistent with antiparallel coupling between Er$^{3+}$ spins and the net Fe$^{3+}$ moments, along with the emergence of an in-plane uniaxial magnetic anisotropy. The ferromagnetic resonance broadens with Er concentration due to increased Gilbert damping and inhomogeneous linewidth broadening. Films with low Er content ($x=0.008$), most relevant for optomagnonic applications, retain nearly isotropic magnetization and exhibit a damping parameter only slightly higher than that of undoped YIG. These results identify growth and substitution conditions that preserve YIG's low-loss magnetic properties while introducing optical functionality, establishing Er:YIG as a viable platform for hybrid quantum magnonics and microwave-to-optical transduction.

</details>


### [559] [Decoupling interface and thickness effects on hydrogen absorption in V/MgO: experiments and DFT](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06381)
*Qiuxiang Zhang,Yan Zhu,Xiaofang Peng,Weiguang Yang,Yuping Le,Xiao Xin*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Error


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Error

Method: Error

Result: Error

Conclusion: Error

Abstract: We report combined experimental and first principles investigations of hydrogen absorption in epitaxial vanadium films on MgO(001) with nominal thicknesses of 10 nm and 50 nm. In - situ optical transmission and four - probe resistance isotherms show that the 50 nm film reproduces bulk like behavior with a clear first order alpha-beta hydride transition, the formation enthalpy and entropy gradually decrease with increasing hydrogen concentration. The 10 nm film, by contrast, displays continuous uptake without plateaus, with formation enthalpies H that are relatively close in magnitude to the 50 nm film (both exhibiting exothermic behavior in the range of approximately 0.5 to 0.3 eV/H), but with a more negative entropy change S (larger S) indicating reduced configurational freedom for hydrogen in the ultrathin limit; the critical temperature for phase coexistence is suppressed below 400 K. Density functional theory calculations on MgO V superlattices (Vn/(MgO)n, n = 3,5,7) reveal pronounced V 3d and O 2p hybridization and interfacial charge redistribution that weaken hydrogen binding near the interface and recover toward bulk values with increasing V thickness. These results indicate that interfacial electronic structure, in addition to finite size energetics, governs hydride stability in ultrathin V films and that layer - thickness and interface engineering can tune reversible hydrogen uptake.

</details>


### [560] [Polarization - Magnetization Coupling in Visible Light Ferroelectric Double Perovskites](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06800)
*Sathiyamoorthy Buvaneswaran,Trilochan Sahoo,Saurabh Ghosh*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: A/A' 订购的双钙钛矿 KLaFeMoO_6 和 NaLaFeMoO_6 被提出作为单相铁电光伏 (FE-PV) 材料，具有高效率的潜力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 铁电体中由反转对称性破坏引起的体光伏效应 (BPVE) 为实现高效率的下一代光伏提供了一条独特的途径。

Method: 采用第一性原理计算和从头开始的分子动力学模拟 (AIMD) 来研究 KLaFeMoO_6 和 NaLaFeMoO_6 的铁电和光伏特性。

Result: 计算显示 KLaFeMoO_6 和 NaLaFeMoO_6 具有稳健的 P2_1 对称性、显著的自发极化、约 1.8 eV 的间接带隙，以及沿极性轴的低载流子有效质量。此外，AIMD 模拟表明，在室温以上可以实现与极化耦合的磁化切换。

Conclusion: KLaFeMoO_6 和 NaLaFeMoO_6 是有前途的单相 FE-PV 材料，具有高效率光伏应用的潜力，并且具有室温应用的可能性。

Abstract: The bulk photovoltaic effect (BPVE), arising from broken inversion symmetry in ferroelectrics, offers a distinct pathway toward high-efficiency next-generation photovoltaics. We propose and investigate A/A$^\prime$-ordered double perovskites KLaFeMoO$_6$ and NaLaFeMoO$_6$ as promising single-phase ferroelectric photovoltaic (FE-PV) materials. First-principles calculations reveal robust P2$_1$ symmetry with A-site layer and B-site rock-salt ordering, accompanied by hybrid improper ferroelectricity driven by $a^{-}a^{-}c^{+}$ octahedral tilts. Both compounds exhibit significant spontaneous polarization and indirect band gaps of $\sim$ 1.8 eV, well suited for visible-light absorption ($>$10$^5$ cm$^{-1}$). Low carrier effective masses along the polar axis indicate efficient charge transport. \textit{Ab initio} molecular dynamics simulations (AIMD) show that polarization-coupled magnetization switching is feasible above room temperature, making these materials suitable for room-temperature applications.

</details>


### [561] [Machine Learning Approach to Predict the Curie Temperature of Fe- and Pt-Based Alloys](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06827)
*Svitlana Ponomarova,Oleksandr Ponomarov,Yurii Koval*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种使用机器学习预测磁性转变温度（居里或尼尔温度）的方法，并验证了投票集成模型结合蒙特卡洛交叉验证的有效性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 预测磁性转变温度（居里或尼尔温度），以避免昂贵的实验过程。

Method: 利用材料的物理和化学性质，通过机器学习算法（投票集成模型）和蒙特卡洛交叉验证来预测居里温度。

Result: 投票集成模型结合蒙特卡洛交叉验证在预测居里温度方面取得了最高的准确率，并使用归一化的均方根误差作为性能指标。

Conclusion: 所提出的机器学习方法为设计和预测三元合金的居里温度提供了一种高效且可靠的策略，并具有潜在的应用前景。

Abstract: Various techniques can be employed to determine the temperature of magnetic transformation, whether it be the Curie or Neel temperature. The standard procedure typically involves creating alloys with defined compositions and performing measurements experimentally. Alternatively, these temperatures can be predicted based on a material known physical and chemical properties prior to experiments. We identified an optimal feature set and selected the most effective algorithm. Our findings show that the Voting Ensemble model, when combined with Monte Carlo cross-validation, achieves the highest prediction accuracy. The normalized root mean squared error serves as the primary performance metric. For implementation, we utilize the Azure Machine Learning framework for its robust computational and integration capabilities. This approach offers an efficient and reliable strategy for designing and predicting the Curie temperature of ternary alloys. The paper also highlights potential applications of the model and its extensions for other systems.

</details>


### [562] [Physical properties and first-principles calculations of an altermagnet candidate Cs$_{1-δ}$V$_2$Te$_2$O](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06865)
*Chang-Chao Liu,Jing Li,Ji-Yong Liu,Jia-Yi Lu,Hua-Xun Li,Yi Liu,Guang-Han Cao*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Cs$_{1-δ}$V$_2$Te$_2$O 是一种具有二维V$_2$O方形网格和Te层的钒基氧碲化物，在293 K时表现出反铁磁性，在70 K时可能出现Lifshitz跃迁。其电子结构计算表明V-$d_{yz}/d_{xz}$电子具有完全的轨道和自旋极化，可能在交变磁性应用中具有潜力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究钒基氧碲化物Cs$_{1-δ}$V$_2$Te$_2$O的晶体生长、结构、物理性质以及第一性原理计算，以探索其潜在的磁性和电子特性。

Method: 通过实验测量（磁化率、比热）和第一性原理计算，研究Cs$_{1-δ}$V$_2$Te$_2$O的磁性、结构和电子性质。

Result: 该材料在293 K时表现出反铁磁性，在70 K时观察到可能的Lifshitz跃迁。第一性原理计算揭示了V$_2$O平面内存在稳健的Néel型反铁磁性，并伴随着动量空间的自旋分裂，V-$d_{yz}/d_{xz}$电子表现出完全的轨道和自旋极化，类似于半金属。

Conclusion: Cs$_{1-δ}$V$_2$Te$_2$O的发现为在钒基氧硫属化物中利用交变磁性提供了基础，并可能在相关领域具有应用潜力。

Abstract: We report the crystal growth, structure, physical properties, and first-principles calculations of a vanadium-based oxytelluride Cs$_{1-δ}$V$_2$Te$_2$O. The material possesses two-dimensional V$_2$O square nets sandwiched by tellurium layers, with local crystallographic symmetry satisfying the spin symmetry for a $d$-wave altermagnet. An antiferromagnetic transition at 293 K is unambiguously evidenced from the measurements of magnetic susceptibility and specific heat. In addition, a secondary transition at $\sim$70 K is also observed, possibly associated with a Lifshitz transition. The first-principles calculations indicate robust Néel-type collinear antiferromagnetism in the V$_2$O plane. Consequently, spin splittings show up in momentum space, in relation with the real-space mirror/rotation symmetry. Interestingly, the V-$d_{yz}/d_{xz}$ electrons, which primarily contribute the quasi-one-dimensional Fermi surface, turns out to be fully orbital- and spin-polarized, akin to the case of a half metal. Our work lays a solid foundation on the potential applications utilizing altermagnetic properties in vanadium-based oxychalcogenides.

</details>


### [563] [Density-dependent sodium-storage mechanisms in hard carbon materials](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06869)
*Alexis Front,Tapio Ala-Nissila,Miguel A. Caro*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 研究了硬碳负极中钠的储存机制，发现碳密度影响储存容量和稳定性，中等密度硬碳表现最佳。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 理解硬碳负极中的钠储存机制对于钠离子电池技术至关重要，但其微观结构和钠相互作用仍未被充分理解。

Method: 采用多尺度方法，结合基于高斯过程势（GAP）框架的机器学习原子间势，以及巨正则系综蒙特卡洛（GCMC）模拟，研究了不同密度（0.7-1.9 g cm$^{-3}$）硬碳中的钠插入机制。

Result: 研究表明，增加碳密度会减小孔隙尺寸和可及性，从而调节吸附、嵌入和孔隙填充对总容量的相对贡献。低密度碳以孔隙填充为主，在接近零电压下实现高容量；高密度碳主要通过吸附和嵌入储存钠，容量较低但更稳定；中等密度碳（1.3-1.6 g cm$^{-3}$）在容量（约400 mAh g$^{-1}$）、安全电压和体积膨胀（<10%）方面表现最为均衡。

Conclusion: 碳密度与电化学行为之间存在直接相关性，为硬碳形貌如何控制钠储存提供了原子尺度的见解。提出的框架为优化基于硬碳的钠离子电池负极以实现高能量密度和长期循环稳定性提供了合理的设想。

Abstract: Understanding the sodium-storage mechanism in hard carbon (HC) anodes is crucial for advancing sodium-ion battery (SIB) technology. However, the intrinsic complexity of HC microstructures and their interactions with sodium remains poorly understood. We present a multiscale methodology that integrates grand-canonical Monte Carlo (GCMC) simulations with a machine-learning interatomic potential based on the Gaussian approximation potential (GAP) framework to investigate sodium insertion mechanisms in hard carbons with densities ranging from 0.7 to 1.9 g cm$^{-3}$. Structural and thermodynamic analyses reveal that increasing carbon density reduces pore size and accessibility, thereby modulating the relative contributions of adsorption, intercalation, and pore filling to the overall storage capacity. Low-density carbons favor pore-filling, achieving extremely high capacities at near-zero voltages, whereas high-density carbons primarily store sodium through adsorption and intercalation, leading to lower but more stable capacities. Intermediate-density carbons ($1.3-1.6$ g cm$^{-3}$) provide the most balanced performance, combining moderate capacity ($\approx 400$ mAh g$^{-1}$), safe operating voltages, and minimal volume expansion ($<10$\%). These findings establish a direct correlation between carbon density and electrochemical behavior, providing atomic-scale insight into how hard carbon morphology governs sodium-storage. The proposed framework offers a rational design principle for optimizing HC-based SIB anodes toward high energy density and long-term cycling stability.

</details>


### [564] [Challenges in predicting positron annihilation lifetimes in lead halide perovskites: correlation functionals and polymorphism](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06926)
*Kajal Madaan,Guido Roma,Jasurbek Gulomov,Pascal Pochet,Catherine Corbel,Ilja Makkonen*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 利用理论计算对卤素钙钛矿的点缺陷进行研究，重点关注电子-正电子相关泛函对寿命计算的影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究卤素钙钛矿点缺陷，特别是空位对材料特性的影响，并解决现有理论与实验结果之间的不一致问题。

Method: 通过理论计算，比较了多种电子-正电子相关泛函（包括加权密度近似 WDA）在不同类型的卤素钙钛矿（MAPbI$_3$、CsPbI$_3$、CsPbBr$_3$）及其不同相（包括含或不含空位）中的应用，并分析了空位大小与寿命的关系以及多晶型对寿命的影响。

Result: 研究表明，电子-正论泛函的选择对钙钛矿材料（尤其是阳离子空位）的寿命计算有显著影响，其影响程度远超金属和传统半导体；加权密度近似（WDA）在描述电子密度变化大的区域表现更好；空位大小与计算出的寿命之间存在关联；多晶型现象也影响寿命的分布。

Conclusion: 电子-正论泛函的选择对卤素钙钛矿的寿命计算至关重要，可能需要重新审视实验寿命的解释。

Abstract: Halide perovskites have emerged in the last decade as a new important class of semiconductors for a variety of optoelectronic applications. A lot of previous studies were thus devoted to the characterisation of their point defects. Positron annihilation spectroscopy is a well recognized tool for probing vacancies in materials. Recent applications of this technique to APbX$_3$ halide perovskites are sparse, and the rare theoretical predictions of positron lifetimes in these materials, published in association with experiments, do not fully agree with each other. These works suggest that vacancies on the A site are not detected.
  In our theoretical study we focus on the role of the electron-positron correlation functional. We thoroughly revisit and compare several approximations when applied to methylammonium lead iodide (MAPbI$_3$) with or without vacancies, as well as inorganic perovskites CsPbI$_3$ and CsPbBr$_3$, in various phases. We show also the relationship between the size of the voids, through Voronoi volumes, and the calculated lifetimes. For the cubic phases we investigate in detail the role of polymorphism, including the distribution of vacancy formation energies and positron annihilation lifetimes.
  In our lifetimes calculations, apart from older and more recent semi-local approximations for the electron-positron correlation potential, we also consider the weighted density approximation (WDA), which is truly non-local and should better describe positron annihilation in regions with strong electronic density variations. We show that for this class of materials, and especially for cations vacancies, the influence of the chosen approximation is crucial, much stronger than in metals, alloys and conventional semiconductors. This influence may induce to reconsider the interpretation of experimentally determined lifetimes.

</details>


### [565] [Perspective on Moreau-Yosida Regularization in Density-Functional Theory](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06957)
*Markus Penz,Michael F. Herbst,Trygve Helgaker,Andre Laestadius*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: Moreau-Yosida 正则化在密度泛函理论中提供了一种数学上明确的 Kohn-Sham 方法定义，并可用于密度-势能反演和经典场论的联系。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 使用 Moreau-Yosida 正则化来提供密度泛函理论的数学上明确的定义，并将其应用于密度-势能反演和经典场论。

Method: 应用 Moreau-Yosida 正则化来改革密度泛函理论，并探索其在密度-势能反演和经典场论中的应用。

Result: Moreau-Yosida 正则化在密度泛函理论中提供了明确的 Kohn-Sham 方法定义，并展示了其在密度-势能反演和经典场论中的应用。

Conclusion: Moreau-Yosida 正则化在密度泛函理论中具有多种应用，并为未来的发展提供了方向。

Abstract: Within density-functional theory, Moreau-Yosida regularization enables both a reformulation of the theory and a mathematically well-defined definition of the Kohn-Sham approach. It is further employed in density-potential inversion schemes and, through the choice of topology for the density and potential space, can be directly linked to classical field theories. This perspective collects various appearances of the regularization technique within density-functional theory alongside possibilities for their future development.

</details>


### [566] [Wafer-Scale Films of Two-Dimensional Materials via Roll-to-Roll Mechanical Exfoliation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06960)
*Yigit Sozen,Thomas Pucher,Bhagyanath Paliyottil Kesavan,Nuria Jimenez-Arevalo,Julia Hernandez-Ruiz,Zdenek Sofer,Carmen Munuera,Juan J. Riquelme,Andres Castellanos-Gomez*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过引入受控滑动运动改进了卷对卷机械剥离法，实现了晶圆级二维材料纳米片薄膜的均匀制备，所制备的WSe2光电晶体管性能优异，证明了该方法在大规模生产中的潜力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了实现二维材料在电子和光电领域的规模化应用，需要开发一种能够制备大尺寸、高质量二维材料薄膜的技术。

Method: 改进了卷对卷机械剥离法，在剥离过程中引入了受控滑动运动，以实现二维材料纳米片薄膜在晶圆级别的均匀制备。采用全干法转移技术，确保了材料的固有性质得以保留。通过制备WSe2光电晶体管来验证该方法的有效性。

Result: 成功制备了晶圆级均匀的二维材料纳米片薄膜，并在此基础上制造了WSe2光电晶体管，其性能达到了目前报道的最佳水平，可与基于电化学剥离的材料相媲美。

Conclusion: 高通量机械剥离技术，特别是结合了受控滑动运动的改进方法，是一种成本效益高且可靠的大规模生产二维材料及其器件的有效途径。

Abstract: In this study, we demonstrate an improved version of the roll-to-roll mechanical exfoliation method, incorporating a controlled sliding motion into the exfoliation process to achieve uniform nanosheet films of two-dimensional materials at wafer-scale. This scalable technique enables the fabrication of high-quality films suitable for electronic and optoelectronic applications. We validate the process by fabricating WSe2 phototransistors directly on the exfoliated films, achieving performance metrics comparable to the best reported devices based on electrochemically exfoliated material. The all-dry transfer method employed ensures minimal contamination and preserves the intrinsic properties of the material. This work highlights the potential of high-throughput mechanical exfoliation as a cost-effective and reliable route for large-scale production of 2D material-based devices.

</details>


### [567] [The Microscopic Structure of Stacking Faults in Sr$_2$NaNb$_5$O$_{15}$](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.06983)
*Robin Sjökvist,Yining Xie,Zabeada Aslam,Andy P. Brown,Nicholas C. Bristowe,Mark S. Senn,Richard Beanland*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 铁电材料中的堆积层错等拓扑缺陷会显著影响材料的电学和力学性能。本研究通过透射电子显微镜、对称模分析和机器学习力场计算，研究了四方钨青铜材料 Sr$_2$NaNb$_5$O$_{15}$ 中的规则堆积层错。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究铁电材料中的堆积层错如何影响其电子和力学性质。

Method: 通过透射电子显微镜、对称模分析和机器学习力场计算研究 Sr$_2$NaNb$_5$O$_{15}$ 中的堆积层错。

Result: 堆积层错以四组的形式湮灭，产生四个可能的 S$_3$ 序参量方向，这与材料中的 NbO$_6$ 八面体倾斜有关。堆积层错能量估计为 46 mJ/m$^2$，并对极性模式产生显著的局部影响。

Conclusion: 堆积层错可能影响铁电材料的铁电性质。

Abstract: Stacking faults and other topological defects in ferroics can have a significant influence on the electronic and mechanical properties of the material. Here, regular stacking faults in the tetragonal tungsten bronze material Sr$_2$NaNb$_5$O$_{15}$ are investigated through transmission electron microscopy, symmetry mode analysis and machine-learned force-field calculations. It is shown that the faults, with a fault vector of $\frac{1}{4}[\bar{2}12]_o$, annihilate in sets of four in the material, owing to the $\frac{1}{4}$ unit cell displacement along the b-axis. The four resulting domains emerge as four possible directions of the S$_3$ order parameter, related to NbO$_6$ octahedral tilts in the material. Force-field calculations reveal that the stacking faults are likely placed at positions where the octahedra in neighbouring domains have similar magnitudes of rotation, and that the estimated stacking fault energy is 46 mJ/m$^2$. The investigation shows that the stacking faults have a significant local effect on the polar modes present in the structure, and therefore could affect the ferroelectric properties.

</details>


### [568] [Designing new Zintl phases SrBaX (X = Si, Ge, Sn) for thermoelectric applications using \textit{ab initio} techniques](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07031)
*Vivek Gusain,Mohd Zeeshan,B. K. Mani*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: SrBaX (X = Si, Ge, Sn) Zintl相在热电材料设计中展现出优异性能，特别是SrBaGe，其ZT值高达2.0，且p型和n型掺杂性能相似，具有器件制造潜力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探索具有优异热电性能的新型Zintl相材料，以实现Slack的‘声子-玻璃，电子-晶体’概念。

Method: 利用第一性原理模拟计算，研究SrBaX (X = Si, Ge, Sn) 的晶格热导率、声子输运和电子结构及输运性质。

Result: SrBaX材料展现出极低的晶格热导率（<1 W m$^{-1}$ K$^{-1}$），可与SnSe等知名热电材料媲美。SrBaGe的ZT值在700 K时达到2.0，p型和n型掺杂性能相当。

Conclusion: SrBaX系列材料，特别是SrBaGe，具有巨大的热电潜力，有望通过实验研究实现其在器件制造中的应用。

Abstract: Slack's phonon-glass and electron-crystal concept has been the guiding paradigm for designing new thermoelectric materials. Zintl phases, in principle, have been shown as great contenders of the concept and thereby good thermoelectric candidates. With this as motivation, we design new Zintl phases SrBaX (X = Si, Ge, Sn) using state-of-the-art computational methods. Herein, we use first-principles simulations to provide key theoretical insights to thermal and electrical transport properties. Some of the key findings of our work feature remarkably low lattice thermal conductivities ($<$~1~W~m$^{-1}$~K$^{-1}$), putting proposed materials among the well-known thermoelectric materials such as SnSe and other contemporary Zintl phases. We ascribe such low values to antibonding states induced weak bonding in the lattice and intrinsically weak phonon transport, resulting in low phonon velocities, short lifetimes, and considerable anharmonic scattering phase spaces. Besides, our results on electronic structure and transport properties reveal tremendous performance of SrBaGe ($ZT\sim$ 2.0 at 700~K), highlighting the relevance among state-of-the-art materials such as SnSe. Further, the similar performances for both $p$- and $n$-type dopings render these materials attractive from device fabrication perspective. We believe that our study would invite experimental investigations for realizing the true thermoelectric potential of SrBaX series.

</details>


### [569] [Cathodoluminescence, light injection and EELS in STEM: From comparative to coincidence experiments](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07115)
*Luiz H. G. Tizei,Yves Auad,Florian Castioni,Mathieu Kociak*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 利用飞秒到纳秒的时间关联电子光谱学技术，在纳米尺度上揭示材料的化学、电子、振动和光学性质，特别是在纳米光子学领域，并讨论了仪器改进和未来前景。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了获取单个电子光谱技术无法提供的关于材料化学、电子、振动和光学特性的信息。

Method: 在纳秒到飞秒范围内，对涉及光子、非弹性电子和二次电子的不同电子光谱技术进行时间符合实验。

Result: 可以获得单个电子光谱技术无法提供的信息。

Conclusion: 时间符合电子光谱技术具有巨大的潜力，特别是在纳米光子学应用中，但需要进行仪器改进。

Abstract: Electron spectroscopy implemented in electron microscopes provides high spatial resolution, down to the atomic scale, of the chemical, electronic, vibrational and optical properties of materials. In this review, we will describe how temporal coincidence experiments in the nanosecond to femtosecond range between different electron spectroscopies involving photons, inelastic electrons and secondary electrons can provide information bits not accessible to independent spectroscopies. In particular, we will focus on nano-optics applications. The instrumental modifications necessary for these experiments are discussed, as well as the perspectives for these coincidence techniques.

</details>


### [570] [Defect-Mediated Phase Engineering of 2D Ag at the Graphene/SiC Interface](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07151)
*Arpit Jain,Boyang Zheng,Sawani Datta,Kanchan Ulman,Jakob Henz,Matthew Wei-Jun Liu,Van Dong Pham,Wen He,Chengye Dong,Li-Syuan Lu,Alexander Vera,Nader Sawtarie,Wesley Auker,Ke Wang,Bob Hengstebeck,Zachary W. Henshaw,Shreya Mathela,Maxwell Wetherington,William H. Blades,Kenneth Knappenberger,Ursula Wurstbauer,Su Ying Quek,Ulrich Starke,Shengxi Huang,Vincent H. Crespi,Joshua A. Robinson*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过缺陷工程化的限制异质外延（CHet）在二维石墨烯/碳化硅（EG/SiC）界面上，实现了原子级厚度的二维银（Ag）薄膜的相选择性合成。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 二维银（Ag）薄膜在等离激元、量子光学和能量收集方面具有独特的应用潜力，但传统生长方法难以在单层极限下实现结构控制。

Method: 通过缺陷工程化的限制异质外延（CHet）在石墨烯/碳化硅（EG/SiC）界面上，并调控石墨烯生长和后处理引入缺陷，实现了两种不同的银相（Ag(1)和Ag(2)）的合成。

Result: 成功合成了两种具有不同特性的二维银薄膜：由空位和线缺陷稳定的Ag(1)相，以及优先在富含sp3的零层石墨烯上生长的Ag(2)相。两种相均表现出半导体特性，Ag(2)相能轻微提高石墨烯的n型掺杂。非线性光学测量显示，两种相的二阶磁化率相差三个数量级。

Conclusion: 该研究通过CHet方法在EG/SiC界面上实现了二维银薄膜的相选择性合成，并揭示了不同相的特性差异，为构建可重构光电器件和超材料平台提供了具有相可调性的二维金属材料。

Abstract: Atomically thin silver (Ag) films offer unique opportunities in plasmonic, quantum optics, and energy harvesting, yet conventional growth methods struggle to achieve structural control at the monolayer limit. Here, we demonstrate phase-selective synthesis of large-area, crystalline 2D Ag films via defect-engineered confinement heteroepitaxy (CHet) at the epitaxial graphene/silicon carbide (EG/SiC) interface. By tuning graphene growth and post-growth defect introduction, two distinct Ag phases are achieved with disparate properties: a nearly commensurate Ag(1) lattice stabilized by vacancy and line defects in epitaxial graphene, and a denser Ag(2) phase preferentially grown with sp3-rich zero-layer graphene. Structural and spectroscopic characterization confirm lattice registry with the SiC substrate, while theoretical calculations reveal a thermodynamic preference for Ag(2) but an easier nucleation for Ag(1). Both phases are found to be semiconducting, with the Ag(2) phase exhibiting slightly enhanced n-doping of graphene. Notably, nonlinear optical measurements reveal a three-order magnitude difference in second-order susceptibility between the two phases, demonstrating promise for phase-tunable 2D metals in reconfigurable optoelectronic and metamaterial platforms.

</details>


### [571] [Effect of Misfit and Threading Dislocations on Surface Energies of PbTe-PbSe Interfaces](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07182)
*Emir Bilgili,Nicholas Taormina,Yang Li,Adrian Diaz,Simon R. Phillpot,Youping Chen*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: PbTe and PbSe异质结的制造工艺影响界面结构和性质。仿真结果表明，直接波键合和异质外延生长形成的界面，其表面能与传统相干模型预测值存在显著差异，可能导致对断裂韧性或生长模式等物理现象的预测冲突。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究异质结制造工艺对界面结构、性质及其表面能计算方法的影响，并与传统相干模型进行对比。

Method: 采用经过验证的代码，通过测量表面间的相互作用能来计算PbTe和PbSe异质结（通过直接波键合和异质外延生长制造）的表面能。

Result: 直接波键合形成含二维错位 the network 的界面；异质外延生长形成含复杂三维错位 the network 的界面。半相容界面比相容界面表面能低约27%；相容模型预测的表面能比外延界面高约50%。

Conclusion: 异质结制造工艺显著影响界面结构和表面能，传统相干模型可能高估表面能，导致对物理现象预测的冲突。

Abstract: The manufacturing processes of heterostructures determine the structure and properties of their interfaces. In this work, we simulate PbTe and PbSe heterostructures manufactured via (1) direct wave bonding and (2) heteroepitaxial growth. The former contains interfaces with 2D misfit dislocation networks while the latter contains complex 3D networks with both misfit and threading dislocations. To compute the surface energy of interfaces, we measure the interaction energy across surfaces using a well-verified code. Compared with hypothetical interfaces modeled to be coherent, a typical assumption in traditional slab-based methods, the surface energy of wafer bonded and epitaxially grown interfaces are significantly different. Semi-coherent interfaces exhibit up to ~27% lower surface energies than coherent ones, while coherent models overestimate surface energies by up to ~50% relative to epitaxial interfaces. The consequence of such differences can lead to conflicting predictions of physical phenomena such as fracture toughness or growth mode.

</details>


### [572] [A Strain-Engineered 0D/1D Heterojunction of InVO4/Cu-TbFeO3 for High- Selectivity CO2 Photoreduction](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07188)
*Muneeb ur Rahman*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 通过构建0D/1D S-型异质结，解决了光催化CO2制CO的动力学瓶颈和电荷分离效率低下问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 催化CO2光还原制CO被CO脱附和低效电荷分离的动力学瓶颈严重阻碍。

Method: 构建了0D InVO4纳米颗粒在1D Cu掺杂TbFeO3上的多协同0D/1D S-型异质结，利用Cu2+取代诱导晶格应变和氧空位，结合0D/1D结构优势和界面电场，提升CO2光还原性能。

Result: 实现了65.75 mmole g-1.h-1的CO产率和95.93%的选择性，带电物种寿命延长至64.70 ns。

Conclusion: 该研究通过整合缺陷工程、应变压缩和界面设计，为太阳能燃料生产提供了优异的策略。

Abstract: The catalytic CO2 photoreduction to CO is significantly hindered by the pervasive kinetic bottleneck of *CO-desorption and inefficient charge separation. Surpassing the conventional single photocatalytic strategy, herein, a multi-synergetic 0D/1D S-scheme heterojunction by precisely assembling 0D InVO4 nanoparticles on 1D Cu-doped TbFeO3 (IVO/CTFO). This nano-heterojunction is rationally designed at multiple steps where Cu2+ substitution at the Fe3+ site induces a compression in lattice strain and oxygen vacancies (VO), acting as electron traps and CO2 chemisorption sites, which breaks spin-polarization of pristine TbFeO3 to facilitate multichannel charge flow. The 0D/1D strategy couples the maximum surface active-sites and short charge diffusion routes with directional charge migration. Moreover, a 0D/1D lattice mismatch creates a built-in electric field at the interface, resulting in an enhanced lifetime (64.70 ns) of charged species, an efficient CO yield (65.75 mmole g-1.h-1), and high selectivity (95.93%). DFT calculations and experimental findings confirmed the Fermi level shift toward the conduction band and the existence of spin-hybridization. Operando-DRIFTS and the free-energy diagram unveil a H+ mediated mechanism at the interface, alongside a reduction in energy barrier for CO2 photoreduction from *COOH to *CO. Thus, this study presents an excellent approach that integrates defect-engineering, strain-compression, and interfacial design in advancing solar fuels production.

</details>


### [573] [Domain Walls and Defects in Ferroelectric Inorganic Halide Perovskites CsGeX$_3$ (X = Cl, Br, I)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07194)
*Kristoffer Eggestad,Benjamin A. D. Williamson,Sverre M. Selbach*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: CsGeX3是唯一已知all-inorganic卤化物钙钛矿铁电体。本研究通过DFT计算研究了其畴壁（DW）和常见点缺陷，并研究了DW与缺陷的相互作用。最稳定的缺陷是V$_X$和V$_{Cs}$，其中V$_X$具有低迁移势垒和高迁移率。与氧化物铁电体不同，点缺陷与DW之间的亲和力可忽略不计，这反映了CsGeX$_3$ DWs中存在的细微结构畸变。同时，与氧化物相比，CsGeX$_3$ DWs的形成能和迁移势垒较低，并且V$_X$或V$_{Cs}$都不会钉扎迁移的DW。DW两侧的带隙不变以及对内禀带电点缺陷的亲和力不足，意味着在CsGeX$_3$中实现用于纳米电子学的导电DW可能面临挑战。然而，浅层p型缺陷能级和低空穴有效质量表明，在名义上为铁电性的CsGeX$_3$中可能实现高p型导电性。低DW迁移势垒和点缺陷对DW的钉扎作用微乎其微，使得CsGeX$_3$有望成为坚固的软铁电体材料，用于低功耗、高频开关应用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究CsGeX$_3$（一种all-inorganic卤化物钙钛矿铁电体）的铁电畴壁（DW）和常见点缺陷，并探究DW与缺陷之间的相互作用，以评估其在电子器件中的应用潜力。

Method: 使用密度泛函理论（DFT）计算方法。

Result: 1. 最稳定的点缺陷是V$_{	ext{X}}$和V$_{	ext{Cs}}$，其中V$_{	ext{X}}$具有低迁移势垒和高迁移率。
2. 点缺陷与DW之间的亲和力微弱，DW两侧的带隙保持不变。
3. DW的形成能和迁移势垒较低，且不易被V$_{	ext{X}}$或V$_{	ext{Cs}}$钉扎。
4. 存在浅层p型缺陷能级和低空穴有效质量。
5. 结论：用于纳米电子学的导电DW在CsGeX$_3$中难以实现，但其作为软铁电体材料在低功耗、高频开关应用中具有潜力。

Conclusion: 尽管在CsGeX$_3$中实现导电DW面临挑战，但其低DW迁移能垒和不易钉扎的特性使其成为有前景的软铁电体材料，适用于高频低功耗应用。

Abstract: Among all-inorganic halide perovskites, the only known ferroelectrics are the family of CsGeX$_3$ (X = Cl, Br, I). Here, we study their ferroelectric domain walls (DWs) and common point defects by density functional theory (DFT) calculations and investigate the interplay between DWs and defects. The most stable defects are V$_{\text{X}}$ and V$_{\text{Cs}}$ and the former shows low migration barriers and high mobility. In contrast to oxide ferroelectrics, the affinity between point defects and DWs is negligible, reflecting the subtle structural distortions at CsGeX$_3$ DWs. Concomitantly, the formation energies and migration energy barriers of CsGeX$_3$ DWs are small compared to oxides, and neither V$_{\text{X}}$ nor V$_{\text{Cs}}$ pin migrating DWs. The band gap invariance across DWs and the lack of affinity towards intrinsic charged point defects imply that conducting DWs for nanoelectronics may be challenging to realise in CsGeX$_3$. However, shallow $p$-type defect levels and low hole effective masses suggest that high $p$-type conductivity may be achievable in nominally ferroelectric CsGeX$_3$. The low DW migration energy barriers and insignificant DW pinning by point defects make CsGeX$_3$ promising materials as robust soft ferroelectrics for high-frequency switching applications with low energy dissipation.

</details>


### [574] [A Fast, Accurate, and Reactive Equivariant Foundation Potential](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07249)
*Tsz Wai Ko,Runze Liu,Adesh Rohan Mishra,Zihan Yu*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: ETN是一个能够线性扩展的、等变且能感知电荷的机器学习力场，它通过解析可解的电荷平衡方案解决了现有力场模型在显式模拟静电相互作用时的计算成本问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有基础势函数（FPs）在显式模拟静电相互作用时要么无法做到，要么计算成本过高，限制了材料模拟的准确性和效率。

Method: 引入了电荷平衡张量网络（QET），这是一个等变、电荷感知的架构，通过解析可解的电荷平衡方案实现与系统尺寸的线性扩展。

Result: 训练好的QET力场在标准的材料性质基准测试中表现与现有最先进的力场相当，但在以电荷转移为主的体系中给出了质上不同的预测。QET力场成功复制了NaCl-CaCl2离子液体的结构和密度，而电荷非感知的力场则无法做到。此外，微调后的QET能够捕捉Li/Li6PS5Cl固-电解质界面处的反应过程，并支持施加电化学势下的模拟。

Conclusion: QET力场解决了原子尺度模拟中准确模拟静电相互作用的根本限制，并为数据驱动的、能感知电荷的基础力场建立了一个通用的框架，在能量存储、催化等领域具有变革性应用。

Abstract: Electrostatics govern charge transfer and reactivity in materials. Yet, most foundation potentials (FPs) either do not explicitly model such interactions or pay a prohibitive scaling penalty to do so. Here, we introduce charge-equilibrated TensorNet (QET), an equivariant, charge-aware architecture that attains linear scaling with system size via an analytically solvable charge-equilibration scheme. We demonstrate that a trained QET FP matches state-of-the-art FPs on standard materials property benchmarks but delivers qualitatively different predictions in systems dominated by charge transfer. The QET FP reproduces the correct structure and density of the NaCl-CaCl2 ionic liquid, which charge-agnostic FPs miss. We further show that a fine-tuned QET captures reactive processes at the Li/Li6PS5Cl solid-electrolyte interface and supports simulations under applied electrochemical potentials. These results remove a fundamental constraint in the atomistic simulation of accurate electrostatics at scale and establish a general, data-driven framework for charge-aware FPs with transformative applications in energy storage, catalysis, and beyond.

</details>


### [575] [Oxygen vacancies in vanadium dioxide: A DFT$+V$ study](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07284)
*Oskar Leibnitz,Peter Mlkvik,Nicola A. Spaldin,Claude Ederer*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 氧空位在VO2中诱导金属-绝缘体转变，即使在M1相中，由于部分填充的导带，也可以实现金属性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 由于氧空位引起的金属-绝缘体转变的抑制，以及对其起源缺乏明确的共识。

Method: 使用具有静态格间钒-钒相互作用项 V 的 DFT+V 方法，计算了 VO2 的缺氧金属锐钛矿和绝缘单斜 M1 相的性质。

Result: 氧空位在 M1 相中引起局部畸变，但不会破坏通常与绝缘行为相关的二聚化。尽管如此，M1 相由于刚性带状掺杂效应导致部分填充的导带而呈现金属性。

Conclusion: 氧空位可以通过部分填充导带来抑制 VO2 中的金属-绝缘体转变，即使在 M1 相中也是如此。

Abstract: We present a density-functional theory study of the effects of oxygen vacancies on the structural and electronic properties of vanadium dioxide (VO$_2$). Our motivation is the reported suppression of the metal-insulator transition by oxygen vacancies and the lack of a clear consensus on its origin. We use the DFT$+V$ method with a static intersite vanadium-vanadium interaction term, $V$, to calculate the properties of the oxygen-deficient metallic rutile and insulating monoclinic M1 phases of VO$_2$ on the same footing. We find that oxygen vacancies induce local distortions in the M1 phase, but do not destroy the dimerization usually associated with the insulating behavior. In spite of this, we find that the M1 phase becomes metallic as a result of the partial filling of the conduction band due to a rigid-band-like doping effect.

</details>


### [576] [Coexistence of Ferroelectric and Relaxor-like Phases in a Multiferroic Solid Solution (1-x)Pb(Fe1/2Nb1/2)O3 - xPbMnO3](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07371)
*Anna N. Morozovska,Victor N. Pavlikov,Yuriy O. Zagorodniy,Iryna V. Kondakova,Oleksandr S. Pylypchuk,Andrii V. Bodnaruk,Oksana V. Leshchenko,Myroslav V. Karpets,Roman O. Kuzian,Eugene A. Eliseev*

Main category: cond-mat.mtrl-sci

TL;DR: 本研究通过固相法合成了掺杂不同比例锰离子的P(FexNb1-x)O3和P(FexTa1-x)O3固溶体陶瓷，并对其结构、介电和铁性进行了系统研究。发现掺杂10%-30%锰的PFN陶瓷表现出铁电滞后行为，而5%锰掺杂样品因导电性过高而未表现出铁电性。随着锰含量增加，PFN陶瓷的介电温谱出现双最大值，相变温度发生移动，且在30%掺杂时表现出类弛豫铁电体的特性。研究还揭示了PFN-Mn和PFT-Mn固溶体中存在有序铁电相和无序弛豫相的共存。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究室温多铁材料的极性、介电和磁性是至关重要的，本研究旨在探索掺杂锰的PFN和PFT固溶体的结构、介电和铁性，并揭示其相变行为和共存相。

Method: 采用固相法制备了在PFN和PFT中掺杂5%、10%、15%、20%和30%锰离子的固溶体陶瓷，并进行了X射线衍射（XRD）分析、电学测量以及介电温谱测试，并与模型进行对比分析。

Result: XRD分析证实了陶瓷的钙钛矿结构。部分掺杂锰的PFN陶瓷表现出铁电滞后行为，但5%掺杂样品因高导电性无铁电性。介电温谱显示，随着锰含量的增加，相变温度移动，双介电最大值行为发生变化，30%掺杂样品表现出类弛豫铁电体的特性。模型与实验对比揭示了有序铁电相和无序弛豫相的共存。

Conclusion: 通过实验和模型对比，证明了PFN-Mn和PFT-Mn多铁性固溶体中同时存在有序铁电型和无序弛豫型两种相。

Abstract: Experimental and theoretical studies of unusual polar, dielectric and magnetic properties of room temperature multiferroics, such as perovskites Pb(Fe1/2Nb1/2)O3 (PFN) and Pb(Fe1/2Ta1/2)O3 (PFT), are very important. We study the phase composition, dielectric, ferroic properties of the solid solutions PFN and PFT substituted with 5, 10, 15, 20 and 30 % of Mn ions prepared by the solid-state synthesis. The XRD analysis confirmed the perovskite structure of sintered ceramics. Electric measurements revealed the ferroelectric-type hysteresis of electric charge in pure PFN ceramics and in PFN ceramics substituted with (10 - 30)% of Mn. At the same time, the PFN-5% Mn ceramics did not show any ferroelectric properties due to very high conductivity.Temperature dependences of the dielectric permittivity of PFN-10% Mn and PFN-15% Mn ceramics have two pronounced maxima, one of which is relatively sharp and has a weak frequency dispersion; another is diffuse and has a strong frequency dispersion. A further increase in the Mn content up to 20% leads to the right shift in the paraelectric-ferroelectric phase transition temperature, as well as to the strong suppression of the second wide maximum, which transforms into a small diffuse shoulder. An increase in the Mn substitution up to 30% leads to a significant decrease in the dielectric permittivity, left shift of its maximum, and induces a pronounced frequency dispersion of the paraelectric-ferroelectric transition temperature, which is inherent to relaxor-like ferroelectrics.Comparison of the model with experiments reveal the coexistence of the ordered ferroelectric-like and disordered relaxor-like phases in the multiferroic solid solutions PFN-Mn and PFT-Mn.

</details>
